tena sukhoṣṇena tailenoṣṇābhiprāyiṇaṃ jvaritamabhyañjyāt, tathā śītajvaraḥ praśāmyati; etaireva cauṣadhaiḥ ślakṣṇapiṣṭaiḥ sukhoṣṇaiḥ pradehaṃ kārayet, etaireva ca śṛtaṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ salilamavagāhanārthaṃ pariṣekārthaṃ ca prayuñjīta śītajvarapraśamārtham//
&`-kāṇḍīrātmaguptākākāṇḍaiṣīkā-' iti pā-. &&`-surasakarakakaṇḍīrakuṭherakauṭheraka-' iti pā-. &&&`-ruhāvarohā-' iti pā-. ityagurvādyaṃ tailam/
Ca.6.3.268 bhavanti cātra---

lg.l: Ca.6.3.269 sā kuṭī tacca śayanaṃ taccāvacchādanaṃ jvaram/
Ca.6.3.272 vātaje śramaje caiva purāṇe ksataje jvare/
na pacatyabhyavahṛtaṃ kṛcchrāt pacati vā laghu//
Ca.6.3.278 mucyate sahasā prāṇaiściraṃ kliśyati vā naraḥ/
Ca.6.3.279 nāti gurvati vā snigdhaṃ bhojayet sahasā naram/
Ca.6.3.282 paripākaṃ na saptāhenāpi yāti mṛdūṣmaṇām/
sāmā ye ye ca kaphajāḥ kaphapittajvarāśca ye//
Ca.6.3.284 laṅghanaṃ laṅghanīyoktaṃ teṣu kāryaṃ prati prati/
Ca.6.3.288 śothaḥ saṃjāyate tena kaścideva pramucyate/
&`tasyāśu muñcedbāhvoḥ ktamāt sirām' iti yogīndranāthasenasaṃmataḥ pāṭhaḥ.
Ca.6.3.291 tatrādau sarpiṣaḥ pānaṃ kaphapittottaro na cet/
Ca.6.3.295 viṣamaṃ tiktaśītaiśca jvaraṃ pittottaraṃ jayet/
Ca.6.3.296 kaṣāyoṣṇaṃ ca viṣame jvare śastaṃ kaphottare/
Ca.6.3.297 prayoktavyā matimatā doṣādīn pravibhajya te/
Ca.6.3.299 triphalāyāḥ kaṣāyaṃ vā guḍūcyā rasameva vā/
sarpiṣo mahatīṃ mātrāṃ pītvā vā chardayet punaḥ//
sānnaṃ madyaṃ prabhūtaṃ vā pītvā svapyājjvarāgame//
hiṅgutulyā tu vaiyāghrī vasā nasyaṃ sasaindhavā//
Ca.6.3.306 purāṇasarpiḥ siṃhasya vasā tadvat sasaindhavā/
ye dhūmā dhūpanaṃ yacca nāvanaṃ cāñjanaṃ ca yat//
Ca.6.3.311 pūjayan prayataḥ śīghraṃ mucyate viṣamajvarāt/
bhaktyā mātuḥ pituścaiva gurūṇāṃ pūjanena ca//
Ca.6.3.314 brahmacaryeṇa tapasā satyena niyamena ca/
Ca.6.3.315 jvarādvimucyate śīghraṃ sādhūnāṃ darśanena ca/
Ca.6.3.316 sekapradehau raktasthe tathā saṃśamanāni ca/
Ca.6.3.322 sadvākyaiśca śamaṃ yāti jvaraḥ krodhasamuthitaḥ/
jvarasya vegaṃ kālaṃ ca cintayañjvaryate tu yaḥ//
Ca.6.3.324 jvarapramokṣe puruṣaḥ kūjan vamati ceṣṭate/
Ca.6.3.326 sadoṣaśabdaṃ ca śakṛddravaṃ sravati vegavat/
Ca.6.3.330 sajvaro jvaramuktaśca vidāhīni gurūṇi ca/
tathā jvaraḥ śamaṃ yāti praśānto jāyate na ca//
Ca.6.3.332 vyāyāmaṃ ca vyavāyaṃ ca snānaṃ caṅkramaṇāni ca/
jvaramukto na seveta yāvanna balavān bhavet//
Ca.6.3.334 durhṛteṣu ca doṣeṣu yasya vā vinivartate/
Ca.6.3.337 dīnatāṃ śvayathuṃ glāniṃ pāṇḍutāṃ nānnakāmatām/
Ca.6.3.338 evamanye+api ca gadā vyāvartante punargatāḥ/
Ca.6.3.340 mṛdubhiḥ śodhanaiḥ śuddhiryāpanā bastayo hitāḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.3.346 tatra ślokaḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne jvaracikitsitaṃ nāma tṛtīyo+adhyāyaḥ//3//

div.head: caturtho+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.4.1 athāto raktapittacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.4.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: vaktavyaṃ yat paraṃ tasya vaktumarhasi tadguro//
Ca.6.4.6 tasyoṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇamamlaṃ ca kaṭūni lavaṇāni ca/
Ca.6.4.7 tairhetubhiḥ samutkliṣṭaṃ pittaṃ raktaṃ prapadyate/
tadyonitvāt prapannaṃ ca vardhate tat pradūṣayat//
Ca.6.4.10 plīhānaṃ ca yakṛccaiva tadadhiṣṭhāya vartate/
Ca.6.4.11 sāndraṃ sapāṇḍu sasnehaṃ picchilaṃ ca kaphānvitam/
śyāvāruṇaṃ saphenaṃ ca tanu rūkṣaṃ ca vātikam//
Ca.6.4.16 sapta cchidrāṇi śirasi dve cādhaḥ, sādhyamūrdhvagam/
yāpyaṃ tvadhogaṃ, mārgau tu dvāvasādhyaṃ prapadyate//
Ca.6.4.17 yadā tu sarvacchidrebhyo romakūpebhya eva ca/
Ca.6.4.19 saṃsṛṣṭaṃ kaphavātābhyāṃ &kaṇṭhe sajjati cāpi yat/
kṣīṇasya kāsamānasya yacca tacca na sidhyati//
mārgānmārgaṃ caredyadvā yāpyaṃ pittamasṛk ca tat//
Ca.6.4.30 mārgau doṣānubandhaṃ ca nidānaṃ prasamīkṣya ca/
Ca.6.4.32 ūrdhvage tarpaṇaṃ pūrvaṃ peyāṃ pūrvamadhogate/
ūrdhvagaṃ raktapittaṃ tat pītaṃ kāle vyapohati//
svinnaṃ vā sarpiṣā bhṛṣṭaṃ yūṣavadvā vipācitam//
jale sādhyā rase tasmin peyā syādraktapittinām//
Ca.6.4.47 rase hareṇukānāṃ vā saghṛte sabalārase/
siddhāḥ pārāvatādīnāṃ rase vā syuḥ pṛthakpṛthak//
Ca.6.4.49 śaśaḥ savāstukaḥ śasto vibandhe raktapittinām/
Ca.6.4.50 mayūraḥ plakṣaniryūhe nyagrodhasya ca kukkuṭaḥ/
Ca.6.4.51 tṛṣyate tiktakaiḥ siddhaṃ tṛṣṇāghnaṃ vā phalodakam/
vakṣyate bahudoṣāṇāṃ kāryaṃ balavatāṃ ca yat//
saśarkaraṃ vā salilamikṣūṇāṃ rasa eva vā//
Ca.6.4.60 vatsakasya phalaṃ mustaṃ madanaṃ madhukaṃ madhu/
Ca.6.4.61 ūrdhvage śuddhakoṣṭhasya tarpaṇādiḥ kramo hitaḥ/
Ca.6.4.64 śoṣeṇa sānubandhaṃ vā tasya saṃśamanī kriyā/
vinīya lodhraṃ kṣaudraṃ ca raktapittaharaṃ pibet//
nāgapuṣpaṃ ca lodhraṃ ca tenaiva vidhinā pibet//
sakṣaudraṃ grathite rakte lihyāt pārāvataṃ śakṛt//
Ca.6.4.74 raktaṃ sapittaṃ tamakaṃ pipāsāṃ dāhaṃ ca pītāḥ śamayanti sadyaḥ/
kirātatiktaṃ kramukaṃ samustaṃ prapauṇḍarīkaṃ kamalotpale ca//
Ca.6.4.75 hrīberamūlāni paṭolapatraṃ durālabhā parpaṭako mṛṇālam/
pṛthak pṛthak candanayojitāni tenaiva kalpena hitāni tatra//
Ca.6.4.77 niśi sthitā vā svarasīkṛtā vā &kalkīkṛtā vā mṛditāḥ śṛtā vā/
ete samastā gaṇaśaḥ pṛthagvā raktaṃ sapittaṃ &&śamayanti yogāḥ//
&yogīndranāthasenas tu `kalkīkṛtāḥ' ity atra `phāṇṭīkṛtāḥ' iti paṭhati, `mṛdītāḥ' ity asya `cūrṇīkṛtāḥ' iti ca vyākhyānaṃ karoti. &&`śamanty udīrṇam' iti pā-.
Ca.6.4.78 mudgāḥ salājāḥ sayavāḥ sakṛṣṇāḥ sośīramustāḥ saha candanena/
balājale paryuṣitāḥ kaṣāyā raktaṃ sapittaṃ śamayantyudīrṇam//
Ca.6.4.80 uśīrapadmotpalacandanānāṃ pakvasya loṣṭasya ca yaḥ prasādaḥ/
yadraktapittaṃ praśamaṃ na yāti tatrānilaḥ syādanu tatra kāryam//
Ca.6.4.83 chāgaṃ payaḥ syāt paramaṃ prayoge gavyaṃ śṛtaṃ pañcaguṇe jale vā/
Ca.6.4.84 drākṣāśṛtaṃ nāgarakaiḥ śṛtaṃ vā balāśṛtaṃ gokṣurakaiḥ śṛtaṃ vā/
sajīvakaṃ sarṣabhakaṃ sasarpiḥ payaḥ prayojyaṃ sitayā śṛtaṃ vā//
Ca.6.4.85 śatāvarīgokṣurakaiḥ śṛtaṃ vā śṛtaṃ payo vā+apyatha parṇinībhiḥ/
raktaṃ nihantyāśu viśeṣatastu yanmūtramārgāt sarujaṃ prayāti//
Ca.6.4.86 viśeṣato viṭpathasaṃpravṛtte payo mataṃ mocarasena siddham/
Ca.6.4.87 kaṣāyayogān payasā purā vā pītvā+anu cādyāt payasaiva śālīn/
Ca.6.4.88 vāsāṃ saśākhāṃ sapalāśamūlāṃ kṛtvā kaṣāyaṃ kusumāni cāsyāḥ/
pradāya kalkaṃ vipacedghṛtaṃ tat sakṣaudramāśveva nihanti raktam//
Ca.6.4.89 palāśavṛntasvarasena siddhaṃ tasyaiva kalkena madhudraveṇa/
Ca.6.4.90 syāttrāyamāṇāvidhireṣa eva sodumbare caiva paṭolapatre/
sarpīṃṣi pittajvaranāśanāni sarvāṇi śastāni ca raktapitte//
Ca.6.4.91 abhyaṅgayogāḥ pariṣecanāni sekāvagāhāḥ śayanāni veśma/
śīto vidhirbastividhānamagryaṃ pittajvare yat praśamāya diṣṭam//
Ca.6.4.92 tadraktapitte nikhilena kāryaṃ kālaṃ ca mātrāṃ ca purā samīkṣya/
sarpirguḍā ye ca hītāḥ kṣatebhyaste raktapittaṃ śamayanti sadyaḥ//
Ca.6.4.93 kaphānubandhe rudhire sapitte kaṇṭhāgate syādgrathite prayogaḥ/
Ca.6.4.94 mṛṇālapadmotpalakeśarāṇāṃ tathā palāśasya tathā priyaṅgoḥ/
tathā madhūkasya tathā+asanasya kṣārāḥ prayojyā vidhinaiva tena//
piṣṭvā ca mūlaṃ phalapūrakasya ghṛtaṃ pacet kṣīracaturguṇaṃ jñaḥ//
Ca.6.4.96 kāsajvarānāhavibandhaśūlaṃ tadraktapittaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ nihanyāt/
yat pañcamūlairatha pañcabhirvā siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ tacca tadarthakāri//
Ca.6.4.97 kaṣāyayogā ya ihopadiṣṭāste cāvapīḍe bhiṣajā prayojyāḥ/
ghrāṇāt pravṛttaṃ rudhiraṃ sapittaṃ yadā bhavenniḥsṛtaduṣṭadoṣam//
raktaṃ sapūyaṃ &kuṇapaśca gandhaḥ syād ghrāṇanāśaḥ kṛmayaśca duṣṭāḥ//
Ca.6.4.99 nīlotpalaṃ gairikaśaṅkhayuktaṃ sacandanaṃ syāttu sitājalena/
Ca.6.4.100 drākṣārasasyekṣurasasya nasyaṃ kṣīrasya dūrvāsvarasasya caiva/
Ca.6.4.101 priyālatailaṃ madhukaṃ payaśca siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ māhiṣamājikaṃ vā/
āmrāsthipūrvaiḥ payasā ca nasyaṃ sasārivaiḥ syāt kamalotpalaiśca//
Ca.6.4.102 bhadraśriyaṃ lohitacandanaṃ ca prapauṇḍarīkaṃ kamalotpale ca/
Ca.6.4.104 mūlāni puṣpāṇi ca vārijānāṃ pralepanaṃ puṣkariṇīmṛdaśca/
Ca.6.4.105 pradehakalpe pariṣecane ca tathā+avagāhe ghṛtatailasiddhau/
raktasya pittasya ca śāntimicchan bhadraśriyādīni bhiṣak prayuñjyāt//
Ca.6.4.106 dhārāgṛhaṃ bhūmigṛhaṃ suśītaṃ vanaṃ ca ramyaṃ jalavātaśītam/
Ca.6.4.107 patrāṇi puṣpāṇi ca vārijānāṃ kṣaumaṃ ca śītaṃ kadalīdalāni/
pracchādanārthaṃ śayanāsanānāṃ padmotpalānāṃ ca dalāḥ praśastāḥ//
Ca.6.4.108 priyaṅgukācandanarūṣitānāṃ sparśāḥ priyāṇāṃ ca varāṅganānām/
dāhe praśastāḥ sajalāḥ suśītāḥ padmotpalānāṃ ca kalāpavātāḥ//
mano+anukūlāḥ śiśirāśca sarvāḥ kathāḥ saraktaṃ śamayanti pittam//

div.p: Ca.6.4.110 tatra ślokau---

lg.l: hetuṃ vṛddhiṃ saṃjñāṃ sthānaṃ liṅgaṃ pṛthak praduṣṭasya/
Ca.6.4.111 pānānnamiṣṭameva ca varjyaṃ saṃśodhanaṃ ca śamanaṃ ca/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne raktapittacikitsitaṃ nāma caturtho+adhyāyaḥ//4//

div.head: pañcamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.5.1 athāto gulmacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.5.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: cikitsitaṃ gulmanibarhaṇārthaṃ provāca siddhaṃ vadatāṃ variṣṭhaḥ//
viceṣṭitairvā viṣamātimātraiḥ koṣṭhe prakopaṃ samupaiti vāyuḥ//
Ca.6.5.6 kaphaṃ ca pittaṃ ca sa &duṣṭavāyuruddhūya mārgān vinibaddhya tābhyām/
Ca.6.5.7 pakvāśaye pittakaphāśaye vā sthitaḥ svatantraḥ parasaṃśrayo vā/
Ca.6.5.8 bastau ca nābhyāṃ hṛdi pārśvayorvā sthānāni gulmasya bhavanti pañca/
pañcātmakasya prabhavaṃ tu tasya vakṣyāmi liṅgāni cikitsitaṃ ca//
Ca.6.5.10 yaḥ sthānasaṃsthānarujāṃ vikalpaṃ viḍvātasaṅgaṃ galavaktraśoṣam/
Ca.6.5.11 karoti jīrṇe+abhyadhikaṃ prakopaṃ bhukte mṛdutvaṃ samupaiti yaśca/
vātāt sa gulmo na ca tatra rūkṣaṃ kaṣāyatiktaṃ kaṭu copaśete//
&āmābhighāto rudhiraṃ ca duṣṭaṃ paittasya gulmasya nimittamuktam//
Ca.6.5.13 jvaraḥ pipāsā vadanāṅgarāgaḥ śūlaṃ mahajjīryati bhojane ca/
svedo vidāho vraṇavacca gulmaḥ sparśāsahaḥ paittikagulmarūpam//
Ca.6.5.14 śītaṃ guru snigdhamaceṣṭanaṃ ca saṃpūraṇaṃ prasvapanaṃ divā ca/
gulmasya hetuḥ kaphasaṃbhavasya sarvastu diṣṭo nicayātmakasya//
śaityaṃ rugalpā kaṭhinonnatatvaṃ gulmasya rūpāṇi kaphātmakasya//
Ca.6.5.16 nimittaliṅgānyupalabhya gulme dvidoṣaje doṣabalābalaṃ ca/
Ca.6.5.19 yaḥ spandate piṇḍita eva nāṅgaiścirāt saśūlaḥ samagarbhaliṅgaḥ/
sa raudhiraḥ strībhava eva gulmo māse vyatīte daśame cikitsyaḥ//
Ca.6.5.23 srotasāṃ mārdavaṃ kṛtvā jitvā mārutamulbaṇam/
Ca.6.5.26 punaḥ punaḥ snehapānaṃ nirūhāḥ sānuvāsanāḥ/
Ca.6.5.27 kapho vāte jitaprāye pittaṃ śoṇitameva vā/
yadi kupyati vā tasya kriyamāṇe cikitsite//
Ca.6.5.28 yatholbaṇasya doṣasya tatra kāryaṃ bhiṣagjitam/
ādāvante ca madhye ca mārutaṃ parirakṣatā//
Ca.6.5.29 vātagulme kapho vṛddho hatvā+agnimaruciṃ yadi/
Ca.6.5.31 pittaṃ vā yadi saṃvṛddhaṃ saṃtāpaṃ vātagulminaḥ/
Ca.6.5.33 snigdhoṣṇenodite gulme paittike sraṃsanaṃ hitam/
rūkṣoṣṇena tu saṃbhūte sarpiḥ praśamanaṃ param//
Ca.6.5.34 pittaṃ vā pittagulmaṃ vā jñātvā pakvāśayasthitam/
Ca.6.5.35 payasā vā sukhoṣṇena satiktena virecayet/
Ca.6.5.37 cchinnamūlā vidahyante na gulmā yānti ca kṣayam/
raktaṃ hi vyamlatāṃ yāti, tacca nāsti na cāsti ruk//
yadi gulmo vidahyeta śastraṃ tatra bhiṣagjitam//

&`tatraiva piṇḍitaṃ vidradhiniyatatvāccheṣāṅgāvyāpanaśīlaṃ, tathāvidhe śūle sati; tathā tasya vidradhiḥ pārśvapīḍanena puruṣasya svapne labdhe sukhena nidrāyāṃ prāptāyāṃ' ity aṣṭhāṅgasaṃgrahavyākhyāyām induḥ.
Ca.6.5.46 pakvaḥ srotāṃsi saṃkledya vrajatyūrdhvamadho+api vā/
Ca.6.5.47 daśāhaṃ dvādaśāhaṃ vā rakṣan bhiṣagupadravān/
ata ūrdhvaṃ hitaṃ pānaṃ sarpiṣaḥ saviśodhanam//
Ca.6.5.48 śuddhasya tiktaṃ sakṣaudraṃ prayoge sarpiriṣyate/
Ca.6.5.50 sotkleśā cāruciryasya sa gulmī vamanopagaḥ/
Ca.6.5.52 dṛṣṭvā++ādau svedayedyuktyā svinnaṃ ca vilayedbhiṣak/
Ca.6.5.53 kaphagulmī pibet kāle sakṣārakaṭukaṃ ghṛtam/
ekāntaraṃ dvyantaraṃ vā tryahaṃ viśramya vā punaḥ//
Ca.6.5.59 chittvā chittvā++āśayāt kṣāraḥ kṣaratvāt kṣārayatyadhaḥ/
Ca.6.5.62 tasya dāho hṛte rakte śaralohādibhirhitaḥ/
Ca.6.5.63 tayoḥ śamācca saṃghāto gulmasya vinivartate/
eta eva ca kalkāḥ syuḥ kaṣāyaḥ &pañcamūlikaḥ//
Ca.6.5.67 dvipañcamūliko vā+api tadghṛtaṃ gulmanut param/
Ca.6.5.68 prasannayā vā &kṣīrārthaṃ surayā dāḍimena vā/
dadhnaḥ sareṇa vā kāryaṃ ghṛtaṃ mārutagulmanut//
te cūrṇayogā vartyastāḥ kaṣāyāste ca gulminām//
Ca.6.5.78 cūrṇāni mātuluṅgasya bhāvitāni rasena vā/
Ca.6.5.79 hiṅgu trikaṭukaṃ pāṭhāṃ hapuṣāmabhayāṃ śaṭīm/
Ca.6.5.80 dāḍimaṃ puṣkaraṃ dhānyamajājīṃ citrakaṃ vacām/
dvau kṣārau lavaṇe dve ca cavyaṃ caikatra cūrṇayet//
ānāhe mūtrakṛcchre ca śūle ca gudayonije//
dhānyakaṃ ca yavānīṃ ca viḍaṅgaṃ saindhavaṃ vacām//
ajājīṃ cājamodāṃ ca cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā prayojayet//
Ca.6.5.88 rasena mātuluṅgasya madhuśuktena vā punaḥ/
Ca.6.5.90 pāṇḍvāmayaṃ kaphotkleśaṃ sarvajāṃ ca pravāhikām/
Ca.6.5.91 nāgarārdhapalaṃ piṣṭvā dve pale luñcitasya ca/
Ca.6.5.93 tadeva tailaṃ payasā vātagulmī pibennaraḥ/
Ca.6.5.98 vāṭyaṃ pippalīyūṣeṇa mūlakānāṃ rasena vā/
Ca.6.5.100 bastikarma paraṃ vidyādgulmaghnaṃ taddhi mārutam/
sve sthāne prathamaṃ jitvā sadyo gulmamapohati//
Ca.6.5.102 gulmaghnā vividhā diṣṭāḥ siddhāḥ siddhiṣu bastayaḥ/
Ca.6.5.106 nīlinīṃ triphalāṃ rāsnāṃ balāṃ kaṭukarohiṇīm/
Ca.6.5.111 hitamuṣṇaṃ dravaṃ snigdhaṃ bhojanaṃ vātagulminām/
Ca.6.5.112 mande+agnau vardhate gulmo dīpte cāgnau praśāmyati/
yā kriyā kriyate siddhiṃ sā yāti na virūkṣite//
Ca.6.5.116 dve pale ca masūrāṇāṃ sādhyamaṣṭaguṇe+ambhasi/
Ca.6.5.117 pibet saṃmūrcchitaṃ tena gulmaḥ śāmyati paittikaḥ/
jvarastṛṣṇā ca śūlaṃ ca bhramo mūrcchā+arucistathā//
Ca.6.5.119 rohiṇī kaṭukā mustā trāyamāṇā durālabhā/
Ca.6.5.120 rasasyāmalakānāṃ ca kṣīrasya ca ghṛtasya ca/
Ca.6.5.121 pittaraktabhavaṃ gulmaṃ vīsarpaṃ paittikaṃ jvaram/
Ca.6.5.123 drākṣāṃ madhūkaṃ kharjūraṃ vidārīṃ saśatāvarīm/
Ca.6.5.127 tena siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ śītaṃ sakṣaudraṃ pittagulmanut/
Ca.6.5.130 drākṣābhayārasaṃ gulme paittike saguḍaṃ pibet/
hitāste pittagulmibhyo vakṣyante ye ca siddhiṣu//
Ca.6.5.133 śālayo jāṅgalaṃ māṃsaṃ gavyāje payasī ghṛtam/
Ca.6.5.134 āhārārthaṃ prayoktavyaṃ pānārthaṃ salilaṃ śṛtam/
Ca.6.5.135 āmānvaye pittagulme sāme vā kaphavātike/
&`sa gṛhīto yadā' iti pā-. &&`cchindyādgulmaṃ pramāṇavit / vimargajaṃ yadā paśyet' iti gaṅgādharasaṃmataḥ pāṭhah.
Ca.6.5.144 pādaśeṣe rase tasmin pippalīṃ nāgaraṃ vacām/
viḍaṅgaṃ saindhavaṃ hiṅgu yāvaśūkaṃ biḍaṃ śaṭīm//
Ca.6.5.145 citrakaṃ madhukaṃ rāsnāṃ piṣṭvā karṣasamaṃ bhiṣak/
prasthaṃ ca payaso dattvā ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet//
Ca.6.5.148 kṣīraprasthaṃ ca tat sarpihanti gulmaṃ kaphātmakam/
Ca.6.5.149 trivṛtāṃ triphalāṃ dantīṃ daśamūlaṃ palonmitam/
Ca.6.5.150 sarpireraṇḍajaṃ tailaṃ kṣīraṃ caikatra sādhayet/
Ca.6.5.154 jaladroṇe vipaktavyā viṃśatiḥ pañca cābhayāḥ/
dantyāḥ palāni tāvanti citrakasya tathaiva ca//
Ca.6.5.157 tat sādhyaṃ lehavacchīte tasmiṃstailasamaṃ madhu/
Ca.6.5.158 tato lehapalaṃ līḍhvā jagdhvā caikāṃ harītakīm/
Ca.6.5.161 siddhāḥ siddhiṣu vakṣyante nirūhāḥ kaphagulminām/
Ca.6.5.162 yaccūrṇaṃ guṭikā yāśca vihitā vātagulminām/
Ca.6.5.163 ya eva grahaṇīdoṣe kṣārāste kaphagulminām/
Ca.6.5.173 palāśakṣārapātre dve dve pātre tailasarpiṣoḥ/
kṣāreṇa yuktaṃ palalaṃ sudhākṣīreṇa va punaḥ//
Ca.6.5.175 ābhyāṃ vā bhāvitān dadyādyonau kaṭukamatsyakān/
surāṃ samaṇḍāṃ pūrvaṃ ca pānamamlasya sarpiṣaḥ//
Ca.6.5.183 tatra ślokāḥ snehaḥ svedaḥ sarpirbastiścūrṇāni bṛṃhaṇaṃ guḍikāḥ/
Ca.6.5.184 sarpiḥ satiktasiddhaṃ kṣīraṃ prasraṃsanaṃ nirūhāśca/
Ca.6.5.186 snehaḥ svedo bhedo laṅghanamullekhanaṃ virekaśca/
Ca.6.5.188 pathyānnapānasevā hetūnāṃ varjanaṃ yathāsvaṃ ca/
heturliṅgaṃ siddhiḥ kriyākramaḥ sādhyatā na yogāśca/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne gulmacikitsitaṃ nāma pañcamo+adhyāyaḥ//

div.head: ṣaṣṭho+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.6.1 athātaḥ pramehacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.6.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.6.4 āsyāsukhaṃ svapnasukhaṃ dadhīni grāmyaudakānūparasāḥ payāṃsi/
navānnapānaṃ guḍavaikṛtaṃ ca pramehahetuḥ kaphakṛcca sarvam//
Ca.6.6.5 medaśca māṃsaṃ ca śarīrajaṃ ca kledaṃ kapho bastigataṃ pradūṣya/
karoti mehān samudīrṇamuṣṇaistāneva pittaṃ paridūṣya cāpi//
Ca.6.6.6 kṣīṇeṣu doṣeṣvavakṛṣya bastau dhātūn pramehānanilaḥ karoti/
doṣo hi bastiṃ samupetya mūtraṃ saṃdūṣya mehāñjanayedyathāsvam//
Ca.6.6.7 sādhyāḥ kaphotthā daśa, pittajāḥ ṣaṭ yāpyā, na sādhyaḥ pavanāccatuṣkaḥ/
Ca.6.6.8 kaphaḥ sapittaḥ pavanaśca doṣā medo+asraśukrāmbuvasālasīkāḥ/
majjā rasaujaḥ piśitaṃ ca &dūṣyāḥ pramehiṇāṃ, viṃśatireva mehāḥ//
Ca.6.6.9 jalopamaṃ cekṣurasopamaṃ vā ghanaṃ ghanaṃ copari viprasannam/
śuklaṃ saśukraṃ śiśiraṃ śanairvā lāleva vā vālukayā yutaṃ vā//
Ca.6.6.10 vidyāt pramehān kaphajān daśaitān kṣāropamaṃ kālamathāpi nīlam/
Ca.6.6.11 majjaujasā vā vasayā+anvitaṃ vā lasīkayā vā satataṃ vibaddham/
Ca.6.6.12 varṇaṃ rasaṃ sparśamathāpi gandhaṃ yathāsvadoṣaṃ bhajate pramehaḥ/
Ca.6.6.13 svedo+aṅgagandhaḥ śithilāṅgatā ca śayyāsanasvapnasukhe ratiśca/
Ca.6.6.15 sthūlaḥ pramehī balavānihaikaḥ kṛśastathaikaḥ paridurbalaśca/
saṃbṛṃhaṇaṃ tatra kṛśasya kāryaṃ saṃśodhanaṃ doṣabalādhikasya//
Ca.6.6.16 snigdhasya yogā vividhāḥ prayojyāḥ kalpopadiṣṭā &malaśodhanāya/
ūrdhvaṃ tathā+adhaśca male+apanīte meheṣu saṃtarpaṇameva kāryam//
Ca.6.6.18 saṃśodhanaṃ nārhati yaḥ pramehī tasya kriyā saṃśamanī prayojyā/
manthāḥ kaṣāyā yavacūrṇalehāḥ pramehaśāntyai laghavaśca bhakṣyāḥ//
Ca.6.6.19 ye viṣkirā ye pratudā vihaṅgāsteṣāṃ rasairjāṅgalajairmanojñaiḥ/
Ca.6.6.21 saṣaṣṭikaṃ syāttṛṇadhānyamannaṃ yavapradhānastu bhavet pramehī/
Ca.6.6.22 niśisthitānāṃ triphalākaṣāye syustarpaṇāḥ kṣaudrayutā yavānām/
Ca.6.6.23 ye śleṣmamehe vihitāḥ kaṣāyāstairbhāvitānāṃ ca pṛthagyavānām/
saktūnapūpān saguḍān sadhānān bhakṣyāṃstathā+anyān vividhāṃśca khādet//
Ca.6.6.24 kharāśvagohaṃsapṛṣadbhṛtānāṃ tathā yavānāṃ vividhāśca bhakṣyāḥ/
deyāstathā veṇuyavā yavānāṃ kalpena godhūmamayāśca bhakṣyāḥ//
jayanti pittaprabhavān virekaḥ saṃtarpaṇaḥ saṃśamano vidhiśca//
Ca.6.6.26 dārvīṃ surāhvāṃ triphalāṃ samustāṃ kaṣāyamutkvāthya pibet pramehī/
Ca.6.6.28 dārvī viḍaṅgaṃ khadiro dhavaśca surāhvakuṣṭhāgurucandanāni/
dārvyagnimanthau triphalā sapāṭhā pāṭhā ca mūrvā ca tathā śvadaṃṣṭrā//
pādaiḥ kaṣāyāḥ kaphamehināṃ te daśopadiṣṭā madhusaṃprayuktāḥ//
paitteṣu meheṣu daśa pradiṣṭāḥ pādaiḥ kaṣāyā madhusaṃprayuktāḥ//
Ca.6.6.33 sarveṣu meheṣu matau tu pūrvau kaṣāyayogau vihitāstu sarve/
manthasya pāne yavabhāvanāyāṃ syurbhojane pānavidhau pṛthak ca//
Ca.6.6.34 siddhāni tailāni ghṛtāni caiva &deyāni meheṣvanilātmakeṣu/
medaḥ kaphaścaiva kaṣāyayogaiḥ snehaiśca vāyuḥ śamameti teṣām//
kapitthapuṣpāṇi ca cūrṇitāni kṣaudreṇa lihyāt kaphapittamehī//
jīrṇe ca bhuñjīta purāṇamannaṃ mehī rasairjāṅgalajairmanojñaiḥ//
Ca.6.6.37 dṛṣṭvā+anubandhaṃ pavanāt kaphasya pittasya vā snehavidhirvikalpyaḥ/
tailaṃ kaphe syāt svakaṣāyasiddhaṃ pitte ghṛtaṃ pittaharaiḥ kaṣāyaiḥ//
Ca.6.6.39 mañjiṣṭhayā cāgurucandanaiśca sarvaiḥ samastaiḥ kaphavātajeṣu/
meheṣu tailaṃ vipaced, ghṛtaṃ tu paitteṣu, miśraṃ triṣu lakṣaṇeṣu//
Ca.6.6.40 phalatrikaṃ dāruniśāṃ viśālāṃ mustāṃ ca niḥkvāthya niśāṃ sakalkām/
Ca.6.6.41 lodhraṃ śaṭīṃ puṣkaramūlamelāṃ mūrvāṃ viḍaṅgaṃ triphalāṃ yamānīm (yavānīm?)/
cavyaṃ priyaṅguṃ kramukaṃ viśālāṃ kirātatiktaṃ kaṭurohiṇīṃ ca//
Ca.6.6.42 bhārṅgīṃ nataṃ citrakapippalīnāṃ mūlaṃ sakuṣṭhātiviṣaṃ sapāṭham/
kaliṅgakān keśaramindrasāhvāṃ nakhaṃ sapatraṃ maricaṃ plavaṃ ca//
Ca.6.6.43 droṇe+ambhasaḥ karṣasamāni paktvā pūte caturbhāgajalāvaśeṣe/
rase+ardhabhāgaṃ madhunaḥ pradāya pakṣaṃ nidheyo ghṛtabhājanasthaḥ//
pāṇḍvāmayārśāṃsyaruciṃ grahaṇyā doṣaṃ kilāsaṃ vividhaṃ ca kuṣṭham//
Ca.6.6.45 kvāthaḥ sa evāṣṭapalaṃ ca dantyā bhallātakānāṃ ca catuṣpalaṃ syāt/
sitopalā tvaṣṭapalā viśeṣaḥ kṣaudraṃ ca tāvat pṛthagāsavau tau//
Ca.6.6.46 sārodakaṃ vā+atha kuśodakaṃ vā madhūdakaṃ vā triphalārasaṃ vā/
sīdhuṃ pibedvā nigadaṃ pramehī mādhvīkamagryaṃ cirasaṃsthitaṃ vā//
Ca.6.6.47 māṃsāni śūlyāni mṛgadvijānāṃ khādedyavānāṃ vividhāṃśca bhakṣyān/
Ca.6.6.48 bhṛṣṭān yavān bhakṣayataḥ prayogācchuṣkāṃśca saktūnna bhavanti mehāḥ/
śvitraṃ ca kṛcchraṃ kaphajaṃ ca kuṣṭhaṃ tathaiva mudgāmalakaprayogān//
Ca.6.6.49 saṃtarpaṇottheṣu gadeṣu yogā medasvināṃ ye ca mayopadiṣṭāḥ/
virūkṣaṇārthaṃ kaphapittajeṣu siddhāḥ prameheṣvapi te prayojyāḥ//
Ca.6.6.51 kledaśca medaśca kaphaśca vṛddhaḥ pramehahetuḥ prasamīkṣya tasmāt/
Ca.6.6.52 yā vātamehān prati pūrvamuktā vātolbaṇānāṃ vihitā kriyā sā/
vāyurhi meheṣvatikarśitānāṃ kupyatyasādhyān prati nāsti cintā//
Ca.6.6.53 yairhetubhirye prabhavanti mehāsteṣu prameheṣu na te niṣevyāḥ/
hetorasevā vihitā yathaiva jātasya rogasya bhaveccikitsā//
Ca.6.6.54 hāridravarṇaṃ rudhiraṃ ca mūtraṃ vinā pramehasya hi pūrvarūpaiḥ/
yo mūtrayettaṃ na vadet pramehaṃ raktasya pittasya hi sa prakopaḥ//
Ca.6.6.55 dṛṣṭvā pramehaṃ madhuraṃ sapicchaṃ madhūpamaṃ syāddvividho vicāraḥ/
kṣīṇeṣu doṣesvanilātmakaḥ syāt saṃtarpaṇādvā kaphasaṃbhavaḥ syāt//
Ca.6.6.56 sapūrvarūpāḥ kaphapittamehāḥ krameṇa ye vātakṛtāśca mehāḥ/
sādhyā na te, pittakṛtāstu yāpyāḥ, sādhyāstu medo yadi na praduṣṭam//
Ca.6.6.57 jātaḥ pramehī madhumehino vā na sādhya uktaḥ sa hi bījadoṣāt/
ye cāpi kecit kulajā vikārā bhavanti tāṃśca pravadantyasādhyān//
Ca.6.6.58 pramehiṇāṃ yāḥ piḍakā mayoktā rogādhikāre pṛthageva sapta/

div.p: Ca.6.6.59 tatra ślokāḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne pramehacikitsitaṃ nāma ṣaṣṭho+adhyāyaḥ//6//

div.head: saptamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.7.1 athātaḥ kuṣṭhacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.7.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//
Ca.6.7.3 hetuṃ dravyaṃ liṅgaṃ kuṣṭhānāmāśrayaṃ praśamanaṃ ca/
śṛṇvagniveśa! samyagviśeṣataḥ sparśanaghnānām//

lg.l: Ca.6.7.8 vyavāyaṃ cāpyajīrṇe+anne nidrāṃ ca bhajatāṃ divā/
viprān gurūn dharṣayatāṃ pāpaṃ karma ca kurvatām//
Ca.6.7.10 ataḥ kuṣṭhāni jāyante sapta caikādaśaiva ca/
Ca.6.7.16 śvetaṃ raktaṃ sthiraṃ styānaṃ snigdhamutsannamaṇḍalam/
sotsedhaṃ ca sadāhaṃ ca puṇḍarīkaṃ taducyate//
Ca.6.7.19 śvetaṃ tāmraṃ tanu ca &yadrajo ghṛṣṭaṃ vimuñcati/
tridoṣaliṅgaṃ tat kuṣṭhaṃ kākaṇaṃ naiva sidhyati//
Ca.6.7.22 śyāvaṃ kiṇakharasparśaṃ paruṣaṃ kiṭimaṃ smṛtam/
Ca.6.7.24 &raktaṃ sakaṇḍu sasphoṭaṃ sarugdalati cāpi yat/
Ca.6.7.25 pāmā śvetāruṇaśyāvāḥ kaṇḍūlāḥ piḍakā bhṛśam/
Ca.6.7.26 raktaṃ śyāvaṃ sadāhārti śatāruḥ syādbahuvraṇam/
Ca.6.7.27 vāte+adhikatare kuṣṭhaṃ kāpālaṃ maṇḍalaṃ kaphe/
pitte tvaudumbaraṃ vidyāt kākaṇaṃ tu tridoṣajam//
Ca.6.7.31 sarvaṃ tridoṣajaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ doṣāṇāṃ tu balābalam/
Ca.6.7.32 doṣasya yasya paśyet kuṣṭheṣu viśeṣaliṅgamudriktam/
Ca.6.7.34 raukṣyaṃ śoṣastodaḥ śūlaṃ saṃkocanaṃ tathā+āyāmaḥ/
Ca.6.7.35 kuṣṭheṣu vātaliṅgaṃ, dāho rāgaḥ parisravaḥ pākaḥ/
Ca.6.7.36 śvaityaṃ śaityaṃ kaṇḍūḥ sthairyaṃ cotsedhagauravasnehāḥ/
Ca.6.7.38 vātakaphaprabalaṃ yadyadekadoṣolbaṇaṃ na tat kṛcchram/
pracchanamalpe kuṣṭhe mahati ca śastaṃ sirāvyadhanam//
Ca.6.7.41 bahudoṣaḥ saṃśodhyaḥ kuṣṭhī bahuśo+anurakṣatā prāṇān/
Ca.6.7.42 snehasya pānamiṣṭaṃ śuddhe koṣṭhe pravāhite rakte/
Ca.6.7.43 doṣotkliṣṭe hṛdaye vāmyaḥ kuṣṭheṣu cordhvabhāgeṣu/
Ca.6.7.44 śītarasaḥ pakvaraso madhūni madhukaṃ ca vamanāni/
kuṣṭheṣu trivṛtā dantī triphalā ca virecane śastā//
Ca.6.7.53 ye lepāḥ kuṣṭhānāṃ yujyante nirhṛtāsradoṣāṇām/
Ca.6.7.54 yeṣu na śastraṃ kramate sparśendriyanāśanāni yāni syuḥ/
teṣu nipātyaḥ kṣāro raktaṃ doṣaṃ ca visrāvya//
Ca.6.7.55 pāṣāṇakaṭhinaparuṣe supte kuṣṭhe sthire purāṇe ca/
Ca.6.7.61 dārvī rasāñjanaṃ vā gomūtreṇa prabādhate kuṣṭham/
Ca.6.7.62 mūlaṃ paṭolasya tathā gavākṣyāḥ pṛthak palāṃśaṃ &triphalātvacaśca/
Ca.6.7.63 palaṃ tathaiṣāṃ saha cūrṇitānāṃ jale śṛtaṃ doṣaharaṃ pibennā/
Ca.6.7.64 kuṣṭhāni śophaṃ grahaṇīpradoṣamarśāṃsi kṛcchrāṇi halīmakaṃ ca/
ṣaḍrātrayogena nihanti caiṣa hṛdbastiśūlaṃ viṣamajvaraṃ ca//
Ca.6.7.65 mustaṃ vyoṣaṃ triphalā mañjiṣṭhā dāru pañcamūlyau dve/
kṣaudraprasthe kāryaḥ kārye te cāṣṭapalike ca//
triphalaile tvaṅmaricaṃ patraṃ kanakaṃ ca karṣāṃśam//
Ca.6.7.75 matsyaṇḍikā madhusamā tanmāsaṃ jātamāyase bhāṇḍe/
sauvarṇī ca tathā tvak chinnaruhā ceti tanmāsam//
Ca.6.7.78 nidadhīta dhānyamadhye prātaḥ prātaḥ pibettato yuktyā/
Ca.6.7.82 laghūni cānnāni hitāni vidyāt kuṣṭheṣu śākāni ca tiktakāni/
bhallātakaiḥ satriphalaiḥ sanimbairyuktāni cānnāni ghṛtāni caiva//
Ca.6.7.83 purāṇadhānyānyatha jāṅgalāni māṃsāni mudgāśca paṭolayuktāḥ/
śastā, na gurvamlapayodadhīni nānūpamatsyā na guḍastilāśca//
Ca.6.7.84 elā kuṣṭhaṃ dārvī śatapuṣpā citrako viḍaṅgaśca/
Ca.6.7.86 kṣāreṇa gavāṃ mūtrasrutena tenāsya maṇḍalānyāśu/
Ca.6.7.87 māṃsī maricaṃ lavaṇaṃ rajanī tagaraṃ sudhā gṛhāddhūmaḥ/
Ca.6.7.88 trapu sīsamayaścūrṇaṃ maṇḍalanut phalgucitrakau bṛhatī/
godhārasaḥ salavaṇo dāru ca mūtraṃ ca maṇḍalanut//
māṃseṣu toyakāryaṃ kāryaṃ piṣṭe ca &kiṇve ca//
Ca.6.7.90 tairmedakaḥ sujātaḥ kiṇvairjanitaṃ pralepanaṃ śastam/
Ca.6.7.91 mustaṃ madanaṃ triphalā karañja āragvadhakaliṅgayavāḥ/
Ca.6.7.92 eṣa kaṣāyo vamanaṃ virecanaṃ varṇakastathodgharṣaḥ/
Ca.6.7.94 śvetakaravīramūlaṃ kuṭajakarañjayoḥ phalaṃ tvaco dārvyāḥ/
Ca.6.7.96 śairīṣī tvak puṣpaṃ kārpāsyā rājavṛkṣapatrāṇi/
Ca.6.7.97 dārvyā rasāñjanasya ca nimbapaṭolasya khadirasārasya/
Ca.6.7.98 iti ṣaṭ kaṣāyayogāḥ kuṣṭhaghnāḥ saptamaśca tiniśasya/
Ca.6.7.99 ālepanaṃ pragharṣaṇamavacūrṇanameta eva ca kaṣāyāḥ/
Ca.6.7.100 triphalā nimbapaṭolaṃ mañjiṣṭhā rohiṇī vacā rajanī/
Ca.6.7.101 etaireva ca sarpiḥ siddhaṃ vātolbaṇaṃ jayati kuṣṭham/
Ca.6.7.104 etaistailaṃ siddhaṃ kuṣṭhaghnaṃ yoga eṣa cālepaḥ/
Ca.6.7.107 etaistailaṃ siddhaṃ kalkaiḥ pādāṃśikairgavāṃ mūtram/
Ca.6.7.108 tiktālābukabījaṃ dve tutthe rocanā haridre dve/
Ca.6.7.111 kanakakṣīrī śailā bhārgī dantyāḥ phalāni mūlaṃ ca/
&`kuṣṭhaṃ tumbaru pāṭhā mūrvā vacā+atha ṣaḍgranthā' iti pā-.
Ca.6.7.116 sthāpyaṃ kaṭukālābuni tatsiddhaṃ tena maṇḍalānyāśu/
Ca.6.7.117 kuṣṭhaṃ tamālapatraṃ maricaṃ samanaḥśilaṃ sakāsīsam/
Ca.6.7.120 jīvantī mañjiṣṭhā dārvī kampillakaḥ payastuttham/
eṣa ghṛtatailapākaḥ siddhaḥ siddhe ca sarjarasaḥ//
Ca.6.7.121 deyaḥ samadhūcchiṣṭo vipādikā tena śāmyate+abhyaktā/
Ca.6.7.122 &kiṇvaṃ varāharudhiraṃ pṛthvīkā saindhavaṃ ca lepaḥ syāt/
lepo yojyaḥ kustumburūṇi kuṣṭhaṃ ca maṇḍalanut//
khadiro dhavaścalepaḥ śyāmā dantī dravantī ca//
Ca.6.7.125 lākṣārasāñjanailāḥ punarnavā ceti kuṣṭhino lepāḥ/
Ca.6.7.127 eḍagajaḥ sarjaraso mūlakabījaṃ ca sidhmakuṣṭhānām/
Ca.6.7.128 vāsā triphalā pāne snāne codvartane pralepe ca/
snāne pāne ca hitāḥ suśītalāḥ pittakuṣṭhibhyaḥ//
Ca.6.7.132 ālepanaṃ priyaṅgurhareṇukā vatsakasya ca phalāni/
sātiviṣā ca sasevyā sacandanā rohiṇī kaṭukā//
Ca.6.7.134 klede prapatati cāṅge dāhe visphoṭake sacarmadale/
śītāḥ pradehasekā vyadho vireko ghṛtaṃ tiktam//
Ca.6.7.136 triphalātvaco+ardhapalikāḥ paṭolapatraṃ ca kārṣikāḥ śeṣāḥ/
Ca.6.7.137 eṣa kaṣāyaḥ sādhyo dattvā dvipalaṃ masūravidalānām/
Ca.6.7.138 te &ca kaṣāye+aṣṭapale catuṣpalaṃ sarpiṣaśca paktavyam/
Ca.6.7.140 nimbapaṭolaṃ dārvīṃ durālabhāṃ tiktarohiṇīṃ triphalām/
Ca.6.7.144 saptacchadaṃ prativiṣāṃ śampākaṃ tiktarohiṇīṃ pāṭhām/
Ca.6.7.145 dhanvayavāsaṃ candanamupakulyāṃ padmakaṃ haridre dve/
Ca.6.7.150 hanyādetat sarpiḥ pītaṃ kāle yathābalaṃ sadyaḥ/
Ca.6.7.151 doṣe hṛte+apanīte rakte bāhyāntare kṛte &śamane/
snehe ca kālayukte na kuṣṭham-&&anuvartate sādhyam//
Ca.6.7.155 dhātrīrasaṃ ca tulyāṃśaṃ sarpiṣaścāḍhakaṃ pacet/
Ca.6.7.159 pānāhāravidhāne prasecane dhūpane pradehe ca/
Ca.6.7.161 eḍagajaḥ saviḍaṅgo dve ca niśe rājavṛkṣamūlaṃ ca/
Ca.6.7.163 taṃ pītvā susnigdho yathābalaṃ sūryapādasaṃtāpam/
Ca.6.7.164 śvitre+aṅge ye sphoṭā jāyante kaṇṭakena tānbhindyāt/
sphoṭeṣu visruteṣu prātaḥ prātaḥ pibet pakṣam//
Ca.6.7.165 malapūmasanaṃ priyaṅguṃ śatapuṣpāṃ cāmbhasā samutkvāthya/
Ca.6.7.166 yaccānyat kuṣṭhaghnaṃ śvitrāṇāṃ sarvameva tacchastam/
Ca.6.7.167 samanaḥśilaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ kāsīsaṃ rocanāṃ kanakapuṣpīm/
Ca.6.7.168 kadalīkṣārayutaṃ vā kharāsthi dagdhaṃ gavāṃ rudhirayuktam/
Ca.6.7.169 nīlotpalaṃ sakuṣṭhaṃ sasaindhavaṃ hastimūtrapiṣṭaṃ vā/
Ca.6.7.170 kākodumbarikā vā sāvalgujacitrakā gavāṃ mūtre/
Ca.6.7.171 lepaḥ kilāsahantā bījānyāvalgujāni lākṣā ca/
&`dāraṇaṃ cāraṇaṃ' iti pā-. &&`yaducyate tattrividhaṃ' iti pā-.
Ca.6.7.174 doṣe raktāśrite raktaṃ tāmraṃ māṃsasamāśrite/
Ca.6.7.176 araktaloma tanu yat pāṇḍu nāticirotthitam/
Ca.6.7.177 vacāṃsyatathyāni kṛtaghnabhāvo nindā &surāṇāṃ gurudharṣaṇaṃ ca/
pāpakriyā pūrvakṛtaṃ ca karma hetuḥ kilāsasya virodhi cānnam//

div.p: Ca.6.7.178 tatra ślokāḥ---

lg.l: heturdravyaṃ liṅgaṃ vividhaṃ ye yeṣu cādhikā doṣāḥ/
Ca.6.7.179 sādhyamasādhyaṃ kṛcchraṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kuṣṭhāpahāśca ye yogāḥ/
Ca.6.7.180 iti saṃgrahaḥ praṇīto maharṣiṇā kuṣṭhanāśane+adhyāye/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsitasthāne kuṣṭhacikitsitaṃ nāma saptamo+adhyāyaḥ//7//

div.head: aṣṭamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.8.1 athāto rājayakṣmacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.8.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.8.9 atha candramasaḥ śuddhāṃ matiṃ buddhā prajāpatiḥ/
Ca.6.8.11 krodho yakṣmā jvaro roga ekārtho duḥkhasaṃjñakaḥ/
yasmāt sa rājñaḥ prāgāsīdrājayakṣmā tato mataḥ//
Ca.6.8.12 sa yakṣmā huṅkṛto+aśvibhyāṃ mānuṣaṃ lokamāgataḥ/
Ca.6.8.16 sa śiraḥsthaḥ śiraḥśūlaṃ karoti galamāśritaḥ/
Ca.6.8.17 pārśvaśūlaṃ ca pārśvastho varcobhedaṃ gude sthitaḥ/
jṛmbhāṃ jvaraṃ ca sandhistha uraḥsthaścoraso rujam//
Ca.6.8.19 iti sāhasiko yakṣmā rūpairetaiḥ prapadyate/
Ca.6.8.22 pratiśyāyaṃ ca kāsaṃ ca svarabhedamarocakam/
ruddhvā rogāya kalpante puṣyanti ca na dhātavaḥ//
Ca.6.8.30 pratiśyāyaṃ prasekaṃ ca kāsaṃ chardimarocakam/
Ca.6.8.39 yathāsvenoṣmaṇā pākaṃ śārīrā yānti dhātavaḥ/
srotasā ca yathāsvena dhātuḥ puṣyati dhātutaḥ//
Ca.6.8.40 srotasāṃ saṃnirodhācca raktādīnāṃ ca saṃkṣayāt/
Ca.6.8.44 jāyante vyādhayaścātaḥ ṣaḍekādaśa vā punaḥ/
Ca.6.8.48 ghrāṇamūle sthitaḥ śleṣmā rudhiraṃ pittameva vā/
Ca.6.8.50 jvaraḥ kāsaḥ kaphotkleśaḥ svarabhedo+aruciḥ klamaḥ/
Ca.6.8.51 picchilaṃ bahalaṃ visraṃ haritaṃ śvetapītakam/
Ca.6.8.55 sanno raktavibaddhatvāt svaraḥ kṛcchrāt pravartate/
Ca.6.8.63 sarvastridoṣajo yakṣmā doṣāṇāṃ tu balābalam/
Ca.6.8.64 pratiśyāye śiraḥśūle kāse śvāse svarakṣaye/
pārśvaśūle ca vividhāḥ kriyāḥ sādhāraṇīḥ śṛṇu//
kaṇṭhe śirasi pārśve ca payobhirvā savātikaiḥ//
Ca.6.8.75 jīvantyāḥ śatapuṣpāyā balāyā madhukasya ca/
Ca.6.8.78 balā rāsnā tilāḥ sarpirmadhukaṃ nīlamutpalam/
Ca.6.8.79 vīrā balā vidārī ca kṛṣṇagandhā punarnavā/
śatāvarī payasyā ca kattṛṇaṃ madhukaṃ ghṛtam//
Ca.6.8.80 catvāra ete ślokārdhaiḥ pradehāḥ parikīrtitāḥ/
Ca.6.8.89 yogān saṃśuddhakoṣṭhānāṃ kāse śvāse svarakṣaye/
Ca.6.8.91 prapauṇḍarīkaṃ madhukaṃ pippalī bṛhatī balā/
Ca.6.8.93 daśamūlena payasā siddhaṃ māṃsarasena ca/
rāsnāghṛtaṃ vā sakṣīraṃ sakṣīraṃ vā balāghṛtam//
Ca.6.8.95 lehān kāsāpahān svaryāñ śvāsahikkā nibarhaṇān/
Ca.6.8.100 kharjūraṃ pippalī drākṣā pathyā śṛṅgī durālabhā/
Ca.6.8.101 vīrā śaṭī puṣkarākhyaṃ surasaḥ śarkarā guḍaḥ/
Ca.6.8.103 sitopalāṃ tugākṣīrīṃ pippalīṃ bahulāṃ tvacam/
vāsāghṛtaṃ śatāvaryā siddhaṃ vā paramaṃ hitam//
Ca.6.8.106 durālabhāṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ ca catasraḥ parṇinīrbalām/
Ca.6.8.111 jīvantīṃ madhukaṃ drākṣāṃ phalāni kuṭajasya ca/
śaṭīṃ puṣkaramūlaṃ ca vyāghrīṃ gokṣurakaṃ balām//
pippalīṃ ca samaṃ piṣṭvā ghṛtaṃ vaidyo vipācayet//
Ca.6.8.114 balāṃ sthirāṃ pṛśnipaṇīṃ bṛhatīṃ snidigdhikām/
Ca.6.8.115 drākṣākharjūrasarpirbhiḥ pippalyā ca śṛtaṃ saha/
Ca.6.8.116 ājasya payasaścaivaṃ prayogo jāṅgalā rasāḥ/
Ca.6.8.117 jvarāṇāṃ śamanīyo yaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ kriyāvidhiḥ/
jāṅgalāni ca śūlyāni sevamānaḥ kaphaṃ jayet//
Ca.6.8.122 kriyā kaphapraseke yā vamyāṃ saiva praśasyate/
Ca.6.8.126 pāṭhā bilvaṃ yamānī ca pātavyaṃ takrasaṃyutam/
durālabhā śṛṅgaveraṃ pāṭhā ca surayā saha//
Ca.6.8.127 jambvāmramadhyaṃ bilvaṃ ca sakapitthaṃ sanāgaram/
Ca.6.8.128 etāneva ca yogāṃstrīn pāṭhādīn kārayet khaḍān/
Ca.6.8.130 mātuluṅgasya dhātakyā dāḍimasya ca kārayet/
Ca.6.8.133 sthirādipañcamūlena pāne śastaṃ śṛtaṃ jalam/
Ca.6.8.134 ityuktaṃ bhinnaśakṛtāṃ dīpanaṃ grāhi bheṣajam/
dārvītvaco yavānī ca tejohvā pippalī tathā//
Ca.6.8.138 yavānī tintiḍīkaṃ ca pañcaite mukhadhāvanāḥ/
Ca.6.8.141 yavānīṃ tintiḍīkaṃ ca nāgaraṃ sāmlavetasam/
pippalīnāṃ śataṃ caikaṃ dve śate maricasya ca//
Ca.6.8.145 tālīśapatraṃ maricaṃ nāgaraṃ pippalī śubhā/
teṣūpadhā, sukhaṃ bhoktuṃ tathā śakyāni tāni hi//
Ca.6.8.163 māṃsamevāśnataḥ śoṣo mādhvīkaṃ pibato+api ca/
Ca.6.8.167 puṣyanti dhātupoṣācca śīghraṃ śoṣaḥ praśāmyati/
Ca.6.8.168 sakṣaudraṃ, payasā siddhaṃ sarpirdaśaguṇena vā/
Ca.6.8.170 sayāvaśūkaiḥ sakṣīraiḥ srotasāṃ śodhanaṃ ghṛtam/
yavāgvā vā pibenmātrāṃ lihyādvā madhunā saha//
uttīrṇaṃ miśrakaiḥ snehaiḥ punarāktaiḥ sukhaiḥ karaiḥ//
Ca.6.8.177 māṣāṃstilāṃśca kiṇvaṃ ca sarvamekatra cūrṇayet/
Ca.6.8.180 spṛśyān saṃspṛśya saṃpūjya devatāḥ sabhiṣagdvajāḥ/
Ca.6.8.186 suhṛdāṃ ramaṇīyānāṃ pramadānāṃ ca darśanaiḥ/
Ca.6.8.189 yayā prayuktayā ceṣṭyā rājayakṣmā purā jitaḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.8.190 tatra ślokau---
div.trailer: ityuktaḥ saṃgrahaḥ kṛtsno rājayakṣmacikitsite//
ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne rājayakṣmacikitsitaṃ nāmāṣṭamo+adhyāyaḥ//8//

div.head: navamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.9.1 athāta unmādacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.9.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.9.5 tairalpasattvasya malāḥ praduṣṭā buddhernivāsaṃ hṛdayaṃ pradūṣya/
Ca.6.9.6 dhīvibhramaḥ sattvapariplavaśca paryākulā dṛṣṭiradhīratā ca/
abaddhavāktvaṃ hṛdayaṃ ca śūnyaṃ sāmānyamunmādagadasya liṅgam//
Ca.6.9.7 sa mūḍhacetā na sukhaṃ na duḥkhaṃ nācāradharmau kuta eva śāntim/
tasyodbhavaṃ pañcavidhaṃ pṛthak tu vakṣyāmi liṅgāni cikitsitaṃ ca//
&cintādijuṣṭaṃ hṛdayaṃ pradūṣya buddhiṃ smṛtiṃ cāpyupahanti śīghram//
pracchāyaśītānnajalābhilāṣāḥ pītā ca bhāḥ pittakṛtasya liṅgam//
Ca.6.9.13 saṃpūraṇairmandaviceṣṭitasya soṣmā kapho marmaṇi saṃpravṛddhaḥ/
buddhiṃ smṛtiṃ cāpyupahatya cittaṃ pramohayan saṃjanayedvikāram//
chardiśca lālā ca balaṃ ca bhuṅkte nakhādiśauklyaṃ ca kaphātmakasya//
Ca.6.9.15 yaḥ sannipātaprabhavo+atighoraḥ sarvaiḥ samastaiḥ sa ca hetubhiḥ syāt/
Ca.6.9.18 adūṣayantaḥ puruṣasya dehaṃ devādayaḥ svaistu guṇaprabhāvaiḥ/
Ca.6.9.19 āghātakālo hi sa pūrvarūpaḥ prokto nidāne+atha surādibhiśca/
unmādarūpāṇi pṛthaṅnibodha kālaṃ ca gamyān puruṣāṃśca teṣām//

div.p: Ca.6.9.20 tadyathā---saumyadṛṣṭiṃ gambhīramadhṛṣyamakopanamasvapnabhojanābhilāṣiṇamalpasvedamūtrapurīṣa-&vātaṃ śubhagandhaṃ phullapadmavadanamiti devonmattaṃ vidyāt; guruvṛddhasiddharṣīṇāmabhiśāpābhicārābhidhyānānurūpaceṣṭāhāravyāhāraṃ tairunmattaṃ vidyāt; aprasannadṛṣṭimapaśyantaṃ vidrāluṃ pratihatavācamanannābhilāṣamarocakāvipākaparītaṃ ca pitṛbhirunmattaṃ vidyāt; (&caṇḍaṃ sāhasikaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ gambhīramadhṛṣyaṃ) mukhavādyanṛtyagītānnapānasnānamālyadhūpagandharatiṃ raktavastrabalikarmahāsyakathānuyogapriyaṃ śubhagandhaṃ ca gandharvonmattaṃ vidyāt; asakṛtsvapna-&rodanahāsyaṃ nṛtyagītavādyapāṭhakathānnapānasnānamālyadhūpagandharatiṃ raktaviplutākṣaṃ dvijātivaidyaparivādinaṃ rahasyabhāṣiṇaṃ ca yakṣonmattaṃ vidyāt; naṣṭanidramannapānadviṣiṇamanāhāramapyatibalinaṃ śastraśoṇitamāṃsaraktamālyābhilāṣiṇaṃ saṃtarjakaṃ ca rākṣasonmattaṃ vidyāt; prahāsanṛtyapradhānaṃ devavipravaidyadveṣāvajñābhiḥ stutivedamantraśāstrodāharaṇaiḥ kāṣṭhādibhirātmapīḍanena ca brahmarākṣasonmattaṃ vidyāt; asvasthacittaṃ sthānamalabhamānaṃ nṛtyagītahāsinaṃ baddhābaddhapralāpinaṃ saṃkarakūṭamalinarathyācelatṛṇāśmakāṣṭhādhirohaṇaratiṃ &bhinnarūkṣasvaraṃ nagnaṃ vidhāvantaṃ naikatra tiṣṭhantaṃ duḥkhānyāvedayantaṃ naṣṭasmṛtiṃ ca piśāconmattaṃ vidyāt//

Ca.6.9.21 tatra caukṣācāraṃ tapaḥsvādhyāyakovidaṃ naraṃ prāyaḥ śuklapratipadi trayodaśyāṃ ca &chidramavekṣyābhidharṣayantidevāḥ, snānaśuciviviktasevinaṃ dharmaśāstraśrutivākyakuśalaṃ prāyaḥ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ navamyāṃ carṣayaḥ, mātṛpitṛguruvṛddhasiddhācāryopasevinaṃ prāyo daśamyāmamāvasyāyāṃ ca pitaraḥ, gandharvāḥ stutigītavāditraratiṃ paradāragandhamālyapriyaṃ caukṣācāraṃ prāyo dvādaśyāṃ caturdaśyāṃ ca, sattvabalarūpagarvaśauryayuktaṃ mālyānulepanahāsyapriyam-&ativākkaraṇaṃ prāyaḥ śuklaikādaśyāṃ saptamyāṃ ca yakṣāḥ, svādhyāyataponiyamopavāsabrahmacaryadevayatigurupūjā+aratiṃ bhraṣṭaśaucaṃ brāhmaṇamabrāhmaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇavādinaṃ śūramāninaṃ devāgārasalilakrīḍanaratiṃ prāyaḥ śuklapañcamyāṃ pūrṇacandradarśane ca brahmarākṣasāḥ, rakṣaḥpiśācāstu hīnasattvaṃ piśunaṃ &straiṇaṃ lubdhaṃ śaṭhaṃ &prāyo dvitīyātṛtīyāṣṭamīṣu; ityaparisaṃkhyeyānāṃ grahāṇāmāviṣkṛtatamā hyaṣṭāvetevyākhyātāḥ//

Ca.6.9.22 sarveṣvapi tu khaveṣu yo hastāvudyamya roṣasaṃrambhānniḥśaṅkamanyeṣvātmani vā nipātayet sa hyasādhyo jñeyaḥ; tathā yaḥ sāśrunetro miḍhrapravṛttaraktaḥ kṣatajihvaḥ prasrutanāsikaśchidyamānacarmā+apratihanyamānavāṇiḥ satataṃ vikūjan &durvarṇastṛṣārtaḥ pūtigandhaśca sa hiṃsārthinonmatto jñeyaḥ; taṃ parivarjayet//
Ca.6.9.23 ratyarcanākāmonmādinau tu bhiṣag-&abhiprāyācārābhyāṃ buddhvā tadaṅgopahārabalimiśreṇa/
mantrabhaiṣajyavidhinopakramet//
Ca.6.9.24 tatra dvayorapi nijāgantunimittayorunmādayoḥ samāsavistarābhyāṃ bheṣajavidhimanuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.9.25 unmāde vātaje pūrvaṃ snehapānaṃ viśeṣavit/
Ca.6.9.27 nirūhaṃ snehabastiṃ ca śirasaśca virecanam/
Ca.6.9.30 yaḥ &sakto+avinaye paṭṭaiḥ saṃyamya sudṛḍhaiḥ sukhaiḥ/
Ca.6.9.31 tarjanaṃ trāsanaṃ dānaṃ harṣaṇaṃ sāntvanaṃ bhayam/
sthirā nataṃ rajanyau dve sārive dve priyaṅgukā//
Ca.6.9.37 viḍaṅgaṃ pṛśniparṇī ca kuṣṭhaṃ candanapadmakau/
apasmāre jvare kāse śoṣe mande+anale kṣaye//
Ca.6.9.41 śastaṃ strīṇāṃ ca vandhyānāṃ dhanyamāyurbalapradam/
Ca.6.9.42 kalyāṇakamidaṃ sarpiḥ śreṣṭhaṃ puṃsavaneṣu ca/
Ca.6.9.43 rase tasmin pacet sarpirgṛṣṭikṣīre caturguṇe/
Ca.6.9.44 medayā ca samaiḥ kalkaistat syāt kalyāṇakaṃ mahat/
Ca.6.9.45 jaṭilāṃ pūtanāṃ keśīṃ cāraṭīṃ markaṭīṃ vacām/
Ca.6.9.47 kaṭambharāṃ vṛścikālīṃ sthirāṃ cāhṛtya tairghṛtam/
Ca.6.9.50 purāṇasarpiṣaḥ prastha ebhiḥ siddhaṃ prayojayet/
Ca.6.9.53 pādaśeṣe ghṛtaprasthaṃ laśunasya rasaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.9.59 viśeṣataḥ purāṇaṃ ca ghṛtaṃ taṃ pāyayedbhiṣak/
Ca.6.9.62 nāsādhyaṃ nāma tasyāsti yat syādvarṣaśatasthitam/
śirīṣo madhukaṃ hiṅguṃ laśunaṃ tagaraṃ vacā//
Ca.6.9.65 kuṣṭhaṃ ca bastamūtreṇa piṣṭaṃ syānnāvanāñjanam/
siddhārthako vacā hiṅgu karañjo devadāru ca//
Ca.6.9.70 mañjiṣṭhā triphalā śvetā kaṭanbhītvak kaṭutrikam/
bhūtebhyaśca bhayaṃ hanti rājadvāre ca śasyate//
Ca.6.9.73 sarpiretena siddhaṃ vā sagomūtraṃ tadarthakṛt/
sekāñjanaṃ pradhamanaṃ nasyaṃ dhūmaṃ ca kārayet//
Ca.6.9.76 vātaśleṣmātmake prāyaḥ paittike tu praśasyate/
tiktakaṃ jīvanīyaṃ ca sarpiḥ snehaśca miśrakaḥ//
janmāde viṣame caiva jvare+apasmāra eva ca//
Ca.6.9.78 ghṛtamāṃsavitṛptaṃ vā nivāte sthāpayet sukham/
Ca.6.9.81 kaśābhistāḍayitvā vā subaddhaṃ vijane gṛhe/
rundhyācceto hi vibhrāntaṃ vrajatyasya tathā śamam//
Ca.6.9.84 dehaduḥkhabhayebhyo hi paraṃ prāṇabhayaṃ smṛtam/
tena yāti śamaṃ tasya sarvato viplutaṃ manaḥ//
Ca.6.9.87 buddhvā deśaṃ vayaḥ sātmyaṃ doṣaṃ kālaṃ balābale/
Ca.6.9.92 rudrasya pramathā nāma gaṇā loke caranti ye/
teṣāṃ pūjāṃ ca kurvāṇa unmādebhyaḥ pramucyate//
Ca.6.9.94 devagobrāhmaṇānāṃ ca gurūṇāṃ pūjanena ca/
Ca.6.9.96 nivṛttāmiṣamadyo yo hitāśī prayataḥ śuciḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.9.98 tatra ślokaḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalapūrite cikitsāsthāne unmādacikitsitaṃ nāma navamo+adhyāyaḥ//9//

div.head: daśamo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.10.1 athāto+apasmāracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.10.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.10.6 dhamanībhiḥ śritā doṣā hṛdayaṃ pīḍayanti hi/
jihvākṣibhrūḥ sravallālo hastau pādau ca vikṣipan//
Ca.6.10.8 doṣavege ca vigate suptavat pratibuddhyate/
apasmāraḥ sa cāsādhyo yaḥ kṣīṇasyānavaśca yaḥ//
Ca.6.10.13 pakṣādvā dvādaśāhādvā māsādvā kupitā malāḥ/
Ca.6.10.15 vātikaṃ bastibhūyiṣṭhaiḥ paittaṃ prāyo virecanaiḥ/
Ca.6.10.18 dve pañcamūlyau triphalā rajanyau kuṭajatvacam/
Ca.6.10.19 śampākaṃ phalgumūlaṃ ca pauṣkaraṃ sadurālabham/
Ca.6.10.20 bhāgīṃ pāṭhāṃ trikaṭukaṃ trivṛtāṃ viculāni ca/
Ca.6.10.21 dve sārive rohiṣaṃ ca bhūtīkaṃ madayantikām/
Ca.6.10.24 śasyate ghṛtametattu prayoktavyaṃ dine dine/
Ca.6.10.26 ghṛtaṃ saindhavahiṅgubhyāṃ vārṣe baste caturguṇe/
Ca.6.10.32 abhyaṅgaḥ sārṣapaṃ tailaṃ bastamūtre caturguṇe/
Ca.6.10.41 kapilānāṃ gavāṃ &mūtraṃ nāvanaṃ paramaṃ hitam/
Ca.6.10.42 bhārgī vacā nāgadantī śvetā &śvetā viṣāṇikā/
Ca.6.10.43 yogāstrayo+ataḥ ṣaḍ bindūn pañca vā nāvayedbhiṣak/
Ca.6.10.45 pippalī vṛścikālī ca kuṣṭhaṃ ca lavaṇāni ca/
bhārgī ca cūrṇitaṃ kāryaṃ pradhamanaṃ param//
Ca.6.10.48 mustaṃ vayaḥsthāṃ triphalāṃ kāyasthāṃ hiṅgu śādvalam/
Ca.6.10.49 piṣṭvā kṛtvā ca tāṃ vartimapasmāre prayojayet/
kilāse ca tathonmāde jvareṣu viṣameṣu ca//
tadeva sarpiṣā yuktaṃ dhūpanaṃ paramaṃ matam//
srotāṃsi cāpi śudhyanti &tataḥ saṃjñāṃ sa vindati//
Ca.6.10.56 śuśrūṣave vacaḥ śrutvā śiṣyāyāha punarvasuḥ/
Ca.6.10.60 viṣamāṃ kurute buddhiṃ nityānitye hitāhite/
tat sevyaṃ śaṅkhapuṣpī ca yacca medhyaṃ rasāyanam//
rakṣedunmādinaṃ caiva sadyaḥ prāṇaharā hi te//

div.p: Ca.6.10.67 tatra ślokau---

lg.l: sāmānyataḥ pṛthaktvācca liṅgaṃ teṣāṃ ca bheṣajam//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne+apasmāracikitsitaṃ nāma daśamo+adhyāyaḥ//10//

div.head: ekādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.11.1 athātaḥ kṣatakṣīṇacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.11.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.11.5 vṛṣaṃ hayaṃ vā dhāvantaṃ damyaṃ vā+anyaṃ nigṛhṇataḥ/
Ca.6.11.6 adhīyānasya vā+atyuccairdūraṃ vā vrajato drutam/
mahānadīṃ vā tarato hayairvā saha dhāvataḥ//
Ca.6.11.9 uro virujyate tasya bhidyate+atha vibhajyate/
Ca.6.11.10 kramādvīryaṃ balaṃ varṇo ruciragniśca hīyate/
Ca.6.11.11 duṣṭaḥ śyāvaḥ sudurgandhaḥ pīto vigrathito bahuḥ/
Ca.6.11.12 sa kṣataḥ kṣīyate+atyarthaṃ tathā śukraujasoḥ kṣayāt/
Ca.6.11.14 alpaliṅgasya dīptāgneḥ sādhyo balavato navaḥ/
Ca.6.11.15 uro matvā kṣataṃ lākṣāṃ payasā madhusaṃyutām/
tvakkṣīrīṃ samitāṃ kṣīre paktvā dīptānalaḥ pibet//
śṛtaṃ payo madhuyutaṃ sandhānārthaṃ pibet kṣatī//
jvare dāhe sitākṣaudrasaktūn vā payasā pibet//
Ca.6.11.22 saṃcūrṇya madhunā yuktā guṭikāḥ saṃprakalpayet/
Ca.6.11.23 kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ jvaraṃ hikkāṃ chardiṃ mūrcchāṃ madaṃ bhramam/
guṭikā tarpaṇī vṛṣyā raktapittaṃ ca nāśayet//
Ca.6.11.25 rakte+ativṛtte dakṣāṇḍaṃ yūṣaistoyena vā pibet/
śṛtakṣīrānupānaṃ vā lihyāt kṣīṇaḥ kṣatī kṛśaḥ//
Ca.6.11.35 jīvakarṣabhakau vīrāṃ jīvantīṃ nāgaraṃ śaṭīm/
ṛddhiṃ parūṣakaṃ bhārgīṃ mṛdvīkāṃ bṛhatīṃ tathā//
Ca.6.11.37 śṛṅgāṭakaṃ tāmalakīṃ payasyāṃ pippalīṃ balām/
Ca.6.11.38 phalāni caivamādīni kalkān kurvīta kārṣikān/
Ca.6.11.39 kuryāt prasthonmitaṃ tena ghṛtaprasthaṃ vipācayet/
pippalyaṣṭapale kalke prasthaṃ siddhe ca śītale//
Ca.6.11.55 sarpirguḍān samadhvaṃśāñjagdhvā cānu payaḥ pibet/
Ca.6.11.56 balā vidārī hrasvā ca pañcamūlī punarnavā/
Ca.6.11.58 sitāpalāni pūte ca śīte dvātriṃśataṃ kṣipet/
Ca.6.11.59 samākṣikaṃ kauḍavikaṃ tat sarvaṃ khajamūrcchitam/
Ca.6.11.60 tāñjagdhvā palikān kṣīraṃ madyaṃ vā+anupibet kaphe/
Ca.6.11.61 raktaniṣṭhīvane tāpe pīnase corasi sthite/
Ca.6.11.65 yakṣmāṇaṃ tamakaṃ śvāsaṃ raktapittaṃ halīmakam/
śatāvarīṃ vidārīṃ ca samaṅgāṃ pippalīṃ tathā//
Ca.6.11.67 pṛthagdaśapalān bhāgān palānyaṣṭau ca nāgarāt/
kvathite tāni cūrṇāni dattvā bilvasamān guḍān//
Ca.6.11.69 kuryāttān bhakṣayet kṣīṇaḥ kṣataḥ śuṣkaśca mānavaḥ/
tena sadyo rasādīnāṃ vṛddhyā puṣṭiṃ sa vindati//
Ca.6.11.72 kuḍavārdhaṃ tugākṣīryāḥ kharjūrāṇāṃ ca viṃśatim/
Ca.6.11.73 triṃśatpalāni khaṇḍācca madhukāt karṣameva ca/
Ca.6.11.74 siddhe+asmin kuḍavaṃ kṣaudraṃ śīte kṣiptvā+atha modakān/
Ca.6.11.77 garbhārthinīnāṃ garbhaśca sravedyāsāṃ mriyeta vā/
saṃyuktaṃ vā śṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ pibet kāsajvarāpaham//
Ca.6.11.80 phalāmlaṃ sarpiṣā bhṛṣṭaṃ vidārīkṣurase śṛtam/
strīṣu kṣīṇaḥ pibedyūṣaṃ jīvanaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ param//
yakṣmiṇāṃ vihito grāhī bhinne śakṛti ceṣyate//
Ca.6.11.85 palikaṃ saindhavaṃ śuṇṭhī dve ca sauvarcalāt pale/
śarkarāyāḥ palānyatra daśa dve ca pradāpayet//
Ca.6.11.89 śuṇṭhyāḥ karṣaṃ dadhitthasya madhyāt pañca palāni ca/
Ca.6.11.93 yadyat saṃtarpaṇaṃ śītamavidāhi hitaṃ laghu/
Ca.6.11.94 yaccoktaṃ yakṣmiṇāṃ pathyaṃ kāsināṃ raktapittinām/
tacca kuryādavekṣyāgniṃ vyādhiṃ sātmyaṃ balaṃ tathā//

div.p: Ca.6.11.96 tatra ślokau---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre+aprāpte dṛḍhabalapūrite cikitsitasthāne kṣatakṣīṇacikitsitaṃ nāmaikādaśo+adhyāyaḥ//11//

div.head: dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.12.1 athātaḥ śvayathucikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.12.2 iti ha smāha bhāgavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.12.6 arśāṃsyaceṣṭā na ca dehaśuddhirmarmopaghāto viṣamā prasūtiḥ/
mithyopacāraḥ pratikarmaṇāṃ ca nijasya hetuḥ śvayathoḥ pradiṣṭaḥ//
Ca.6.12.8 bāhyāḥ sirāḥ prāpya yadā kaphāsṛkpittāni saṃdūṣayatīha vāyuḥ/
tairbaddhamārgaḥ sa tadā visarpannutsedhaliṅgaṃ śvayathuṃ karoti//
Ca.6.12.10 ūṣmā tathā syāddavathuḥ sirāṇāmāyāma ityeva ca pūrvarūpam/
praśāmyati pronnamati prapīḍito divābalī ca śvayathuḥ samīraṇāt//
sa kṛcchrajanmapraśamo nipīḍito na connamedrātribalī kaphātmakaḥ//
Ca.6.12.15 kṛśasya rogairabalasya yo bhavedupadravairvā vamipūrvakairyutaḥ/
sa hanti marmānugato+atha rājimān parisraveddhīnabalasya sarvagaḥ//
Ca.6.12.16 ahīnamāṃsasya ya ekadoṣajo navo balasthasya sukhaḥ sa sādhane/
Ca.6.12.18 upācaret snehabhavaṃ virūkṣaṇaiḥ prakalpayet snehavidhiṃ ca rūkṣaje/
vibaddhaviṭke+anilaje nirūhaṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ tu pittānilaje satiktakam//
Ca.6.12.19 payaśca mūrcchāratidāhatarṣite viśodhanīye tu samūtramiṣyate/
Ca.6.12.20 grāmyābjānūpaṃ piśitamabalaṃ śuṣkaśākaṃ navānnaṃ gauḍaṃ piṣṭānnaṃ dadhi &tilakṛtaṃ &vijjalaṃ madyamamlam/
dhānā vallūraṃ samaśanamatho gurvasātmyaṃ vidāhi svapnaṃ cārātrau śvayathugadavān varjayenmaithunaṃ ca//
Ca.6.12.21 vyoṣaṃ trivṛttiktakarohiṇī ca sāyorajaskā triphalārasena/
pītaṃ kaphotthaṃ śamayettu śophaṃ gavyena mūtreṇa harītakī ca//
sarvaṃ pibettriṣvapi mūtrayuktaṃ snātaśca jīrṇe payasā+annamadyāt//
mayūrakaṃ māgadhikāṃ samūlāṃ sanāgarāṃ vā prapibet savāte//
Ca.6.12.24 dantītrivṛttryūṣaṇacitrakairvā payaḥ śṛtaṃ doṣaharaṃ pibennā/
Ca.6.12.26 saptāhamauṣṭraṃ tvathavā+api māsaṃ payaḥ pibedbhojanavārivarjī/
gavyaṃ samūtraṃ mahiṣīpayo vā kṣīrāśano mūtramatho gavāṃ vā//
Ca.6.12.27 takraṃ pibedvā gurubhinnavarcāḥ savyoṣasauvarcalamākṣikaṃ ca/
Ca.6.12.29 gaṇḍīrabhallātakacitrakāṃśca vyoṣaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ bṛhatīdvayaṃ ca/
Ca.6.12.30 tribhāgaśeṣaṃ ca supūtaśītaṃ droṇena tat prākṛtamastunā ca/
sitopalāyāśca śatena yuktaṃ lipte ghaṭe citrakapippalīnām//
śataṃ śataṃ &jīrṇaguḍāttulāṃ ca saṃkṣudya kumbhe madhunā pralipte//
Ca.6.12.33 saptāhamuṣṇe dviguṇaṃ tu śīte sthitaṃ jaladroṇayutaṃ pibennā/
Ca.6.12.34 punarnave dve ca bale sapāṭhe &dantīṃ guḍūcīmatha citrakaṃ ca/
nidigdhikāṃ ca triphalāni paktvā droṇāvaśeṣe salile tatastam//
Ca.6.12.35 pūtvā rasaṃ dve ca guḍāt purāṇāttule madhuprasthayutaṃ suśītam/
māsaṃ nidadhyādghṛtabhājanasthaṃ palle yavānāṃ paratastu māsāt//
gandhānvitaṃ kṣaudraghṛtapradigdhe jīrṇe pibed vyādhibalaṃ samīkṣya//
Ca.6.12.38 śākhānilaṃ baddhapurīṣatāṃ ca hikkāṃ kilāsaṃ ca halīmakaṃ ca/
Ca.6.12.39 phalatrikaṃ dīpyakacitrakau ca sapippalīloharajo viḍaṅgam/
cūrṇīkṛtaṃ kauḍavikaṃ dviraṃśaṃ kṣaudraṃ purāṇasya tulāṃ guḍasya//
Ca.6.12.40 māsaṃ nidadhyādghṛtabhājanasthaṃ yaveṣu tāneva nihanti rogān/
ye cārśasāṃ paṇḍuvikāriṇāṃ ca proktā hitāḥ śophiṣu te+apyariṣṭāḥ//
Ca.6.12.41 kṛṣṇā sapāṭhā gajapippalī ca nidigdhikā citrakanāgare ca/
Ca.6.12.42 hanyāttridoṣaṃ cirajaṃ ca śophaṃ kalkaśca bhūnimbamahauṣadhasya/
Ca.6.12.43 kṣāradvayaṃ syāllavaṇāni catvāryayorajo vyoṣaphalatrike ca/
styānaṃ tataḥ kolasamāṃ tu mātrāṃ kṛtvā suśuṣkāṃ vidhinopayuñjyāt//
mātrā paraṃ pañcapalāni māsaṃ jīrṇe payo yūṣarasāśca bhaktam//
sakāmalāśoṣamanovikārān kāsaṃ kaphaṃ caiva jayet prayogaḥ//
Ca.6.12.50 dvipañcamūlasya pacet kaṣāye kaṃse+abhayānāṃ ca śataṃ guḍasya/
lehe susiddhe+atha vinīya cūrṇaṃ vyoṣaṃ trisaugandhyamuṣāsthite ca//
Ca.6.12.51 prasthārdhamātraṃ madhunaḥ suśīte kiṃcicca cūrṇādapi yavaśūkāt/
ekābhayāṃ prāśya tataśca lehācchuktiṃ nihanti śvayathuṃ pravṛddham//
yaṣṭyāhvayaṃ tiktakarohiṇī ca sacandanā syānniculāni dārvī//
Ca.6.12.54 karṣonmitaistaiḥ kvathitaḥ kaṣāyo ghṛtena peyaḥ kuḍavena yuktaḥ/
Ca.6.12.56 piṣṭvā+akṣamātrāṇi jalāḍhakena paktvā ghṛtaprasthamatha prayuñjyāt/arśāṃsi gulmaṃ śvayathuṃ ca kṛcchraṃ nihanti vahniṃ ca karoti dīptam//
kalyāṇakaṃ vā+api sapañcagavyaṃ tiktaṃ mahadvā+apyatha tiktakaṃ vā//
Ca.6.12.58 kṣīraṃ ghaṭe citrakakalkalipte dadhyāgataṃ sādhu vimathya tena/
tajjaṃ ghṛtaṃ citrakamūlagarbhaṃ takreṇa siddhaṃ śvayathughnamagryam//
takreṇa cādyāt saghṛtena tena bhojyāni siddhāmathavā yavāgūm//
yā &pañcakolairvidhinaiva tena siddhā bhavet sā ca samā tathaiva//
śākārthināṃ śākamiti praśastaṃ bhojye purāṇaśca yavaḥ saśāliḥ//
snehān pradehān pariṣecanāni svedāṃśca vātaprabalasya kuryāt//
vātānvite+abhyaṅgamuśanti tailaṃ siddhaṃ supiṣṭairapi ca pradeham//
Ca.6.12.68 savetasāḥ kṣīravatāṃ drumāṇāṃ tvacaḥ samañjiṣṭhalatāmṛṇālāḥ/
sacandanāḥ padmakavālakau ca paitte pradehastu satailapākaḥ//
Ca.6.12.69 āktasya tenāmbu raviprataptaṃ sacandanaṃ sābhayapadmakaṃ ca/
snāne hitaṃ kṣīravatāṃ kaṣāyaḥ kṣīrodakaṃ candanalepanaṃ ca//
Ca.6.12.71 bibhītakānāṃ phalamadhyalepaḥ sarveṣu dāhārtiharaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ/
nimbārjakau vyāghranakhaḥ sadūrvā suvarcalā tiktakarohiṇī ca//
Ca.6.12.73 sakākamācī bṛhatī sakuṣṭhā punarnavā citrakanāgare ca/
Ca.6.12.74 śophāstu gātrāvayavāśritā ye te sthānadūṣyākṛtināmabhedāt/
Ca.6.12.75 doṣāstrayaḥ svaiḥ kupitā nidānaiḥ kurvanti śophaṃ śirasaḥ sughoram/
Ca.6.12.76 galasya sandhau cibuke gale ca sadāharāgaḥ &śvasanāsu cograḥ/
Ca.6.12.78 yo dantamāṃseṣu tu raktapittāt pāko bhavet sopakuśaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ/
Ca.6.12.79 galasya pārśve galagaṇḍa ekaḥ syādgaṇḍamālā bahubhistu gaṇḍaiḥ/
Ca.6.12.80 teṣāṃ sirākāyaśirovirekā dhūmaḥ purāṇasya ghṛtasya pānam/
syāllaṅghanaṃ vaktrabhaveṣu cāpi pragharṣaṇaṃ syāt kavalagrahaśca//
Ca.6.12.81 aṅgaikadeśeṣvanilādibhiḥ syāt svarūpadhārī sphuraṇaḥ sirābhiḥ/
vipāṭya coddhṛtya bhiṣak sakośaṃ śastreṇa dagdhvā vraṇavaccikitset//
Ca.6.12.83 adagdha īṣat pariśeṣitaśca prayāti bhūyo+api śanairvivṛddhim/
Ca.6.12.84 śeṣe kṛte pākavaśena śīryāttataḥ kṣatotthaḥ prasaredvisarpaḥ/
tataḥ krameṇāsya yathāvidhānaṃ vraṇaṃ vraṇajñastvarayā cikitset//
Ca.6.12.86 vivarjayet kukṣyudarāśritaṃ ca tathā gale marmaṇi saṃśritaṃ ca/
Ca.6.12.88 tāmrā &saśūlā piḍakā bhavedyā sā cālajī nāma parisrutāgrā/
Ca.6.12.89 jvarānvitā vaṅkṣaṇakakṣajā yā vartirnirartiḥ kaṭhināyatā ca/
vidārikā sā kaphamārutābhyāṃ teṣāṃ yathādoṣamupakramaḥ syāt//
Ca.6.12.90 visrāvaṇaṃ piṇḍikayopanāhaḥ pakveṣu caiva vraṇavaccikitsā/
yaścāparāḥ syuḥ piḍakāḥ prakīrṇāḥ sthūlāṇumadhyā api pittajāstāḥ//
Ca.6.12.92 kṣudrapramāṇāḥ piḍakāḥ śarīre sarvāṅgagāḥ sajvaradāhatṛṣṇāḥ/
Ca.6.12.93 yāḥ sarvagātreṣu masūramātrā masūrikāḥ pittakaphāt pradiṣṭāḥ/
vīsarpaśāntyai vihitā kriyā yā tāṃ &teṣu kuṣṭhe ca hitāṃ vidadhyāt//
mūtreṇa pūrṇaṃ mṛdu medasā cet snigdhaṃ ca vidyāt kaṭhinaṃ ca śotham//
gudasya pārśve piḍakā bhṛśārtiḥ pakvaprabhinnā tu bhagandaraḥ syāt//
Ca.6.12.97 virecanaṃ caiṣaṇapāṭanaṃ ca viśuddhamārgasya ca tailadāhaḥ/
Ca.6.12.99 mandāstu pittaprabalāḥ praduṣṭā doṣāḥ sutīvraṃ tanuraktapākam/
Ca.6.12.100 vilaṅghanaṃ raktavimokṣaṇaṃ ca virūkṣaṇaṃ kāyaviśodhanaṃ ca/
dhātrīprayogāñ śiśirān pradehān kuryāt sadā jālakagardabhasya//
Ca.6.12.102 prāyo+abhighātādanilaḥ saraktaḥ śothaṃ sarāgaṃ prakaroti tatra/
vīsarpanunmārutaraktanucca kāryaṃ viṣaghnaṃ viṣaje ca karma//

div.p: Ca.6.12-103 tatra ślokaḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne śvayathucikitsitaṃ nāma dvādaśo+adhyāyaḥ//12//

div.head: trayodaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.13.1 athāta udaracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.13.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.13.15 atisaṃcitadoṣāṇāṃ pāpaṃ karma ca kurvatām/
bhuktaṃ vidahyate sarvaṃ jīrṇājīrṇaṃ na vetti ca//
Ca.6.13.20 ruddhvā svedāmbuvāhīni doṣāḥ srotāṃsi saṃcitāḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.13.25 tasya rūpāṇi---kukṣipāṇipādavṛṣaṇaśvayathuḥ, udaravipāṭanam, aniyatau ca vṛddhihrāsau, kukṣipārśvaśūlodāvartāṅgamardaparvabhedaśuṣkakāsakārśyadaurbalyārocakāvipākāḥ, adhogurutvaṃ, vātavarcomūtrasaṅgaḥ, śyāvāruṇatvaṃ ca nakhanayanavadanatvaṅmūtravarcasām, api codaraṃ tanvasitarājīsirāsaṃtatam, āhatamādhmātadṛtiśabdavadbhavati, vāyuścordhvamadhastiryak ca saśūlaśabdaścarati, etadvātodaramiti vidyāt//

Ca.6.13.28 tasya rūpāṇi---dāhajvaratṛṣṇāmūrcchātīsārabhramāḥ, kaṭukāsyatvaṃ, &haritaharidratvaṃ ca nakhanayanavadanatvaṅmūtravarcasām, api codaraṃ nīlapītahāridraharitatāmrarājīsirāvanaddhaṃ, dahyate, dūyate, dhūpyate, ūṣmāyate, svidyate, klidyate, mṛdusparśaṃ kṣiprapākaṃ ca bhavati; etat pittodaramiti vidyāt//

Ca.6.13.31 tasya rūpāṇi---gauravārocakāvipākāṅgamardāḥ, suptiḥ, pāṇipādamuṣkoruśophaḥ, utkleśanidrākāsaśvāsāḥ, śuklatvaṃ ca nakhanayanavadanatvaṅmūtravarcasām; api codaraṃ śuklarājīsirāsaṃtataṃ, guru, stimitaṃ, sthiraṃ, kaṭhinaṃ ca bhavati; etacchleṣmodaramiti vidyāt//

lg.l: Ca.6.13.33 viṣaiśca mandairvātādyāḥ kupitāḥ saṃcayaṃ trayaḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.13.34 tasya rūpāṇi---sarveṣāmeva doṣāṇāṃ samastāni liṅgānyupalabhyante, varṇāśca sarve nakhādiṣu, udaramapi nānāvarṇarājīsirāsaṃtataṃ bhavati; etat sannipātodaramiti vidyāt//

lg.l: Ca.6.13.36 vāmapārśvāśritaḥ plīhā cyutaḥ sthānāt pravardhate/
śoṇitaṃ vā rasādibhyo vivṛddhaṃ taṃ vivardhayet//

div.p: Ca.6.13.37 tasya plīhā kaṭhino+&aṣṭhīlevādau vardhamānaḥ kacchapasaṃsthāna upalabhyate; sa copekṣitaḥ krameṇa kukṣiṃ jaṭharamagnyadhiṣṭhānaṃ ca parikṣipannudaramabhinirvartayati//

Ca.6.13.38 tasya rūpāṇi---daurbalyārocakāvipākavarcomūtragrahatamaḥpraveśapipāsāṅgamardacchardimūrcchāṅgasādakāsaśvāsamṛdujvarānāhāgnināśakārśyāsyavairasyaparvabhedakoṣṭhavātaśūlāni, api codaramaruṇavarṇaṃ vivarṇaṃ vā nīlaharitahāridrarājimadbhavati; evameva yakṛdapi dakṣiṇapārśvasthaṃ kuryāt, tulyahetuliṅgauṣadhatvāttasya plīhajaṭhara evāvarodha iti; etat plīhodaramiti vidyāt//

Ca.6.13.41 tasya rūpāṇi---tṛṣṇādāhajvaramukhatāluśoṣorusādakāsaśvāsadaurbalyārocakāvipākavarcomūtrasaṅgādhmānacchardikṣavathuśirohṛnnābhigudaśūlāni, api codaraṃ mūṭhavātaṃ sthiramaruṇaṃ nīlarāji sirāvanaddharājikaṃ vā prāyo nābhyupari gopucchavadabhinirvartata iti; etadbaddhagudodaramiti vidyāt//

Ca.6.13.44 tasya rūpāṇi---tadadho nābhyāḥ prāyo+abhivardhamānamudakodaraṃ bhavati, yathābalaṃ ca doṣāṇāṃ rūpāṇi darśayati, api cāturaḥ salohitanīlapītapicchilakuṇapagandhyāmavarca upaveśate, hikkāśvāsakāsatṛṣṇāpramehārocakāvipākadaurbalyaparītaśca bhavati; etacchidrodaramiti vidyāt//
Ca.6.13.47 tasya rūpāṇi---anannakāṅkṣāpipāsāgudasrāvaśūlaśvāsakāsadaurbalyāni, api codaraṃ nānāvarṇarājisirāsaṃtatamudakapūrṇadṛtikṣobhasaṃsparśaṃ bhavati, etadudakodaramiti vidyāt//

Ca.6.13.48 tatra acirotpannamanupadravamanudakamaprāptamudaraṃ tvaramāṇaścikitset; upekṣitānāṃ hyeṣāṃ doṣāḥ svasthānādapavṛttā paripākāddravībhūtāḥ sandhīn srotāṃsi copakledayanti, svedaśca bāhyeṣu srotaḥsu pratihatagatistaryagavatiṣṭhamānastadevodakamāpyāyayati; tatra piccotpattau maṇḍalamudaraṃ guru stimitamākoṭhitamaśabdaṃ mṛdusparśamapagatarājīkamākrāntaṃ nābhyāmevopasarpati/
tato+anantaramudakaprādurbhāvaḥ/
tasya rūpāṇi---kukṣeratimātravṛddhiḥ, sirāntardhanagamanam, udakapūrṇadṛtisaṃkṣobhasaṃsparśatvaṃ ca//
Ca.6.13.50 bhavanti cātra---

lg.l: Ca.6.13.51 pakṣādbaddhagudaṃ tūrdhvaṃ sarvaṃ jātodakaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.13.53 śvayathuḥ sarvamarmotthaḥ śvāso hikkā+aruciḥ satṛṭ/
Ca.6.13.54 janmanaivodaraṃ sarvaṃ prāyaḥ kṛcchratamaṃ matam/
Ca.6.13.56 nābhiṃ viṣṭabhya &pāyau tu vegaṃ kṛtvā praṇaśyati/
Ca.6.13.57 karkaśaṃ sṛjayo vātaṃ nātimande ca pāvake/
Ca.6.13.62 śuddhaṃ saṃsṛjya ca kṣīraṃ balārthaṃ pāyayettu tam/
prāgutkleśānnivartyaṃ ca bale labdhe kramāt payaḥ//
Ca.6.13.66 avirecyaṃ tu yaṃ vidyāddurbalaṃ sthaviraṃ śiśum/
Ca.6.13.68 pittodare tu balinaṃ pūrvameva virenayet/
Ca.6.13.71 punaḥ kṣīraprayogaṃ ca bastikarma virecanam/
Ca.6.13.72 snigdhaṃ svinnaṃ viśuddhaṃ tu kaphodariṇamāturam/
Ca.6.13.74 sannipātodare sarvā yathoktāḥ kārayet kriyāḥ/
Ca.6.13.76 liṅgaiḥ &plīhnyadhikān dṛṣṭvā raktaṃ cāpi svalakṣaṇaiḥ/
Ca.6.13.77 snehaṃ svedaṃ virekaṃ ca nirūhamanuvāsanam/
samīkṣya kārayedbāhau vāne vā vyadhayet sirām//
Ca.6.13.78 ṣaṭpalaṃ pāyayet sarpiḥ pippalīrvā prayojayet/
Ca.6.13.79 eṣa kriyākramaḥ prokto yogān saṃśamanāñchṛṇu/
viḍaṅgaṃ citrakaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ saghṛtāṃ saindhavaṃ vacām//
Ca.6.13.81 dagdhvā kapāle payasā gulmaplīhāpahaṃ pibet/
Ca.6.13.82 mūtre vā sunuyāttacca saptarātrasthitaṃ pibet/
Ca.6.13.89 laghūnyannāni saṃsṛjya dadyāt plīhodare bhiṣak/
Ca.6.13.91 udāvartaharaṃ karma kāryaṃ vātaghnameva ca/
Ca.6.13.92 jātaṃ jātaṃ jalaṃ srāvyamevaṃ tadyāpayedbhiṣak/
Ca.6.13.97 tasmādbhojyāni bhojyāni dīpanāni laghūni ca/
Ca.6.13.101 nādyādannāni jaṭharī toyapānaṃ ca varjayet/
Ca.6.13.105 yuktaṃ plīhodarī jātaṃ savyoṣaṃ tūdakodarī/
Ca.6.13.108 śuddhānāṃ kṣāmadehānāṃ gavyaṃ chāgaṃ samāhiṣam/
Ca.6.13.111 mūtraṇyaṣṭāvudariṇāṃ seke pāne ca yojayet/
caturguṇe jale mūtre dviguṇe citrakāt pale//
Ca.6.13.117 kalke siddhaṃ ghṛtaprasthaṃ sakṣāraṃ jaṭharī pibet/
Ca.6.13.118 surāsauvīrakābhyāṃ ca siddhaṃ vā+api pibedghṛtam/
ebhiḥ snigdhāya saṃjāte bale śānte ca mārute//
Ca.6.13.119 sraste doṣāśaye dadyāt kalpadiṣṭaṃ virecanam/
Ca.6.13.120 kampillakaṃ nīlinīṃ ca trivṛtāṃ ceti cūrṇayet/
Ca.6.13.121 kṛtvā cūrṇamato muṣṭiṃ gavāṃ mūtreṇa nā pibet/
virikto mṛdu bhuñjīta bhojanaṃ jāṅgalai rasaiḥ//
Ca.6.13.122 maṇḍaṃ peyāṃ ca pītvā nā savyoṣaṃ ṣaḍahaṃ payaḥ/
gavākṣīṃ śaṅkhinīṃ dantīṃ tilvakasya tvacaṃ vacām//
Ca.6.13.127 dvau kṣārau puṣkaraṃ mūlaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ lavaṇapañcakam/
viḍaṅgaṃ ca samāṃśāni dantyā bhāgatrayaṃ tathā//
Ca.6.13.132 hṛdroge grahaṇīdoṣe kuṣṭhe mande+anale jvare/
Ca.6.13.134 nīlinīṃ trāyamāṇāṃ ca sātalāṃ trivṛtāṃ vacām/
Ca.6.13.136 śvitre kuṣṭhe sarujake savāte viṣamāgniṣu/
Ca.6.13.137 vātaṃ pittaṃ kaphaṃ cāśu virekāt saṃprasādhayet/
nīlinīṃ niculaṃ vyoṣaṃ dvau kṣārau lavaṇāni ca//
Ca.6.13.139 jātaṃ vimathya tadyuktyā trivṛtsiddhaṃ pibedghṛtam/
Ca.6.13.142 eṣāṃ cānu pibet peyāṃ payo vā svādu vā rasam/
ghṛte jīrṇe viriktastu koṣṇaṃ nāgarakaiḥ śṛtam//
Ca.6.13.143 pibedambu tataḥ peyāṃ yūṣaṃ kaulatthakaṃ tataḥ/
Ca.6.13.144 punaḥ punaḥ pibet sarpirānupūrvyā tayaiva ca/
Ca.6.13.146 gulmaghnaṃ nīlinīsarpiḥ snehaṃ vā miśrakaṃ pibet/
viḍaṅgaṃ citrakaṃ dantī cavyaṃ vyoṣaṃ ca taiḥ payaḥ//
Ca.6.13.149 kalkaiḥ kolasamaiḥ pītvā pravṛddhamudaraṃ jayet/
saptāhaṃ māhiṣaṃ mūtraṃ kṣīraṃ cānannabhuk pibet//
Ca.6.13.154 tailaṃ rasena tenaiva siddhaṃ daśaguṇena vā/
śleṣmaṇo vilayārthaṃ tu doṣaṃ vīkṣya bhiṣagvaraḥ//
kuṣṭhaṃ mustaṃ tathā pañca lavaṇāni prakalpya ca//
Ca.6.13.163 kārṣikaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ pañcaiva lavaṇāni ca/
pippalīṃ citrakaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ triphalāṃ trivṛtāṃ vacām//
Ca.6.13.164 dvau kṣārau sātalāṃ dantīṃ svarṇakṣīrīṃ viṣāṇikām/
Ca.6.13.165 śvayathāvavipāke ca pravṛddhe ca dakodare/
bhāvitānāṃ gavāṃ mūtre ṣaṣṭikānāṃ tu taṇḍulaiḥ//
Ca.6.13.166 yavāgūṃ payasā siddhāṃ prakāmaṃ bhojayennaram/
Ca.6.13.167 svaṃ svaṃ sthānaṃ vrajantyevaṃ tathā pittakaphānilāḥ/
Ca.6.13.170 janayedyasya taṃ tailaṃ bilvakṣāreṇa pāyayet/
Ca.6.13.176 jñātīna sasuhṛdo dārān brāhmaṇānnṛpatīn gurūn/
anujñāpya bhiṣak karma vidadhyāt saṃśayaṃ bruvan//
Ca.6.13.177 akriyāyāṃ dhruvo mṛtyuḥ kriyāyāṃ saṃśayo bhavet/
yasmin vā kupitaḥ sarpo visṛjeddhi phale viṣam//
Ca.6.13.181 pāyayeta bhiṣagdugdhaṃ yavāgūṃ vā yathābalam/
Ca.6.13.183 māsamekaṃ tataścaiva tṛṣitaḥ svarasaṃ pibet/
evaṃ vinirhṛte doṣe śākairmāsāt paraṃ tataḥ//
Ca.6.13.184 durbalāya prayuñjīta prāṇabhṛt kārabhaṃ payaḥ/
Ca.6.13.188 bahuśaḥ saṃgṛhītāni jñātvā cchitvā pipīlikān/
Ca.6.13.192 trīn māsān payasā peyāṃ pibettrīṃścāpi bhojayet/
Ca.6.13.193 naraḥ saṃvatsareṇaivaṃ jayet prāptaṃ jalodaram/

div.p: Ca.6.13.195 tatra ślokau---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre+aprāpte dṛḍhabalapūrite cikitsāsthāne udaracikitsitaṃ nāma trayodaśo+adhyāyaḥ//13//

div.head: caturdaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.14.1 athāto+arśaścikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.14.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.14.4 prakopahetuṃ saṃsthānaṃ sthānaṃ liṅgaṃ cikitsitam/

div.p: Ca.6.14.5 iha khalvagniveśa ! dvividhānyarśāṃsi---kānicit sahajāni, kānicijjātasyottarakālajāni/
tatra bījaṃ gudavalibījopataptamāyatanamarśasāṃ sahajānām/
tatra dvividho bījopataptau hetuḥ---mātāpitrorapacāraḥ, pūrvakṛtaṃ ca karma; tathā+anyeṣāmapi sahajānāṃ vikārāṇām/
tatra sahajāni saha jātāni śarīreṇa, arśāṃsītyadhimāṃsavikārāḥ//

Ca.6.14.6 sarveṣāṃ cārśasāṃ kṣetraṃ---gudasyārdhapañcamāṅgulāvakāśe tribhāgāntarāstisro gudavalayaḥ kṣetramiti; kecittu bhūyāṃsameva deśamupadiśantyarśasāṃ---śiśnamapatyapathaṃ galatālumukhanāsikākarṇākṣivartmāni tvak ceti/
tadastyadhimāṃsadeśatayā, &gudavalijānāṃ tvarśāṃsīti saṃjñā tantre+asmin/sarveṣāṃ cārśasāmadhiṣṭhānaṃ---medo māṃsaṃ tvak ca//

Ca.6.14.7 tatra sahajānyarśāṃsi kānicidaṇūni, kānicinmahānti, kāniciddīrghāṇi, kāniciddhrasvāni, kānicidvṛttāni, kānicidviṣamavisṛtāni, kānicidantaḥkuṭilāni, kānicidbahiḥkuṭilāni, kānicijjaṭilāni, kānicidantarmukhāni, yathāsvaṃ doṣānubandhavarṇāni//

Ca.6.14.8 tairupahato janmaprabhṛti bhavatyatikṛśo vivarṇaḥ kṣāmo dīnaḥ pracuravibaddhavātamūtrapurīṣaḥ śarkarāśmarīmān, tathā+aniyatavibaddhamuktapakvāmaśuṣkabhinnavarcā antarā+antarā śvetapāṇḍuharitapītaraktāruṇatanusāndrapicchilakuṇapagandhyāmapurīṣopaveśī, nābhibastivaṃkṣaṇoddeśe pracuraparikartikānvitaḥ, sagudaśūlapravāhikāpariharṣapramehaprasaktaviṣṭambhāntrakūjodāvartahṛdayendriyopalepaḥ pracuravibaddhatiktāmlodgāraḥ, sudurbalaḥ, sudurbalāgniḥ, alpaśukraḥ, krodhano, duḥkhopacāraśīlaḥ, kāsaśvāsatamakatṛṣṇāhṛllāsacchardyarocakāvipākapīnasakṣavathuparītaḥ, taimirikaḥ, śirāḥśūlī, kṣāmabhinnasannasaktajarjarasvaraḥ, karṇarogī, śūnapāṇipādavadanākṣikūṭaḥ, sajvaraḥ, sāṅgamardaḥ, sarvaparvāsthiśūlī ca, antarā+antarā pārśvakukṣibastihṛdayapṛṣṭhatrikagrahopataptaḥ, pradhyānaparaḥ, paramālasaśceti; janmaprabhṛtyasya gudajairāvṛto &mārgoparodhādvāyurapānaḥ pratyārohan samānavyānaprāṇodānān pittaśleṣmāṇau ca prakopayati, ete sarva eva prakupitāḥ pañca vāyavaḥ pittaśleṣmāṇau cārśasamabhidravanta etān vikārānupajanayanti; ityuktāni sahajānyarśāṃsi//

Ca.6.14.9 ata ūrdhvaṃ jātasyottarakālajāni vyākhyāsyāmaḥ---gurumadhuraśītābhiṣyandividāhiviruddhājīrṇapramitāśanāsātmyabhojanādgavyamātsyavārāhamāhiṣājāvikapiśitabhakṣaṇāt kṛśaśuṣkapūtimāṃsapaiṣṭikaparamānnakṣīradadhimaṇḍatilaguḍavikṛtisevanānmāṣayūṣekṣurasapiṇyākapiṇḍālukaśuṣkaśākaśuktalaśunakilāṭatakrapiṇḍakabisamṛṇālaśālūkakrauñcādanakaśerukaśṛṅgāṭakatarūṭavirūḍhanavaśūkaśamīdhānyāmamūlakopayogādguruphalaśākarāgaharitakamardakavasāśiraspadaparyuṣitapūtiśītasaṃkīrṇānnābhyavahārānmandakātikrāntamadyapānādvyāpannagurusalilapānādatisnehapānādasaṃśodhanādbastikarmavibhramādavyāyāmādavyavāyāddivāsvapnāt sukhaśayanāsanasthānasevanāccopahatāgnermalopacayo bhavatyatimātraṃ, tathotkaṭakaviṣamakaṭhināsanasevanādudbhrāntayānoṣṭrayānādativyavāyādbastinetrāsamyakpraṇidhānādgudakṣaṇanādabhīkṣṇaṃ śītāmbusaṃsparśāccelaloṣṭatṛṇādigharṣaṇāt pratatātinirvāhaṇādvātamūtrapurīṣavegodīraṇāt samudīrṇavegavinigrahāt strīṇāṃ cāmagarbhabhraṃśādgarbhotpīḍanādviṣamaprasūtibhiśca prakupito vāyurapānastaṃ malamupacitamadhogamāsādya gudavaliṣvādhatte, tatastāsvarśāṃsi prādurbhavanti//

Ca.6.14.10 sarṣapamasūramāṣamudgamakuṣṭhakayavakalāyapiṇḍiṭiṇṭikerakebukatindukakarkandhukākaṇantikābimbībadarakarīrodumbarakharjūrajāmbavagostanāṅguṣṭhakaśeruśṛṅgāṭakaśṛṅgīdakṣaśikhiśukatuṇḍajihvāpadmamukulakarṇikāsaṃsthānāni sāmānyādvātapittakaphaprabalāni//

Ca.6.14.11 teṣāmayaṃ viśeṣaḥ---śuṣkamlānakaṭhinaparuṣarūkṣaśyāvāni, tīkṣṇāgrāṇi, vakrāṇi, sphuṭitamukhāni, viṣamavisṛtāni, śūlākṣepatodasphuraṇacimicimāsaṃharṣaparītāni, snigdhoṣṇopaśayāni, pravāhikādhmānaśiśnavṛṣaṇabastivaṅkṣaṇahṛdgrahāṅgamardahṛdayadravaprabalāni, pratatavibaddhavātamūtravarcāṃsi, ūrukaṭīpṛṣṭhatrikapārśvakukṣibastiśūlaśiro+abhitāpakṣavathūdgārapratiśyāyakāsodāvartāyāmaśoṣaśothamūrcchārocakamukhavairasyataimiryakaṇḍūnāsākarṇaśaṅkhaśūlasvaropaghātakarāṇi, śyāvāruṇaparuṣanakhanayanavadanatvaṅmūtrapurīṣasya vātolbaṇānyarśāṃsīti vidyāt//
Ca.6.14.12 bhavataścātra---

lg.l: Ca.6.14.13 laṅghanaṃ deśakālau ca śītau vyāyāmakarma ca/

div.p: Ca.6.14.14 mṛduśithilasukumārāṇyasparśasahāni, raktapītanīlakṛṣṇāni, svedopakledabahulāni, &visragandhitanupītaraktasrāvīṇi, rudhiravahāni, dāhakaṇḍūśūlanistodapākavanti, śītopaśayāni, saṃbhinnapītaharitavarcāṃsi, pītavisragandhipracuraviṇmūtrāṇi, pipāsājvaratamakasaṃmohabhojanadveṣakarāṇi pītanakhanayanatvaṅmūtrapurīṣasya pittolbaṇānyarśāṃsīti vidyāt//
Ca.6.14.15 bhavataścātra ---

lg.l: Ca.6.14.16 vidāhi tīkṣṇamuṣṇaṃ ca sarvaṃ pānannabheṣajam/

div.p: Ca.6.14.17 tatra yāni pramāṇavanti, upacitāni, ślakṣṇāni, &sparśasahāni, snigdhaśvetapāṇḍupicchilāni, stabdhāni, gurūṇi, stimitāni, suptasuptāni, sthiraśvayathūni, kaṇḍūbahulāni, bahupratatapiñjaraśvetaraktapicchāsrāvīṇi, gurupicchilaśvetamūtrapurīṣāṇi, rūkṣoṣṇopaśayāni, pravāhikātimātrotthānavaṅkṣaṇānāhavanti, parikartikāhṛllāsaniṣṭhīvikākāsārocakapratiśyāyagauravacchardimūtrakṛcchraśoṣaśothapāṇḍurogaśītajvarāśmarīśarkarāhṛdayendriyopalepāsyamādhuryapramehakarāṇi, &dīrghakālānubandhīni, atimātramagnimārdavaklaibyakarāṇi, āmavikāraprabalāni, śuklanakhanayanavadanatvaṅmūtrapurīṣasya śleṣmolbaṇānyarśāṃsīti vidyāt//
Ca.6.14.18 bhavataścātra---

lg.l: Ca.6.14.21 viṣṭambho+annasya daurbalyaṃ kukṣerāṭopa eva ca/
Ca.6.14.24 pañcātmā mārutaḥ pittaṃ kapho gudavalitrayam/
Ca.6.14.26 haste pāde mukhe nābhyāṃ gude vṛṣaṇayostathā/
śotho hṛtpārśvaśūlaṃ ca yasyāsādhyo+arśaso hi saḥ//
Ca.6.14.28 sahajāni tridoṣāṇi yāni cābhyantarāṃ valim/
Ca.6.14.30 dvandvajāni dvitīyāyāṃ valau yānyāśritāni ca/
Ca.6.14.31 bāhyāyāṃ tu valau jātānyekadoṣolbaṇāni ca/
Ca.6.14.36 punarviroho rūḍhānāṃ kledo bhraṃśo gudasya ca/
Ca.6.14.39 tatra śuṣkārśasāṃ pūrvaṃ pravakṣyāmi cikitsitam/
Ca.6.14.49 nṛkeśāḥ sarpanirmoko vṛṣadaṃśasya carma ca/
bṛhatī cāśvagandhā ca pippalyaḥ surasā ghṛtam//
Ca.6.14.51 varāhavṛṣaviṭ caiva dhūpana saktavo ghṛtam/
Ca.6.14.53 śirīṣabījaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ ca pippalyaḥ saindhavaṃ guḍaḥ/
Ca.6.14.58 abhyaṅgādyāḥ pradehāntā ya ete parikīrtitāḥ/
Ca.6.14.61 jalaukobhistathā śastraiḥ sūcībhirvā punaḥ punaḥ/
biḍaṃ yavānīṃ hapuṣāṃ viḍaṅgaṃ saindhavaṃ vacām//
Ca.6.14.64 tintiḍīkaṃ ca maṇḍena madyenoṣṇodakena vā/
Ca.6.14.67 gomūtrādhyuṣitāṃ dadyāt saguḍāṃ vā harītakīm harītakīṃ takrayutāṃ triphalāṃ vā prayojayet//
Ca.6.14.68 sanāgaraṃ citrakaṃ vā sīdhuyuktaṃ prayojayet/
Ca.6.14.71 citrakaṃ hapuṣāṃ hiṅguṃ dadyādvā takrasaṃyutam/
Ca.6.14.72 hapuṣāṃ kuñcikāṃ dhānyamajājīṃ kāravīṃ śaṭīm/
Ca.6.14.73 yavānīṃ cājamodāṃ ca cūrṇitaṃ takrasaṃyutam/
Ca.6.14.76 tvacaṃ citrakamūlasya piṣṭvā kumbhaṃ pralepayet/
takraṃ vā dadhi vā tatra jātamarśoharaṃ pibet//
Ca.6.14.77 vātaśleṣmārśasāṃ takrāt paraṃ nāstīha bheṣajam/
tat prayojyaṃ yathādoṣaṃ sasnehaṃ rūkṣameva vā//
Ca.6.14.78 saptāhaṃ vā daśāhaṃ vā pakṣaṃ māsamathāpi vā/
Ca.6.14.80 jīrṇe takre pradadyādvā takrapeyāṃ sasaindhavām/
Ca.6.14.82 kālakramajñaḥ sahasā na ca takraṃ nivartayet/
hatāni na virohanti takreṇa gudajāni tu//
Ca.6.14.87 srotaḥsu takraśuddheṣu rasaḥ samyagupaiti yaḥ/
Ca.6.14.90 bilvaṃ karkaṭakaṃ pāṭhāṃ piṣṭvā peyāṃ vipācayet/
Ca.6.14.92 śaṭīpalāśasiddhāṃ vā pipplyā nāgareṇa vā/
Ca.6.14.93 śuṣkamūlakayūṣaṃ vā yūṣaṃ kaulatthameva vā/
Ca.6.14.98 guḍaṃ sanāgaraṃ pāṭhāṃ phalāmlaṃ pāyayecca tam/
Ca.6.14.99 yavānīṃ nāgaraṃ pāṭhāṃ dāḍimasya rasaṃ guḍam/
Ca.6.14.100 duḥsparśakena bilvena yavānyā nāgareṇa vā/
Ca.6.14.102 madirāṃ vā salavaṇāṃ sīdhuṃ sauvīrakaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.14.107 cavyaṃ trikaṭukaṃ pāṭhāṃ kṣāraṃ kustumburūṇi ca/
śvadaṃṣṭrā pippalī dhānyaṃ bilvaṃ pāṭhā yavānikā//
Ca.6.14.113 pippalīṃ nāgaraṃ pāṭhāṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak/
Ca.6.14.114 gaṇḍīraṃ pippalīmūlaṃ vyoṣaṃ cavyaṃ ca citrakam/
Ca.6.14.116 mṛdvagninā tataḥ sādhyaṃ siddhaṃ sarpirnidhāpayet/
jīvantīṃ śaṭiśākaṃ ca śākaṃ gṛñjanakasya ca//
Ca.6.14.128 madirāṃ śārkaraṃ jātaṃ sīdhuṃ takraṃ tuṣodakam/
ariṣṭaṃ dadhimaṇḍaṃ vā śṛtaṃ vā śiśiraṃ jalam//
Ca.6.14.129 kaṇṭakāryā śṛtaṃ vā+api śṛtaṃ nāgaradhānyakaiḥ/
Ca.6.14.130 udāvartaparītā ye ye cātyarthaṃ virūkṣitāḥ/
Ca.6.14.131 pippalīṃ madanaṃ bilvaṃ śatāhvāṃ madhukaṃ vacām/
kuṣṭhaṃ śaṭīṃ puṣkarākhyaṃ citrakaṃ devadāru ca//
Ca.6.14.132 piṣṭvā tailaṃ vipaktavyaṃ &payasā dviguṇena ca/
kaṇḍūḥ stambhaḥ saruk śophaḥ srutānāṃ vinivartate//
Ca.6.14.137 nirūhaṃ vā prayuñjīta sakṣīraṃ dāśamūlikam/
Ca.6.14.139 viḍaṅgaṃ pippalī lodhraṃ maricaṃ sailavālukam/
Ca.6.14.140 droṇaśeṣe rase tasmin pūte śīte samāvapet/
Ca.6.14.141 pakṣādūrdhvaṃ bhavet peyā tato mātrā yathābalam/
Ca.6.14.145 tripalaṃ triphalāyāśca dalānāṃ tatra dāpayet/
rase caturthaśeṣe tu pūte śīte samāvapet//
Ca.6.14.149 dve dve pale samāpothya dvidroṇe sādhayedapām/
pādāvaśeṣe pūte ca rase tasmin pradāpayet//
Ca.6.14.150 guḍasyaikāṃ tulāṃ vaidyastat sthāpyaṃ ghṛtabhājane/
Ca.6.14.153 durālabhāyāḥ prasthaḥ syāccitrakasya vṛṣasya ca/
Ca.6.14.155 prakṣipya sthāpayet kumbhe māsārdhaṃ ghṛtabhāvite/
Ca.6.14.156 tasya mātrāṃ pibet kāle śārkarasya yathābalam/
Ca.6.14.160 kuṣṭhaṃ dāruharidrāṃ ca surāhvaṃ sārivādvayam/
Ca.6.14.162 pādāvaśeṣe pūte ca śīte tasmin pradāpayet/
Ca.6.14.165 tat sarvaṃ sthāpayet pakṣaṃ sucaukṣe ghṛtabhājane/
Ca.6.14.171 viṭ śyāvaṃ kaṭhinaṃ rūkṣaṃ cādho vāyurna vartate/
Ca.6.14.172 kaṭyūrugudaśūlaṃ ca daurbalyaṃ yadi cādhikam/
Ca.6.14.173 śithilaṃ śvetapītaṃ ca viṭ snigdhaṃ guru śītalam/
yadyarśasāṃ ghanaṃ cāsṛk tantumat pāṇḍu picchilam//
Ca.6.14.174 gudaṃ sapicchaṃ stimitaṃ guru snigdhaṃ ca kāraṇam/
Ca.6.14.175 snigdhaśītaṃ hitaṃ vāte rūkṣaśītaṃ kaphānuge/
Ca.6.14.180 staimityaṃ gurugātratvaṃ tathā+anyān raktajān gadān/
Ca.6.14.183 yattu prakṣīṇadoṣasya raktaṃ vātolbaṇasya ca/
Ca.6.14.184 yattu pittolbaṇaṃ raktaṃ gharmakāle pravartate/
Ca.6.14.187 sātiviṣā kuṭajatvak phalaṃ ca sarasāñjanaṃ madhuyutāni/
Ca.6.14.190 pūtotkvathitaḥ sāndraḥ sa raso darvīpralepano grāhyaḥ/
Ca.6.14.191 chagalīpayasā pītā peyāmaṇḍena vā yathāgnibalam/
Ca.6.14.193 nīlotpalaṃ samaṅgā mocarasaścandanaṃ tilā lodhram/
Ca.6.14.194 chāgalipayaḥ prayuktaṃ nihanti raktaṃ savāstukarasaṃ ca/
Ca.6.14.195 pāṭhā vatsakabījaṃ rasāñjanaṃ nāgaraṃ yavānyaśca/
Ca.6.14.196 dārvī kirātatiktaṃ mustaṃ duḥsparśakaśca rudhiraghnam/
siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ vidheyaṃ śūle raktārśasāṃ bhiṣajā//
Ca.6.14.198 sarpiḥ sadāḍimarasaṃ sayāvaśūkaṃ śṛtaṃ jayatyāśu/
Ca.6.14.199 lājāpeyā pītā sacukrikā keśarotpalaiḥ siddhā/
Ca.6.14.211 navanītaghṛtaṃ chāgaṃ māṃsaṃ ca saṣaṣṭikaḥ śāliḥ/
Ca.6.14.213 dṛṣṭvā tu raktapittaṃ prabalaṃ kaphāvātaliṅgamalpaṃ ca/
Ca.6.14.216 ikṣurasamadhukavetasaniryūhe śītale payasi vā tam/
Ca.6.14.217 dattvā ghṛtaṃ saśarkaramupasthadeśe gude trikadeśe ca/
dāhe klede ca gudabhraṃśe gudajāḥ pratisāraṇīyāḥ syuḥ//
Ca.6.14.222 ābhiḥ kriyābhirathavā śītābhiryasya tiṣṭhati na raktam/
Ca.6.14.225 yavāsakuśakāśānāṃ mūlaṃ puṣpaṃ ca śālmalam/
Ca.6.14.226 triprasthaṃ salilasyaitat kṣīraprasthaṃ ca sādhayet/
pāṭhā sātiviṣā bilvaṃ dhātakī devadāru ca//
Ca.6.14.231 dārvītvaṅ nāgaraṃ māṃsī mustaṃ kṣāro yavāgrajaḥ/
Ca.6.14.232 aikadhyaṃ sādhayet sarvaṃ tat sarpiḥ paramauṣadham/
Ca.6.14.234 avākpuṣpī balā dārvī pṛśniparṇī trikaṇṭakaḥ/
Ca.6.14.235 kaṣāya eṣāṃ peṣyāstu jīvantī kaṭurohiṇī/
Ca.6.14.239 suniṣaṇṇakacāṅgeryoḥ prasthau dvau svarasasya ca/
Ca.6.14.243 bhavanti cātra--- vyatyāsānmadhurāmlāni śītoṣṇāni ca yojayet/
Ca.6.14.244 trayo vikārāḥ prāyeṇa ye parasparahetavaḥ/
Ca.6.14.248 yadato viparītaṃ syānnidāne yacca darśitam/

div.p: Ca.6.14.249 tatra ślokāḥ---

lg.l: Ca.6.14.250 abhyaṅgāḥ svedanaṃ dhūmāḥ sāvagāhāḥ pralepanāḥ/
Ca.6.14.253 dvividhaṃ sānubandhānāṃ teṣāṃ ceṣṭaṃ yadauṣadham/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne+arśaścikitsitaṃ nāma caturdaśo+adhyāyaḥ//14//

div.head: pañcadaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.15.1 athāto grahaṇīdoṣacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.15.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.15.4 śānte+agnau mriyate, yukte ciraṃ jīvatyanāmayaḥ/
Ca.6.15.6 annamādānakarmā tu prāṇaḥ koṣṭhaṃ prakarṣati/
Ca.6.15.11 pakvāśayaṃ tu prāptasya śoṣyamāṇasya vahninā/
Ca.6.15.14 yathāsvaṃ svaṃ ca puṣṇanti dehe dravyaguṇāḥ pṛthak/
Ca.6.15.16 rasādraktaṃ tato māṃsaṃ māṃsānmedastato+asthi ca/
asthno majjā tataḥ śukraṃ śukrādgarbhaḥ prasādajaḥ//
Ca.6.15.17 rasāt stanyaṃ &tato raktamasṛjaḥ kaṇḍarāḥ sirāḥ/
Ca.6.15.18 kiṭṭamannasya viṇmūtraṃ, rasasya tu kapho+asṛjaḥ/
pittaṃ, māṃsasya khamalā, malaḥ svedastu medasaḥ//
Ca.6.15.23 rasasya ca na rāgo+asti sa kathaṃ yāti raktatām/
Ca.6.15.25 khareṣvasthiṣu majjā ca kena snigdho mṛdustathā/
Ca.6.15.27 chidraṃ na dṛśyate+asthnāṃ ca tanniḥsarati vā katham/
Ca.6.15.28 tejo rasānāṃ sarveṣāṃ manujānāṃ yaducyate/
sthiratāṃ prāpya māṃsaṃ syāt svoṣmaṇā pakvameva &tat//
Ca.6.15.31 kharatvaṃ prakarotyasya jāyate+asthi tato nṛṇām/
Ca.6.15.32 medasastāni pūryante sneho majjā tataḥ smṛtaḥ/
tasmānmajjñastu yaḥ snehaḥ śukraṃ saṃjāyate tataḥ//
Ca.6.15.37 kṣipyamāṇaḥ khavaiguṇyādrasaḥ sajjati yatra saḥ/
Ca.6.15.39 annasya paktā sarveṣāṃ paktṝṇāmadhipo mataḥ/
Ca.6.15.41 yo hi bhuṅkte vidhiṃ tyaktvā grahaṇīdoṣajān gadān/
sa laulyāllabhate śīghraṃ, vakṣyante+ataḥ paraṃ tu te//
Ca.6.15.44 duṣyatyagniḥ, sa duṣṭo+annaṃ na tat pacati laghvapi/
Ca.6.15.45 tasya liṅgamajīrṇasya viṣṭambhaḥ sadanaṃ tathā/
śiraso ruk ca mūrcchā ca bhramaḥ pṛṣṭhakaṭigrahaḥ//
Ca.6.15.50 viṣamo dhātuvaiṣamyaṃ karoti viṣamaṃ pacan/
Ca.6.15.51 yuktaṃ bhuktavato yukto dhātusāmyaṃ samaṃ pacan/
Ca.6.15.52 adhastu pakvamāmaṃ vā pravṛttaṃ grahaṇīgadaḥ/
Ca.6.15.53 atisṛṣṭaṃ vibaddhaṃ vā dravaṃ tadupadiśyate/
Ca.6.15.55 pūrvarūpaṃ tu tasyedaṃ tṛṣṇā++ālasyaṃ balakṣayaḥ/
Ca.6.15.57 apakvaṃ dhārayatyannaṃ pakvaṃ sṛjati pārśvataḥ/
Ca.6.15.58 vātāt pittāt kaphācca syāttadrogastribhya eva ca/
hetuṃ liṅgaṃ &rūpabhedāñ śṛṇu tasya pṛthak pṛthak//
Ca.6.15.61 kaṇṭhāsyaśoṣaḥ kṣuttṛṣṇā timiraṃ karṇayoḥ svanaḥ/
gṛddhiḥ sarvarasānāṃ ca manasaḥ sadanaṃ tathā//
Ca.6.15.63 jīrṇe jīryati cādhmānaṃ bhukte svāsthyamupaiti ca/
Ca.6.15.64 cirādduḥkhaṃ dravaṃ śuṣkaṃ tanvāmaṃ śabdaphenavat/
Ca.6.15.66 so+ajīrṇaṃ nīlapītābhaṃ pītābhaḥ sāryate dravam/
Ca.6.15.69 hṛdayaṃ manyate styānamudaraṃ stimitaṃ guru/
Ca.6.15.75 līnaṃ pakvāśayasthaṃ vā+āpyāmaṃ srāvyaṃ sadīpanaiḥ/
dvyahaṃ tryahaṃ vā saṃsnehya svinnābhyaktaṃ nirūhayet//
Ca.6.15.79 tata eraṇḍatailena sarpiṣā tailvakena vā/
Ca.6.15.81 nīrūḍhaṃ ca viriktaṃ ca samyak caivānuvāsitam/
Ca.6.15.82 dve pañcamūle saralaṃ devadāru sanāgaram/
Ca.6.15.83 śaṇabījaṃ yavān kolān kulatthān &suṣavīṃ tathā/
Ca.6.15.86 vinīya cūrṇitān tasmāt pāyayet prasṛtaṃ budhaḥ/
Ca.6.15.93 vāte śleṣmāvṛte sāme kaphe vā vāyunoddhate/
Ca.6.15.94 majjatyāmā gurutvādviṭ pakvā tūtplavate jale/
Ca.6.15.95 parīkṣyaivaṃ purā sāmaṃ nirāmaṃ cāmadoṣiṇam/
Ca.6.15.96 citrakaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ dvau kṣārau lavaṇāni ca/
vyoṣaṃ hiṅgvajamodāṃ ca cavyaṃ caikatra cūrṇayet//
Ca.6.15.97 guṭikā mātuluṅgasya dāḍimasya rasena vā/
Ca.6.15.100 varcasyāme saśūle ca pibedvā dāḍimāmbunā/
Ca.6.15.101 sāme vā sakaphe vāte koṣṭhaśūlakare pibet/
Ca.6.15.104 pibenniṣkvāthya cūrṇaṃ vā kṛtvā koṣṇena vāriṇā/
Ca.6.15.105 sāme sātiviṣaṃ vyoṣaṃ lavaṇakṣārahiṅgu ca/
Ca.6.15.106 pippalīṃ nāgaraṃ pāṭhāṃ sārivāṃ bṛhatīdvayam/
citrakaṃ kauṭajaṃ bījaṃ lavaṇānyatha pañca ca//
Ca.6.15.109 sauvarcalaṃ biḍaṃ pākyaṃ yavakṣāraḥ sasaindhavaḥ/
Ca.6.15.110 tat sarvamekataḥ sūkṣmaṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā prayojayet/
Ca.6.15.114 paribharjya ghṛte dadhnā yavāgūṃ sādhayedbhiṣak/
Ca.6.15.116 snigdho dāḍimatakrāmlo jāṅgalaḥ saṃskṛto rasaḥ/
Ca.6.15.118 śreṣṭhaṃ madhurapākitvānna ca pittaṃ prakopayet/
Ca.6.15.121 lavaṇāni palāṃśāni pañca caikatra cūrṇayet/
Ca.6.15.125 candanaṃ padmakośīraṃ pāṭhāṃ mūrvāṃ kuṭannaṭam/
kaṭukāṃ rohiṇīṃ mustaṃ nimbaṃ ca dvipalāṃśikam//
Ca.6.15.127 droṇe+apāṃ sādhayet pādaśeṣe prasthaṃ ghṛtāt pacet/
tiktakaṃ yadghṛtaṃ coktaṃ kauṣṭhike tacca dāpayet//
Ca.6.15.129 nāgarātiviṣe mustaṃ dhātakīṃ ca rasāñjanam/
Ca.6.15.130 pibet samāṃśaṃ taccūurṇaṃ sakṣaudraṃ taṇḍulāmbunā/
Ca.6.15.131 arśāṃsi ca gude śūlaṃ jayeccaiva pravāhikām/
Ca.6.15.135 dārvīṃ parpaṭakaṃ pāṭhāṃ yavānīṃ madhuśigrukam/
Ca.6.15.138 kuṭajatvakphalaṃ mustaṃ yavānī devadāru ca/
taccūrṇaṃ madhunā lehyaṃ peyaṃ madyairjalena vā//
Ca.6.15.142 palāśaṃ citrakaṃ cavyaṃ mātuluṅgaṃ harītakīm/
Ca.6.15.145 amlaṃ cānu pibettakraṃ takrāriṣṭamathāpi vā/
madirāṃ madhvariṣṭaṃ vā nigadaṃ sīdhumeva vā//
śothaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ kilāsaṃ ca pramehāṃśca praṇāśayet//
Ca.6.15.151 taṃ piban grahaṇīdoṣāñjayet sarvān hitāśanaḥ/
Ca.6.15.152 prasthau durālabhāyā dvau prasthamāmalakasya ca/
Ca.6.15.154 tadvat priyaṅgoḥ pippalyā viḍaṅgānāṃ ca cūrṇitaiḥ/
Ca.6.15.157 droṇaśeṣe rase pūte guḍasya dviśataṃ bhiṣak/
lodhraṃ śābarakaṃ caiva māsārdhasthaṃ pibettu tam//
Ca.6.15.159 eṣa mūlāsavaḥ siddho dīpano raktapittajit/
Ca.6.15.160 &prāsthikaṃ pippalīṃ piṣṭvā guḍaṃ madhyaṃ bibhītakāt/
Ca.6.15.164 kuḍavārdhaṃ viḍaṅgānāṃ pippalyāḥ kuḍavaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.15.166 kārṣikāṃstat sthitaṃ māsamata ūrdhvaṃ prayojayet/
Ca.6.15.168 samūlāṃ pippalīṃ kṣārau dvau pañca lavaṇāni ca/
Ca.6.15.169 kṛtvā samāṃśaṃ taccūrṇaṃ pibet prātaḥ sukhāmbunā/
Ca.6.15.170 etairevauṣadhaiḥ siddhaṃ sarpiḥ peyaṃ samārute/
gaulmike ṣaṭpalaṃ proktaṃ bhallātakaghṛtaṃ ca yat//
saptalāṃ kaṇṭakārīṃ ca citrakaṃ ceti dāhayet//
Ca.6.15.174 vacāṃ ca kārṣikaṃ pañcalavaṇānāṃ palāni ca/
antardhūmaṃ tato dagdhvā cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā ghṛtāplutam//
Ca.6.15.178 sa kṣāraḥ sarpiṣā pīto bhojye vā+apyavacūrṇitaḥ/
Ca.6.15.179 durālabhāṃ karañjau dvau saptaparṇaṃ savatsakam/
Ca.6.15.180 gomūtreṇa samāṃśāni kṛtvā cūrṇāni dāhayet/
dagdhvā ca taṃ pibet kṣāraṃ grahaṇībalavardhanam//
Ca.6.15.181 bhūnimbaṃ rohiṇīṃ tiktāṃ paṭolaṃ nimbaparpaṭam/
Ca.6.15.182 dve haridre vacā kuṣṭhaṃ citrakaḥ kaṭurohiṇī/
Ca.6.15.186 vatsakātiviṣe pāṭhāṃ duḥsparśāṃ hiṅgu citrakam/
rohiṇīṃ kaṭukāṃ mustaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ pāṭhāṃ ca hiṅgu ca//
Ca.6.15.191 bhāgān dadhni trikuḍave ghṛtatailena mūrcchitam/
Ca.6.15.194 jīrṇe rasairvā madhurairaśnīyāt payasā+api vā/
kriyā yā cānilādīnāṃ nirdiṣṭā grahaṇīṃ prati//
snehanaṃ svedanaṃ śuddhirlaṅghanaṃ dīpanaṃ ca yat//
Ca.6.15.198 grahaṇīrogibhiḥ sevyāḥ, kriyāṃ cāvasthikīṃ śṛṇu/
Ca.6.15.199 sakṛdrūkṣaṃ sakṛtsnigdhaṃ kṛśe bahukaphe hitam/
doṣavṛddhyā tu mande+agnau śuddho doṣavidhiṃ caret//
Ca.6.15.209 annāvapīḍitaṃ balyaṃ dīpanaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ ca tat/
yathā hi sāradārvagniḥ sthiraḥ saṃtiṣṭhate ciram//
Ca.6.15.223 nirindhano+antaraṃ labdhvā yathainaṃ na vipādayet/
yavāgūṃ samadhūcchiṣṭāṃ ghṛtaṃ vā kṣudhitaḥ pibet//
Ca.6.15.226 godhūmacūrṇamanthaṃ vā vyadhayitvā sirāṃ pibet/
Ca.6.15.233 sarvaṃ tadatyagnihitaṃ bhuktvā prasvapanaṃ divā/
Ca.6.15.234 na tannimittaṃ vyasanaṃ labhate puṣṭimeva ca/
kaphe vṛddhe jite pitte mārute cānalaḥ samaḥ//
bhavanti cātra--- pathyāpathyamihaikatra bhuktaṃ samaśanaṃ matam//
Ca.6.15.237 trīṇyapyetāni mṛtyuṃ vā ghorān vyādhīnsṛjanti vā/
Ca.6.15.241 naiva dūṣyati tenaiva samaṃ saṃpadyate yathā/
rātrau tu hṛdaye mlāne saṃvṛteṣvayaneṣu ca/

div.p: Ca.6.15.244 tatra ślokāḥ---

lg.l: antaragniguṇā dehaṃ yathā dhārayate ca saḥ/
Ca.6.15.245 ye+agnayo yāṃśca puṣyanti yāvanto ye pacanti yān/
Ca.6.15.247 praduṣyati yathā duṣṭo yān rogāñjanayatyapi/
Ca.6.15.248 pūrvarūpaṃ pṛthak caiva vyañjanaṃ sacikitsitam/
Ca.6.15.249 jāyate ca yathā+atyagniryacca tasya cikitsitam/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne grahaṇīcikitsitaṃ nāma pañcadaśo+adhyāyaḥ//15//

div.head: ṣoḍaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.16.1 athā pāṇḍurogacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.16.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.16.4 doṣāḥ pittapradhānāstu yasya kupyanti dhātuṣu/
Ca.6.16.5 tato varṇabalasnehā ye cānye+apyojaso guṇāḥ/
vaivarṇyaṃ bhajate, tasya hetuṃ śṛṇu salakṣaṇam//
Ca.6.16.10 vāyunā balinā kṣiptaṃ saṃprāpya dhamanīrdaśa/
Ca.6.16.12 sa pāṇḍuroga ityuktaḥ tasya liṅgaṃ bhaviṣyataḥ/
Ca.6.16.13 saṃbhūte+asmin bhavet sarvaḥ karṇakṣveḍī hatānalaḥ/
Ca.6.16.18 aṅgamardaṃ rujaṃ todaṃ kampaṃ pārśvaśirorujam/
Ca.6.16.19 pittalasyācitaṃ pittaṃ yathoktaiḥ svaiḥ prakopaṇaiḥ/
Ca.6.16.20 sa pīto haritābho vā jvaradāhasamanvitaḥ/
daurgandhyaṃ bhinnavarcastvaṃ daurbalyaṃ tama eva ca//
Ca.6.16.23 vivṛddhaḥ śleṣmalaiḥ śleṣmā pāṇḍurogaṃ sa pūrvavat/
Ca.6.16.24 prasekaṃ lomaharṣaṃ ca sādaṃ mūrcchāṃ bhramaṃ klamam/
Ca.6.16.29 indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ hatvā tejo vīryaujasī tathā/
Ca.6.16.34 pāṇḍurogī tu yo+atyarthaṃ pittalāni niṣevate/
Ca.6.16.37 kālāntarāt kharībhūtā kṛcchrā syāt kumbhakāmalā/
Ca.6.16.39 naṣṭāgnisaṃjñaḥ kṣipraṃ hi kāmalāvān vipadyate/
Ca.6.16.44 dāḍimāt kuḍavo dhānyāt kuḍavārdhaṃ palaṃ palam/
Ca.6.16.46 dīpanaṃ śvāsakāsaghnaṃ mūḍhavāte ca śasyate/
Ca.6.16.47 kaṭukā rohiṇī mustaṃ haridre vatsakāt palam/
Ca.6.16.48 kṛṣṇā parpaṭako nimbo bhūnimbo devadāru ca/
Ca.6.16.49 raktapittaṃ jvaraṃ dāhaṃ śvayathuṃ sabhagandaram/
prasthaḥ siddho ghṛtāt peyaḥ sa pāṇḍvāmayagulmanut//
Ca.6.16.55 māhiṣāt sarpiṣaḥ prasthaḥ pūrvaḥ pūrve pare paraḥ/
Ca.6.16.56 payasā mūtrayuktena bahuśaḥ kevalena vā/
Ca.6.16.57 krākṣāñjaliṃ mṛditvā vā dadyāt pāṇḍvāmayāpaham/
Ca.6.16.60 kāmalī trivṛtāṃ vā+api triphalāyā rasaiḥ pibet/
Ca.6.16.62 mṛditaṃ taṃ rasaṃ pūtaṃ pītvā lihyācca madhvanu/
triphalāyā guḍūcyā vā dārvyā nimbasya vā rasam//
Ca.6.16.64 śītaṃ madhuyutaṃ prātaḥ kāmalārtaḥ pibennaraḥ/
kṣīramūtraṃ pibet pakṣaṃ gavyaṃ māhiṣameva vā//
Ca.6.16.66 mātuluṅgasya tat pūtaṃ pāṇḍuśothaharaṃ pibet/
Ca.6.16.67 gomūtrāñjalinā piṣṭaṃ mūtre vā kvathitaṃ pibet/
jīrṇe kṣīreṇa bhuñjīta rasena madhureṇa vā//
Ca.6.16.69 saptarātraṃ gavāṃ mūtre bhāvitaṃ vā+apyayorajaḥ/
Ca.6.16.73 tryūṣaṇaṃ triphalā mmustaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ cavyacitrakau/
Ca.6.16.74 etān dvipalikānbhāgāṃścūrṇaṃ kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak/
Ca.6.16.76 upayuñjīta takreṇa sātmyaṃ jīrṇe ca bhojanam/
arśāṃsi kāmalāṃ mehaṃ plīhānaṃ śamayanti ca//
Ca.6.16.82 mākṣikasya ca śuddhasya lauhasya rajasastathā/
Ca.6.16.84 dine dine prayuñjīta jīrṇe bhojyaṃ yathepsitam/
Ca.6.16.86 pāṇḍurogaṃ viṣaṃ kāsaṃ yakṣmāṇaṃ viṣamajvaram/
Ca.6.16.89 tvakkṣīrī pippalī dhātrī karkaṭākhyā palonmitā/
Ca.6.16.91 tān bhakṣayitvā+anupibenniranno bhukta eva vā/
Ca.6.16.93 te ca sarvavraṇān hanyuḥ sarvarogaharāḥ śivāḥ/
Ca.6.16.94 kuṣṭhaṃ haridre triphalā dantī cavyaṃ kaliṅgakāḥ/
Ca.6.16.95 maṇḍūraṃ dviguṇaṃ cūrṇādgomūtre dvyāḍhake pacet/
Ca.6.16.97 dārvītvak triphalā vyoṣaṃ viḍaṅgamayaso rajaḥ/
Ca.6.16.99 triphalā dve haridre ca kaṭurohiṇyayorajaḥ/
Ca.6.16.102 hanyeṣa kāmalāṃ pittaṃ pāṇḍuṃ kāsaṃ halīmakam/
tryūṣaṇaṃ triphalā cavyaṃ citrako devadāru ca//
Ca.6.16.103 viḍaṅgānyatha mustaṃ ca vatsakaṃ ceti cūrṇayet/
Ca.6.16.104 śanaiḥ siddhāstathā śītāḥ kāryāḥ karṣasamā guḍāḥ/
Ca.6.16.106 lodhraṃ caiteṣu gauḍaḥ syādariṣṭaḥ pāṇḍurogiṇām/
