Ca.6.16.107 drākṣāyāḥ pañca lākṣāyāḥ sapta droṇe jalasya tat/
Ca.6.16.108 śarkarāyāstulāṃ prasthaṃ mākṣikasya ca kārṣikam/
yaveṣu daśārātraṃ tadgrīṣme dviḥ śiśire sthitam//
dhātrīphalasahasre dve pīḍayitvā rasaṃ tu tam//
Ca.6.16.119 vyoṣaṃ bilvaṃ haridre dve triphalā dve punarnave/
Ca.6.16.120 vṛścikālī ca bhārgī ca &sakṣīraistaiḥ samairghṛtam/
Ca.6.16.125 śleṣmaṇā ruddhamārgaṃ tat pittaṃ kaphaharairjayet/
Ca.6.16.126 kaphasaṃmūrcchito vāyuḥ sthānāt pittaṃ kṣipedbalī/
Ca.6.16.127 bhavet sāṭopaviṣṭambho guruṇā hṛdayena ca/
Ca.6.16.130 sanāgaraṃ pibet pittaṃ tathā+asyaiti svamāśayam/
Ca.6.16.132 nivṛttopadravasya syāt pūrvaḥ kāmaliko vidhiḥ/
Ca.6.16.135 sa pibettrivṛtāṃ snigdho rasenāmalakasya tu/
Ca.6.16.136 drākṣālehaṃ ca pūrvoktaṃ sarpīṃṣi madhurāṇi ca/
Ca.6.16.138 payasā ca prayuñjīta yathādoṣaṃ yathābalam/

div.p: tatra ślokau---

lg.l: Ca.6.16.139 kāmalā dvividhā teṣāṃ sādhyāsādhyatvameva ca/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne pāṇḍurogacikitsitaṃ nāma ṣoḍaśo+adhyāyaḥ//16//

div.head: saptadaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.17.1 athāto hikkāśvāsacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.17.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.17.5 agniveśasya tadvākyaṃ śrutvā matimatāṃ varaḥ/
Ca.6.17.6 kāmaṃ prāṇaharā rogā bahavo na tu te tathā/
yathā śvāsaśca hikkā ca prāṇānāśu nikṛntataḥ//
ante saṃjāyate hikkā śvāso vā tīvravedanaḥ//
tayoḥ śṛṇu samutthānaṃ liṅgaṃ ca sabhiṣagjitam//
Ca.6.17.18 ghorān prāṇoparodhāya prāṇināṃ pañca pañca ca/
Ca.6.17.20 ānāhaḥ pārśvaśūlaṃ ca pīḍanaṃ hṛdayasya ca/
hikkāḥ karoti saṃrudhya tāsāṃ liṅgaṃ pṛthak śṛṇu//
Ca.6.17.24 saṃjñāṃ muṣṇāti gātrāṇāṃ stambhaṃ saṃjanayatyapi/
mahāhikketi sā nṝṇāṃ sadyaḥ prāṇaharā matā//
Ca.6.17.27 hikkate yaḥ pravṛddhastu kṛśo dīnamanā naraḥ/
gambhīrā nāma sā tasya hikkā prāṇāntikī matā//
Ca.6.17.31 vyapetā jāyate hikkā yā+annapāne caturvidhe/
kaṇṭhe prapadyate hikkāṃ tadākṣudrāṃ karoti saḥ//
Ca.6.17.36 vṛddhimāyasyato yāti bhuktamātre ca mārdavam/
yataḥ pravartate pūrvaṃ tata eva nirvatate//
Ca.6.17.37 hṛdayaṃ kloma kaṇṭhaṃ ca tālukaṃ ca samāśritā/
mṛdvī sā kṣudrahikketi nṛṇāṃ sādhyā prakīrtitā//
hikkā pīte tathā bhukte śamaṃ yāti ca sā+annajā//
Ca.6.17.43 āsāṃ yā sā samutpannā hikkā hantyāśu jīvitam/
Ca.6.17.45 yadā srotāṃsi saṃrudhya mārutaḥ kaphapūrvakaḥ/
Ca.6.17.48 dīnaḥ praśvasitaṃ cāsya dūrādvijñāyate bhṛśam/
Ca.6.17.49 dīrghaṃ śvasiti yastūrdhvaṃ na ca pratyāharatyadhaḥ/
Ca.6.17.52 yastu śvasiti vicchinnaṃ sarvaprāṇena pīḍitaḥ/
Ca.6.17.55 pratilomaṃ yadā vāyuḥ srotāṃsi pratipadyate/
grīvāṃ śiraśca saṃgṛhya śleṣmāṇaṃ samudīrya ca//
Ca.6.17.56 karoti pīnasaṃ tena ruddho ghurghurukaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.17.58 śleṣmaṇyamucyamāne tu bhṛśaṃ bhavati duḥkhitaḥ/
tasyaiva ca vimokṣānte muhūrtaṃ labhate sukham//
na cāpi nidrāṃ labhate śayānaḥ śvāsapīḍitaḥ//
Ca.6.17.63 jvaramūrcchāparītasya vidyāt pratamakaṃ tu tam/
Ca.6.17.65 rūkṣāyāsodbhavaḥ koṣṭhe kṣudro vāta udīrayan/
Ca.6.17.66 hinasti na sa gātrāṇi na ca duḥkho yathetare/
sa sādhya ukto balinaḥ sarve cāvyaktalakṣaṇāḥ//
Ca.6.17.68 iti śvāsāḥ samuddiṣṭā hikkāścaiva svalakṣaṇaiḥ/
śleṣmā taptaḥ sthiro dehe svedairviṣyandate tathā//
Ca.6.17.74 svinnaṃ jñātvā tatastūrṇaṃ bhojayet snigdhamodanam/
Ca.6.17.75 tataḥ śleṣmaṇi saṃvṛddhe vamanaṃ pāyayettu tam/
Ca.6.17.76 nirhṛte sukhamāpnoti sa kaphe duṣṭavigrahe/
Ca.6.17.78 sadevadārvalaṃ māṃsīṃ piṣṭvā vartiṃ prakalpayet/
kṛtvā dhūmaṃ pibecchṛṅgaṃ bālaṃ vā snāyu vā gavām//
Ca.6.17.80 syonākavardhamānānāṃ nāḍīṃ śuṣkāṃ kuśasya vā/
padmakaṃ guggulaṃ lohaṃ śallakīṃ vā ghṛtāplutam//
Ca.6.17.89 kakādhike balasthe ca vamanaṃ savirecanam/
daśamūlīrase siddhāḥ kaulatthe vā rase hitāḥ//
Ca.6.17.95 jale paktvā rasaḥ pūtaḥ pippalīghṛtabharjitaḥ/
Ca.6.17.96 rāsnāṃ balāṃ pañcamūlaṃ hrasvaṃ mudgān sacitrakān/
paktvā+ambhasi rase tasmin yūṣaḥ sādhyaśca pūrvavat//
Ca.6.17.98 dattvā salavaṇaṃ kṣāraṃ śigrūṇi maricāni ca/
Ca.6.17.103 yavāgūṃ vidhinā siddhāṃ kaṣāyaṃ vā pibennaraḥ/
Ca.6.17.106 pāṭhāṃ madhurasāṃ rāsnāṃ saralaṃ devadāru ca/
Ca.6.17.107 taṃ mandalavaṇaṃ kṛtvā bhiṣak prasṛtasaṃmitam/
Ca.6.17.108 hiṅgu sauvarcalaṃ kolaṃ samaṅgāṃ pippalīṃ balām/
Ca.6.17.109 sauvarcalaṃ nāgaraṃ ca bhārgīṃ dviśarkarāyutam/
Ca.6.17.111 madhūlikā tugākṣīrī nāgaraṃ pippalī tathā/
Ca.6.17.112 śvāvidhaṃ śaśamāṃsaṃ ca śallakasya ca śoṇitam/
Ca.6.17.116 kharāśvoṣṭravarāhāṇāṃ meṣasya ca gajasya ca/
cūrṇaṃ līḍhvā jayet kāsaṃ hikkāṃ śvāsaṃ ca dāruṇam//
Ca.6.17.121 kāsine cchardanaṃ dadyāt svarabhaṅge ca buddhimān/
Ca.6.17.124 vālakaṃ ca samaṃ cūrṇaṃ kṛtvā+aṣṭaguṇaśarkaram/
sarvathā tamake śvāse hikkāyāṃ ca prayojayet//
Ca.6.17.127 eṣāṃ pāṇitalaṃ cūrṇaṃ tulyānāṃ kṣaudrasarpiṣā/
hikkāṃ śvāsaṃ ca kāsaṃ ca līḍhamāśu niyacchati//
Ca.6.17.128 añjanāttimiraṃ kācaṃ nīlikāṃ puṣpakaṃ tamaḥ/
madhunā saṃyutaṃ lehyaṃ cūrṇaṃ vā kālalohajam//
Ca.6.17.131 laśunasya palāṇḍorvā mūlaṃ gṛñjanakasya vā/
pītaṃ nasto niṣiktaṃ vā sadyo hikkāṃ niyacchati//
Ca.6.17.135 adhobhāgairghṛtaṃ siddhaṃ sadyo hikkāṃ niyacchati/
Ca.6.17.137 śītāmbusekaḥ sahasā trāso vismāpanaṃ bhayam/
Ca.6.17.141 kāyasthayā ca tat pānāddhikkāśvāsau praṇāśayet/
Ca.6.17.142 bhūtīkaṃ pauṣkaraṃ mūlaṃ palāśaścitrakaḥ śaṭī/
Ca.6.17.149 sarveṣāṃ bṛṃhaṇe hyalpaḥ śakyaśca prāyaśo bhavet/

div.p: Ca.6.17.151 tatra ślokaḥ---

lg.l: liṅgaṃ pathyaṃ ca hikkānāṃ śvāsānāṃ ceha darśitam//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne hikkāśvāsacikitsitaṃ nāma saptadaśo+adhyāyaḥ//17//

div.head: aṣṭādaśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.18.1 athātaḥ kāsacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.18.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.18.3 tapasā yaśasā dhṛtyā dhiyā ca parayā+anvitaḥ/
Ca.6.18.4 vātādijāstrayo ye ca kṣatajaḥ kṣayajastathā/
Ca.6.18.7 āviśya śirasaḥ khāni sarvāṇi pratipūrayan/
śuṣko vā sakapho vā+api kasanātkāsa ucyate//
Ca.6.18.16 pratataṃ kāsamānaśca jyotīṃṣīva ca paśyati/
Ca.6.18.19 bahulaṃ madhuraṃ snigdhaṃ niṣṭhīvati ghanaṃ kapham/
Ca.6.18.21 sa pūrvaṃ kāsate śuṣkaṃ tataḥ ṣṭhīvet saśoṇitam/
ghṛṇināṃ śocatāṃ nṝṇāṃ vyāpanne+agnau trayo malāḥ//
kurgandhaṃ haritaṃ raktaṃ ṣṭhīvet pūyopamaṃ kapham//
Ca.6.18.29 ityeṣa kṣayajaḥ kāsaḥ kṣīṇānāṃ dehanāśanaḥ/
Ca.6.18.39 tryūṣaṇaṃ triphalāṃ drākṣāṃ kāśmaryāṇi parūṣakam/
dve pāṭhe devadārvṛddhiṃ svaguptāṃ citrakaṃ śaṭīm//
trikaṇṭakaṃ vidārīṃ ca piṣṭvā karṣasamaṃ ghṛtāt//
Ca.6.18.41 prasthaṃ caturguṇe kṣīre siddhaṃ kāsaharaṃ pibet/
Ca.6.18.44 tulārdhaṃ cājamāṃsasya pādaśeṣeṇa tena ca/
Ca.6.18.47 viḍaṅgaṃ nāgaraṃ rāsnā pippalī hiṅgu saindhavam/
dvau kṣārau pañcakolāni pañcava lavaṇāni ca//
Ca.6.18.50 durālabhāṃ śaṭīṃ drākṣāṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ sitopalām/
lihyāt karkaṭaśṛṅgīṃ ca kāse tailena vātaje//
Ca.6.18.51 duḥsparśāṃ pippalīṃ mustaṃ bhārgīṃ karkaṭakīṃ śaṭīm/
Ca.6.18.52 viḍaṅgaṃ saindhavaṃ kuṣṭhaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu manaḥśilām/
Ca.6.18.53 citrakaṃ pippalīmūlaṃ vyoṣaṃ hiṅgu durālabhām/
śaṭīṃ puṣkaramūlaṃ ca śreyasīṃ surasāṃ vacām//
Ca.6.18.54 bhārgīṃ chinnaruhāṃ rāsnāṃ śṛṅgīṃ drākṣāṃ ca kārṣikān/
Ca.6.18.55 dattvā matsyaṇḍikāyāśca ghṛtācca kuḍavaṃ pacet/
Ca.6.18.57 daśamūlīṃ svayaṅguptāṃ śaṅkhapuṣpīṃ śaṭīṃ balām/
Ca.6.18.58 bhārgīṃ puṣkaramūlaṃ ca dvipalāṃśaṃ yavāḍhakam/
Ca.6.18.59 yavaiḥ svinnaiḥ kaṣāyaṃ taṃ pūtaṃ taccābhayāśatam/
Ca.6.18.60 tailāt sapippalīcūrṇāt siddhaśīte ca mākṣikāt/
pañcakāsān kṣayaṃ śvāsaṃ hikkāṃ ca viṣamajvaram//
Ca.6.18.63 saindhavaṃ pippalīṃ bhārgīṃ śṛṅgaveraṃ durālabhām/
Ca.6.18.65 śirasaḥ pīḍane srāve nāsāyā hṛdi tāmyati/
Ca.6.18.68 sa hyasya taikṣṇyādvicchidya śleṣmāṇamurasi sthitam/
dhūmaṃ tasyānu ca kṣīraṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ saguḍaṃ pibet//
Ca.6.18.75 tvagaiṅgudī bṛhatyau dve tālamūlī manaḥśilā/
Ca.6.18.83 paittike sakaphe kāse vamanaṃ sarpiṣā hitam/
hṛtadoṣastataḥ śītaṃ madhuraṃ ca kramaṃ bhajet//
Ca.6.18.85 paitte tanukaphe kāse trivṛtāṃ madhurairyutām/
kramaḥ kāryaḥ paraṃ bhojyaiḥ snehairlehaiśca śasyate//
Ca.6.18.88 lājā+amṛtaphalā drākṣā tvakkṣīrī pippalī sitā/
Ca.6.18.89 kharjūraṃ pippalī vāṃśī śvadaṃṣṭrā ceti pañca te/
śvāsaṃ hikkāṃ kṣayaṃ caiva hṛdrogaṃ ca praṇāśayet//
Ca.6.18.94 pippalyāmalakaṃ drākṣāṃ lākṣāṃ lājāṃ sitopalām/
kṣīre paktvā ghanaṃ śītaṃ lihyāt kṣaudrāṣṭabhāgikam//
Ca.6.18.102 śṛtaṃ payaḥ pibet kāsī jvarī dāhī kṣatakṣayī/
tajjaṃ vā sādhayet sarpiḥ sakṣīrekṣurasaṃ bhiṣak//
madhvamloṣṇāmbutakraṃ vā madyaṃ vā nigadaṃ pibet//
jalaṃ madhuyutaṃ peyaṃ kāleṣvannasya vā triṣu//
Ca.6.18.112 kaṭphalaṃ kattṛṇaṃ bhārgīṃ mustaṃ dhānyaṃ vacābhaye/
śuṇṭhīṃ parpaṭakaṃ śṛṅgīṃ surāhvaṃ ca śṛtaṃ jale//
Ca.6.18.114 pāṭhāṃ śuṇṭhīṃ mūrvāṃ gavākṣīṃ mustapippalīm/
Ca.6.18.115 nāgarātiviṣe mustaṃ śṛṅgīṃ karkaṭakasya ca/
harītakīṃ śaṭīṃ caiva tenaiva vidhinā pibet//
Ca.6.18.116 tailabhṛṣṭaṃ ca pippalyāḥ kalkākṣaṃ sasitopalam/
Ca.6.18.118 devadāru śaṭī rāsnā karkaṭākhyā durālabhā/
Ca.6.18.120 pathyā tāmalakī dhātrī bhadramustā ca pippalī/
Ca.6.18.121 viśālā pippalī mustaṃ trivṛtā ceti lehayet/
Ca.6.18.124 peyānupānaṃ tat peyaṃ kāse vātakaphātmake/
pāyayet kaphaje kāse hikkāśvāse ca śasyate//
Ca.6.18.130 dhūmāṃstāneva dadyācca ye proktā vātakāsinām/
Ca.6.18.131 tamakaḥ kaphakāse tu syāccet pittānubandhajaḥ/
Ca.6.18.132 vāte kaphānubandhe tu kuryāt kaphaharīṃ kriyām/
Ca.6.18.133 ārdre virūkṣaṇaṃ, śuṣke snigdhaṃ, vātakaphātmake/
Ca.6.18.134 kāsamātyayikaṃ matvā kṣatajaṃ tvarayā jayet/
Ca.6.18.135 pippalī madhukaṃ piṣṭaṃ kārṣikaṃ sasitopalam/
tailaṃ ca prasṛtāṃśāni tat sarvaṃ mṛdunā+agninā//
Ca.6.18.141 māṃsocitebhyaḥ kṣāmebhyo lāvādīnāṃ rasā hitāḥ/
Ca.6.18.142 rakte srotobhya āsyādvā+apyāgate kṣīrajaṃ ghṛtam/
nasyaṃ pānaṃ yavāgūrvā śrānte kṣāme hatānale//
Ca.6.18.143 stambhāyāmeṣu mahatīṃ mātrāṃ vā sarpiṣaḥ pibet/
Ca.6.18.144 nivṛtte kṣatadoṣe tu kaphe vṛddha &uraḥ kṣate/
dālyate kāsino yasya sa dhūmānnā pibedimān//
Ca.6.18.145 dve mede madhukraṃ dve ca bale taiḥ kṣaumalaktakaiḥ/
kṣaumaṃ dhūmaṃ pibet kṣīraṃ śṛtaṃ cāyoguḍairanu//
Ca.6.18.152 sarpiḥ siddhaṃ pibedyuktyā kṣīṇadeho viśodhanam/
Ca.6.18.153 pitte kaphe ca saṃkṣīṇe parikṣīṇeṣu dhātuṣu/
Ca.6.18.155 śūne savedane meḍhre pāyau saśroṇivaṃkṣaṇe/
Ca.6.18.160 siddhe+asmiṃścūrṇitau kṣārau dvau pañca lavaṇāni ca/
Ca.6.18.161 guḍūcīṃ pippalīṃ mūrvāṃ haridrāṃ śreyasīṃ vacām/
Ca.6.18.162 jale caturguṇe paktvā pādaśeṣeṇa tatsamam/
kuḍavārdhaṃ ca pipplyāḥ sa lehaḥ śvāsakāsanut//
Ca.6.18.174 padmakaṃ triphalāṃ vyoṣaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ suradāru ca/
balāṃ rāsnāṃ ca tulyāni sūkṣmacūrṇāni kārayet//
Ca.6.18.175 sarvairebhiḥ samaṃ cūrṇaiḥ pṛthak kṣaudraṃ ghṛtaṃ sitām/
Ca.6.18.176 jīvantīṃ madhukaṃ pāṭhāṃ tvakkṣīrīṃ triphalāṃ śaṭīm/
mustaile padmakaṃ drākṣāṃ dve bṛhatyau vitunnakam//
Ca.6.18.177 sārivāṃ pauṣkaraṃ mūlaṃ karkaṭākhyāṃ rasāñjanam/
Ca.6.18.181 &svarabhede ca kāse ca lehametaṃ prayojayet/
Ca.6.18.186 kṣatakāse ca ye dhūmāḥ sānupānā nidarśitāḥ/
Ca.6.18.187 dīpanaṃ bṛṃhaṇaṃ caiva srotasāṃ ca viśodhanam/
Ca.6.18.190 bhojyaṃ pānāni sarpīṃṣi &lehāśca saha pānakaiḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.18.191 tatra ślokaḥ---

lg.l: kāsānāṃ bheḍajaṃ proktaṃ garīyastvaṃ ca kāsinaḥ//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne kāsacikitsitaṃ nāmāṣṭādaśo+adhyāyaḥ//18//

div.head: ekonaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.19.1 athāto+atīsāracikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.19.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

Ca.6.19.3 bhagavantaṃ khalvātreyaṃ kṛtāhnikaṃ hutāgnihotramāsīnamṛṣigaṇaparivṛtamuttare himavataḥ pārśve vinayādupetyābhivādya cāgniveśa uvāca --- bhagavan! atīsārasya prāgutpattinimittalakṣaṇopaśamanāni prajānugrahārthamākhyātumarhasīti//
Ca.6.19.4 atha bhagavān punarvasurātreyastadagniveśavacanamanuniśamyovāca --- śrūyatāmagniveśa! sarvametadakhilena vākhyāyamānam/
ādikāle khalu yajñeṣu paśavaḥ samālabhanīyā babhūvurnālambhāya prakriyante sma/
tato dakṣayajñaṃ pratyavarakālaṃ manoḥ putrāṇāṃ nariṣyannābhāgekṣvākunṛgaśaryātyādīnāṃ kratuṣu paśūnāmevābhyanujñānāt paśavaḥ prokṣaṇamavāpuḥ/
ataśca pratyavarakālaṃ pṛṣadhreṇa dīrghasatreṇa yajatā paśūnāmalābhādgavāmālambhaḥ pravartitaḥ/
taṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitā bhūtagaṇāḥ, teṣāṃ copayogādupākṛtānāṃ gavāṃ &gauravādauṣṇyādasātmyatvādaśastopayogāccopahatāgnīnāmupahatamanasāṃ cātīsāraḥ pūrvamutpannaḥ pṛṣadhrayajñe//

Ca.6.19.5 athāvarakālaṃ vātalasya vātātapavyāyāmātimātriniṣeviṇo rūkṣālpapramitāśinastīkṣṇamadyavyavāyanityasyodāvartayataśca vegān vāyuḥ; prakopamāpadyate, paktā copahanyate; sa vāyuḥ kupito+agnāvupahate mūtrasvedau purīṣāśayamupahṛtya, tābhyāṃ purīṣaṃ dravīkṛtya, atīsārāya prakalpate/

tasya rūpāṇi---vijjalamāmaṃ viplutamavasādi rūkṣaṃ dravaṃ saśūlamāmagandhamīṣacchabdamaśabdaṃ vā vibaddhamūtravātamatisāryate purīṣaṃ, vāyuścāntaḥkoṣṭhe saśabdaśūlastiryak carati vibaddha ityāmātisāro vātāt/

pakvaṃ vā vibaddhamalpālpaṃ saśabdaṃ saśūlaphenapicchāparikartikaṃ hṛṣṭaromā viniḥśvasañ śuṣkamukhaḥ kaṭyūrutrikajānupṛṣṭhapārśvaśūlī bhraṣṭagudo muhurmuhurvigrathitamupaveśyate purīṣaṃ vātāt; tamāhuranugrathitamityeke, vātānugrathitavarcastvāt//
Ca.6.19.6 pittalasya punaramlalavaṇakaṭukakṣāroṣṇatīkṣṇātimātraniṣeviṇaḥ pratatāgnisūryasaṃtāpoṣṇamārutopahatagātrasya krodherṣyābahulasya pittaṃ prakopamāpadyate/
tat prakupitaṃ dravatvādūṣmāṇamupahatya purīṣāśayavisṛtamauṣṇyād dravatvāt saratvācca bhittvā purīṣamatisārāya prakalpate/
tasya rūpāṇi---hāridraṃ haritaṃ nīlaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ &raktapittopahitamatidurgandhamatisāryate purīṣaṃ, tṛṣṇādāhasvedamūrcchāśūlabradhnasaṃtāpapākaparīta iti pittātisāraḥ//
Ca.6.19.7 śleṣmalasya tu gurumadhuraśītasnigdhopasevinaḥ saṃpūrakasyācintayato divāsvapnaparasyālasasya śleṣmāprakopamāpadyate/
sa svabhāvād gurumadhuraśītasnigdhaḥ srasto+agnimupahatya saumyasvabhāvāt purīṣāśayamupahatyopapledya purīṣamatisārāya kalpate/

tasya rūpāṇi---snigdhaṃ śvetaṃ picchilaṃ tantumadāmaṃ guru durgandhaṃ śleṣmopahitamanubaddhaśūlamalpālpamabhīkṣṇamatisāryate sapravāhikaṃ, gurūdaragudabastivaṃkṣaṇadeśaḥ kṛte+apyakṛtasaṃjñaḥ salomaharṣaḥ sotkleśo nidrālasyaparītaḥ sadano+annadveṣī ceti śleṣmātisāraḥ//

Ca.6.19.8 atiśītasnigdharūkṣoṣṇagurukharakaṭhinaviṣamaviruddhāsātmyabhojanādabhojanāt kālātītabhojanād yatkiṃcidabhyavaharaṇāt praduṣṭamadyapānīyapānādatimadyapānādasaṃśodhanāt pratikarmaṇāṃ viṣamagamanādanupacārājjvalanādityapavanasalilātisevanādasvapnādatisvapnādvegavidhārāṇādṛtuviparyayādayathābalamārambhādbhayaśokacittodvegātiyogāt kṛmiśoṣajvarārśovikārātikarṣaṇādvā vyāpannāgnestrayo doṣāḥ prakupitā bhūya evāgnimupahatya pakvāśayamanupraviśyātīsāraṃ sarvadoṣaliṅgaṃ janayanti//
Ca.6.19.9 api ca śoṇitādīn &dhātūnatiprakṛṣṭaṃ dūṣayanto dhātudoṣasvabhāvakṛtānatīsāravarṇānupadarśayanti/

tatra śoṇitādiṣu dhātuṣvatipraduṣṭeṣu hāridraharitanīlamāñjiṣṭhamāṃsadhāvanasannikāśaṃ raktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ śvetaṃ varāhabhedaḥsadṛśamanubaddhavedanamavedanaṃ vā samāsavyatyāsādupaveśyate śakṛd grathitamāmaṃ sakṛt, sakṛdapi pakvamanatikṣīṇamāṃsaśoṇitabalo mandāgnirvihatamukharasaśca; tādṛśamāturaṃ kṛcchrasādhyaṃ vidyāt/

ebhirvarṇairatisāryamāṇaṃ sopadravamāturamasādhyo+ayamiti pratyācakṣīta; tadyathā---pakvaṃśoṇitābhaṃ yakṛtkhaṇḍopamaṃ medomāṃsodakasannikāśaṃ dadhighṛtamajjatailavasākṣīravesavārābhamatinīlamatiraktamatikṛṣṇamudakamivācchaṃ punarmecakābhamatisnigdhaṃ haritanīlakaṣāyavarṇaṃ karburamāvilaṃ picchilaṃ tantumadāmaṃ candrakopagatamatikuṇapapūtipūyagandhyāmāmamatsyagandhi &makṣikākāntaṃ kuthitabahudhātusrāvamalpapurīṣamapurīṣaṃ vā+atisāryamāṇaṃ tṛṣṇādāhajvarabhramatamakahikkāśvāsānubandhamativedanamavedanaṃ vava srastapakvagudaṃ paritagudavaliṃ muktanālamatikṣīṇabalamāṃsaśoṇitaṃ sarvaparvāsthiśūlinamarocakāratipralāpasaṃmohaparītaṃ sahasoparatavikāramatisāriṇamacikitsyaṃ vidyāt; iti sannipātātisāraḥ//
Ca.6.19.10 tamasādhyatāmasaṃprāptaṃ cikitsed yathāpradhānopakrameṇa hetūpaśayadoṣaviśeṣaparīkṣayā ceti//

lg.l: Ca.6.19.12 māruto bhayaśokābhyāṃ śīghraṃ hi parikupyati/
Ca.6.19.13 ityuktāḥ ṣaḍatīsārāḥ, sādhyānāṃ sādhanaṃ tvataḥ/
Ca.6.19.15 na tu saṃgrahaṇaṃ deyaṃ pūrvamāmātisāriṇe/
Ca.6.19.20 pippalī nāgaraṃ dhānyaṃ bhūtīkamabhayā vacā/
Ca.6.19.21 pṛśniparṇī śvadaṃṣṭrā ca samaṅgā kaṇṭakārikā/
Ca.6.19.27 śaṭīṃ palāśaṃ hapuṣāṃ vacāṃ jīrakapippalīm/
Ca.6.19.28 vṛkṣāmlaṃ dāḍimāmlaṃ ca sahiṅgu biḍasaindhavam/
Ca.6.19.31 yūṣeṇa mūlakānāṃ taṃ badarāṇāmathāpi vā/
Ca.6.19.33 loṇikāyāḥ sapāṭhāyāḥ śuṣkaśākena vā punaḥ/
Ca.6.19.35 yavānāṃ mudgamāṣāṇāṃ śālīnāṃ ca tilasya ca/
Ca.6.19.37 dadhnaḥ saraṃ vā yamake bhṛṣṭaṃ saguḍanāgaram/
surāṃ vā yamake bhṛṣṭāṃ vyañjanārthe pradāpayet//
Ca.6.19.38 phalāmlaṃ yamake bhṛṣṭaṃ yūṣaṃ gṛñjanakasya vā/
Ca.6.19.40 antarādhirasaṃ pūtvā raktaṃ meṣasya cobhayam/
Ca.6.19.48 yamakasyopari kṣīraṃ dhāroṣṇaṃ vā pibennaraḥ/
Ca.6.19.49 evaṃ kṣīraprayogeṇa raktaṃ picchā ca śāmyati/

div.p: Ca.6.19.50 pittātisāraṃ punarnidānopaśayākṛtibhirāmānvayamupalabhya yathābalaṃ laṅghanapācanābhyāmupācaret/
tṛṣyatastu mustaparpaṭakośīrasārivācandanakirātatiktakodīcyavāribhirupacāraḥ/
laṅghitasya cāhārakāle balātibalāsūrpaparṇīśālaparṇīpṛśniparṇībṛhatīkaṇṭakārikāśatāvarīśvadaṃṣṭrāniryūhasaṃyuktena yathāsātmyaṃ yavāgūmaṇḍādinā tarpaṇādinā vā krameṇopacāraḥ/
mudgamasūrahareṇumakuṣṭhakāḍhakīyūṣairvā lavakapiñjalaśaśahariṇaiṇakālapucchakarasairīṣadamlairanamlairvā kramaśo+agniṃ sandhukṣayet/
anubandhe tvasya dīpanīyapācanīyopaśamanīyasaṃgrahaṇīyān yogān saṃprayojayediti//

lg.l: Ca.6.19.53 candanaṃ ca bhṛṇālaṃ ca nāgaraṃ lodhramutpalam/
Ca.6.19.58 bahudoṣasya dīptāgneḥ saprāṇasya na tiṣṭhati/
Ca.6.19.62 śatapuṣpāvarībhyāṃ ca payasā madhukena ca/
Ca.6.19.65 suśuṣkāṃ mṛttikāṃ jñātvā tāni vṛntāni śālmaleḥ/
Ca.6.19.66 piṇḍaṃ muṣṭisamaṃ prasthe tat pūtaṃ tailasarpiṣoḥ/
snātvā bhuñjīta payasā jāṅgalānāṃ rasena vā//
Ca.6.19.69 pittātisārī yastvetāṃ kriyāṃ muktvā niṣevate/
tṛṣṇāṃ śūlaṃ vidāhaṃ ca gudapākaṃ ca dāruṇam//
Ca.6.19.71 tatra cchāgaṃ payaḥ śastaṃ śītaṃ samadhuśarkaram/
Ca.6.19.72 audanaṃ raktaśālīnāṃ payasā tena bhojayet/
Ca.6.19.74 rudhiraṃ mārgamājaṃ vā ghṛtabhṛṣṭaṃ praśasyate/
Ca.6.19.76 durbalaṃ pāyayitvā vā tasyaivopari bhojayet/
raktātisāraṃ pītvā vā tayā siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ naraḥ//
Ca.6.19.79 ghṛtaṃ yavāgūmaṇḍena kuṭajasya phalaiḥ śṛtam/
Ca.6.19.80 tvak ca dāruharidrāyāḥ kuṭajasya phalāni ca/
ājena payasā pītaḥ sadyo raktaṃ niyacchati//
Ca.6.19.85 palaṃ vatsakabījasya śrapayitvā rasaṃ pibet/
yo rasāśī jayecchīghraṃ sa paittaṃ jaṭharāmayam//
tathā sravati no raktaṃ gudaṃ taiḥ pratisāritam//
Ca.6.19.91 pakvatā praśamaṃ yāti vedanā copaśāmyati/
Ca.6.19.94 yadā vāyurvibaddhaśca kṛcchraṃ carati vā na vā/
Ca.6.19.97 balaṃ tasya sapittasya jayārthe bastiruttamaḥ/
Ca.6.19.99 kṣaudrapādaṃ jayecchīgraṃ taṃ vikāraṃ hitāśinaḥ/
Ca.6.19.100 ahorātraṃ jale tapte ghṛtaṃ tenāmbhasā pacet/
Ca.6.19.101 adho vā yadi vā+apyūrdhvaṃ yasya raktaṃ pravartate/
Ca.6.19.102 dāruṇaṃ sa valīpākaṃ prāpya śīghraṃ vipadyate/
Ca.6.19.105 vacā viḍaṅgaṃ bhūtīkaṃ dhānyakaṃ devadāru ca/
dhātakī nāgaraṃ bilvaṃ lodhraṃ padmasya keśaram//
Ca.6.19.110 jambūtvaṅnāgaraṃ dhānyaṃ pāṭhā mocaraso balā/
Ca.6.19.111 kapitthāni viḍaṅgāni nāgaraṃ maricāni ca/
Ca.6.19.113 kaṭphalaṃ madhuyuktaṃ vā mucyate jaṭharāmayāt/
kaṇāṃ madhuyutāṃ pītvā takraṃ pītvā sacitrakam//
Ca.6.19.114 jagdhvā vā bālabilvāni mucyate jaṭharāmayāt/
Ca.6.19.119 pratyāgate sukhaṃ snātaṃ kṛtāhāraṃ dinātyaye/
Ca.6.19.121 sve sthāne māruto+avaśyaṃ vardhate kaphasaṃkṣaye/
sa vṛddhaḥ sahasā hanyāttasmāttaṃ tvarayā jayet//
Ca.6.19.122 vātasyānu jayet pittaṃ, pittasyānu jayet kapham/
trayāṇāṃ vā jayet pūrvaṃ yo bhavedbalavattamaḥ//

div.p: Ca.6.19.123 tatra ślokaḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne+atisāracikitsitaṃ nāmaikonaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//19//

div.head: viṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.20.1 athātaśchardicikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.20.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.20.4 yāśchardayaḥ pañca purā tvayoktā rogādhikāre bhiṣajāṃ variṣṭha!/
tāsāṃ cikitsāṃ sanidānaliṅgāṃ yathāvadācakṣva nṛṇāṃ hitārtham//
Ca.6.20.5 tadagniveśasya vaco niśamya prīto bhiṣakśreṣṭha idaṃ jagāda/
yāśchardayaḥ pañca purā mayoktāstā vistareṇa bruvato nibadha//
tāsāṃ hṛdutkleśakaphaprasekau dveṣo+aśane caiva hi pūrvarūpam//
Ca.6.20.9 udgāraśabdaprabalaṃ saphenaṃ vicchinnakṛṣṇaṃ tanukaṃ kaṣāyam/
kṛcchreṇa cālpaṃ mahatā ca vegenārto+anilācchardayatīha duḥkham//
pītaṃ bhṛśoṣṇaṃ haritaṃ satiktaṃ dhūmraṃ ca pittena vamet sadāham//
uraḥ śiro marma rasāyanīśca sarvāḥ samāvṛtya vamiṃ karoti//
snigdhaṃ ghanaṃ svādu kaphādviśuddhaṃ salomaharṣo+alparujaṃ vamettu//
sarve prakopaṃ yugapat prapannāśchardiṃ tridoṣāṃ janayanti doṣāḥ//
Ca.6.20.16 viṭsvedamūtrāmbuvahāni vāyuḥ srotāṃsi saṃrudhya yadordhvameti/
utsannadoṣasya samācitaṃ taṃ doṣaṃ samuddhūya narasya koṣṭhāt//
Ca.6.20.19 kṣīṇasya yā chardiratipravṛddhā sopadravā śoṇitapūyayuktā/
sacandridāṃ tāṃ pravadantyasādhyāṃ sādhyāṃ cikitsedanupadravāṃ ca//
Ca.6.20.20 āmāśayotkleśabhavā hi sarvāśchardyo matā laṅghanameva tasmāt/
Ca.6.20.21 cūrṇāni ligyānmadhunā+abhayānāṃ hṛdyāni vā yāni virecanāni/
madyaiḥ payobhiśca yutāni yuktyā nayantyadho doṣamudīrṇamūrdhvam//
Ca.6.20.22 vallīphalādyairvamanaṃ pibedvā yo durbalastaṃ śamanaiścikitset/
Ca.6.20.24 &vātātmikāyāṃ hṛdayadravārto naraḥ pibet saindhavavadghṛtaṃ tu/
siddhaṃ tathā dhānyakanāgarābhyāṃ dadhnā ca toyena ca dāḍimasya//
Ca.6.20.25 vyoṣeṇa yuktāṃ lavaṇaistribhiśca ghṛtasya mātrāmathavā vidadhyāt/
snigdhāni gṛdyāni ca bhojanāni rasaiḥ sayūṣairdadhidāḍimāmlaiḥ//
Ca.6.20.27 śuddhāya kāle madhuśarkarābhyāṃ lājaiśca manthaṃ yadi vā+api peyām/
kharjūramāṃsānyatha nārikelaṃ drākṣāmatho vā badarāṇi lihyāt//
Ca.6.20.30 drākṣārasaṃ vā+api pibet suśītaṃ mṛdbhṛṣṭaloṣṭaprabhavaṃ jalaṃ vā/
jambvāmrayoḥ pallavajaṃ kaṣāyaṃ pibet suśītaṃ madhusaṃyutaṃ vā//
Ca.6.20.31 niśi sthitaṃ vāri samudgakṛṣṇaṃ sośīradhānyaṃ caṇakodakaṃ vā/
gavedhukāmūlajalaṃ guḍūcyā jalaṃ pibedikṣurasaṃ payo vā//
Ca.6.20.32 sevayaṃ pibet kāñcanagairikaṃ vā sabālakaṃ taṇḍuladhāvanena/
Ca.6.20.35 godhūmaśālīn sayavān purāṇān yūṣaiḥ paṭolāmṛtacitrakāṇām/
vyoṣasya nimbasya ca takrasiddhairyūṣaiḥ phalāmlaiḥ kaṭubhistathā+adyāt//
Ca.6.20.36 rasāṃśca śūlyāni ca jāṅgalānāṃ māṃsāni jīrṇānmadhusīdhvariṣṭān/
Ca.6.20.38 sajāmbavaṃ vā &badarāmlacūrṇaṃ mustāyutāṃ karkaṭakasya śṛṅgīm/
Ca.6.20.39 manaḥśilāyāḥ phalapūrakasya rasaiḥ kapitthasya ca pippalīnām/
Ca.6.20.40 yaiṣā pṛthaktvena mayā kriyoktā tāṃ sannipāte+api &samasya buddhyā/
Ca.6.20.41 manobhighāte tu manonukūlā vācaḥ samāśvāsanaharṣaṇāni/
lokaprasiddhāḥ śrutayo vayasyāḥ śṛṅgārikāścaiva hitā vihārāḥ//
Ca.6.20.43 yūṣā rasāḥ kāmbalikā khaḍāśca māṃsāni dhānā vividhāśca bhakṣyāḥ/
phalāni mūlāni ca gandhavarṇarasairupetāni vamiṃ jayanti//
Ca.6.20.44 gandhaṃ rasaṃ sparśamathāpi śabdaṃ rūpaṃ ca yadyat priyamapyasātmyam/
tadeva dadyāt praśamāya tasyāstajjo hi rogaḥ sukha eva jetum//
Ca.6.20.45 chardyutthitānāṃ ca cikitsitāt svāccikitsitaṃ kāryamupadravāṇām/
vṛṣyāstathā māṃsarasāḥ salehāściraprasaktāṃ ca vamiṃ jayanti//

div.p: Ca.6.20.48 tatra ślokaḥ---

lg.l: hetuṃ saṃkhyāṃ lakṣaṇamupadravān sādhyatāṃ na yogāṃśca/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne chardicikitsitaṃ nāma viṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//20//

div.head: ekaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.21.1 athāto visarpacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.21.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.21.8 sa nāmnā kena vijñeyaḥ saṃjñitaḥ kena hetunā/
kathaṃ kairlakṣaṇaiḥ kiṃ ca bhagavan! tasya bheṣajam//
Ca.6.21.11 vividhaṃ sarpati yato visarpastena sa smṛtaḥ/
Ca.6.21.12 sa ca saptavidho doṣairvijñeyaḥ saptadhātukaḥ/
Ca.6.21.15 raktaṃ lasīkā tvaṅnāṃsaṃ dūṣyaṃ doṣāstrayo malāḥ/
Ca.6.21.28 yasya sarvāṇi liṅgāni balavadyasya kāraṇam/
yasya copadravāḥ kaṣṭā marmago yaśca hanti saḥ//
Ca.6.21.29 rūkṣoṣṇaiḥ kevalo vāyuḥ pūraṇairvā samāvṛtaḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.21.30 tasya rūpāṇi --- bhramadavathupipāsānistodaśūlāṅgamardodveṣṭanakampajvaratamakakāsāsthisaṃdhibhedaviśleṣaṇavepanārocakāvipākāścakṣuṣorākulatvamasrāgamanaṃ pipīlikāsaṃcāra iva cāṅgeṣu, yasmiṃścāvakāśe visarpo &visarpati so+avakāśaḥ śyāvāruṇābhāsaḥ śvayathumān nistodabhedaśūlāyāmasaṃkocaharṣasphuraṇairatimātraṃ prapīḍyate, anupakrāntaścopacīyate śīghrabhedaiḥ sphoṭakaistanubhiraruṇābhaiḥ śyāvairvā tanuviśadāruṇālpāsrāvaiḥ, vibaddhavātamūtrapurīṣaśca bhavati, nidānoktāni cāsya nopaśerate viparītāni copaśerata iti vātavisarpaḥ//

Ca.6.21.32 tasya rūpāṇi---jvarastṛṣṇā mūrcchā mohaśchardirarocako+aṅgabhedaḥ svedo+atimātramantardāhaḥ pralāpaḥ śiroruk cakṣuṣorākulatvamasvapnamaratirbhramaḥ śītavātavāritarṣo+atimātraṃ haritahāridranetramūtravarcastvaṃ haritahāridrarūpadarśanaṃ ca, yasmiṃścāvakāśe visarpo+anusarpati so+avakāśastāmraharitahāridranīlakṛṣṇaraktānāṃ varṇānāmanyatamaṃ puṣyati, sotsedhaiścātimātraṃ dāhasaṃbhedanaparītaiḥ sphoṭakairupacīyate tulyavarṇāsrāvaiścirapākaiśca, nidānoktāni cāsya nopaśerate viparītāni copaśerati iti pittavisarpaḥ//

Ca.6.21.34 tasya rūpāṇi---śītakaḥ śītajvaro gauravaṃ nidrā tandrā+arocako madhurāsyatvamāsyopalepo niṣṭhīvikā chardirālasyaṃ staimityamagnināśo daurbalyaṃ ca, yasmiṃścāvakāśe visarpo+anusarpati so+avakāśaḥ śvayathumān pāṇḍurnātiraktaḥ snehasuptistambhagauravairanvito+alpavedanaḥ kṛcchrapākaiścirakāribhirbahulatvagupalepaiḥ sphoṭaiḥ śvetapāṇḍubhiranubadhyate, prabhinnastu śvetaṃ picchilaṃ tantumadghanamanubaddhaṃ snigdhamāsrāvaṃ sravati, ūrdhvaṃ ca gurubhiḥ sthirairjālāvatataiḥ snigdhairbahulatvagupalepairvraṇairanubadhyate+anuṣaṅgī ca bhavati, śvetanakhanayanavadanatvaṅmūtravarcastvaṃ, nidānoktāni cāsya nopaśerate viparītāni copaśerata iti śleṣmavisarpaḥ//

Ca.6.21.36 tadupatāpādāturaḥ sarvaśarīramaṅgārairivākīryamāṇaṃ manyate, chardyatīsāramūrcchādāhamohajvaratamakārocakāsthisaṃdhibhedatṛṣṇāvipākāṅgabhedādibhiścābhibhūyate, yaṃ yaṃ cāvakāśaṃ visarpo+anusarpati so+avakāśaḥ śāntāṅgāraprakāśo+atirakto vā bhavati, agnidagdhaprakāraiśca sphoṭairupacīyate, sa śīghragatvādāśveva marmānusārī bhavati, marmaṇi copatapte pavano+atibalo bhinattyaṅgānyatimātraṃ pramohayati saṃjñāṃ, hikkāśvāsau janayati, nāśayati nidrāṃ, sa naṣṭanidraḥ pramūḍhasaṃjño vyathitacetā na kvacana sukhamupalabhate, aratiparītaḥ sthānādāsanācchayyāṃ krāntumicchati, kliṣṭabhūyiṣṭaścāśu nidrāṃ bhajati, durbalo duḥkhaprabodhaśca bhavati; tamevaṃvidhamagnivisarpaparītamacikitsyaṃ vidyāt//

lg.l: Ca.6.21.37 kaphapittaṃ prakupittaṃ balavat svena hetunā/

div.p: Ca.6.21.38 tadvikārāḥ---śītajvaraḥ śirogurutvaṃ dāhaḥ staimityamaṅgāvasadanaṃ nidrā tandrā moho+annadveṣaḥ pralāpo+agnināśo daurbalyamasthibhedo mūrcchā pipāsā srotasāṃ pralepo jāḍyamindriyāṇāṃ prāyopaveśanamaṅgavikṣepo+aṅgamardo+aratirautsukyaṃ copajāyate, prāyaścāmāśaye visarpatyalasaka ekadeśagrāhī ca, yasmiṃścāvakāśe visarpo visarpati so+avakāśo raktapītapāṇḍupiḍakāvakīrṇa iva mecakābhaḥ kālo malinaḥ snidho bahūṣmā guruḥ stimitavedanaḥ śvayathumān gambhīrapāko nirāsrāvaḥ śīghrakledaḥ svinnaklinnapūtimāṃsatvak keameṇālparuk parāmṛṣṭo+avadīryate kardama ivāvapīḍito+antaraṃ prayacchatyupaklinnapūtimāṃsatyāgī sirāsnāyusaṃdarśī kuṇapagandhī ca bhavati saṃjñāsmṛtihantā ca; taṃ kardamavisarpaparītamacikitsyaṃ vidyāt//

Ca.6.21.39 sthiragurukaṭhinamadhuraśītasnigdhānnapānābhiṣyandisevināmavyāyāmādisevināmapratikarmaśīlānāṃ śleṣmā vāyuśca prakopamāpadyate, tāvubhau duṣṭapravṛddhāvatibalau pradūṣya dūṣyān visarpāya kalpete; tatra vāyuḥ śleṣmaṇā vibaddhamārgastameva śleṣmāṇamanekadhā bhindan krameṇa granthimālāṃ kṛcchrapākasādhyāṃ kaphāśaye saṃjanayati, utsannaraktasya vā pradūṣya raktaṃ sirāsnāyumāṃsatvagāśritaṃ granthīnāṃ mālāṃ kurute tīvrarujānāṃ sthūlānāmaṇūnāṃ vā dīrghavṛttaraktānāṃ, tadupatāpājjvarātisārakāsahikkāśvāsaśoṣapramohavaivarṇyārocakāvipākaprasekacchardirmūrcchaṅgabhaṅganidrāratisadanādyāḥ prādurbhavantyupadravāḥ; sa etairupadrutaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ viṣayamatipatito vivarjanīyo bhavatīti granthivisarpaḥ//
Ca.6.21.40 upadravastu khalu rogottarakālajo rogāśrayo roga eva sthūlo+aṇurvā, rogāt paścājjāyata ityupadravasaṃjñaḥ/
tatra pradhāno vyādhiḥ, &vyādherguṇabhūta upadravaḥ, tasya prāyaḥ pradhānapraśame praśamo bhavati/
sa tu pīḍākarataro bhavati paścādutpadyamāno vyādhiparikliṣṭaśarīratvāt; tasmādupadravaṃ tvaramāṇo+abhibādheta//
Ca.6.21.41 sarvāyatanasamutthaṃ sarvaliṅgavyāpinaṃ sarvadhātvanusāriṇamāśukāriṇaṃ mahātyayikamiti sannipātavisarpamacikitsyaṃ vidyāt//

Ca.6.21.42 tatra vātapittaśleṣmanimittā visarpāstrayaḥ sādhyābhavanti; agnikardamākhyau punaranupasṛṣṭe marmaṇi anupagate vā sirāsnāyumāṃsaklede sādhāraṇakriyābhirubhāavevābhyasyamānau praśāntimāpadyeyātām, anādaropakrāntaḥ punastayoranyataro hanyāddehamāśvevāśīviṣavat; tathā granthivisarpamajātopadravamārabheta cikitsitum, upadravopadrutaṃ tvenaṃ pariharet; sannipātajaṃ tu sarvadhātvanusāritvādāśukāritvādviruddhopakramatvāccāsādhyaṃ vidyāt//

lg.l: Ca.6.21.44 laṅghanollekhane śaste tiktakānāṃ ca sevanam/
Ca.6.21.47 vātolbaṇe tiktaghṛtaṃ paittike ca praśasyate/
Ca.6.21.48 na ghṛtaṃ bahudoṣāya deyaṃ &yanna virecayet/
Ca.6.21.50 iti vīsarpanut proktaṃ samāsena cikitsitam/
Ca.6.21.51 madanaṃ madhukaṃ nimbaṃ vatsakasya phalāni ca/
visarpe vamanaṃ śastaṃ tathā cendrayavaiḥ saha//
Ca.6.21.53 yāṃśca yogān pravakṣyāmi kalpeṣu kaphapittinām/
nāgapuṣpaṃ ca lodhraṃ ca tenaiva vidhinā pibet//
Ca.6.21.58 drākṣāṃ parpaṭakaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ guḍūcīṃ dhanvayāsakam/
Ca.6.21.59 paṭolaṃ picumardaṃ ca dārvīṃ kaṭukarohiṇīm/
Ca.6.21.64 trivṛccūrṇaṃ samāloḍya sārpiṣā payasā+api vā/
gharmāmbunā vā saṃyojya mṛdvīkānāṃ rasena vā//
Ca.6.21.68 doṣe koṣṭhagate bhūya etat kuryāccikitsitam/
Ca.6.21.70 yathāsannaṃ vikārasya vyadhayedāśu vā sirām/
Ca.6.21.74 kālīyaṃ madhukaṃ hema vanyaṃ candanapadmakau/
Ca.6.21.75 śādvalaṃ ca mṛṇālaṃ ca śaṅkhaṃ candanamutpalam/
vetasasya ca mūlāni pradehaḥ syāt sataṇḍulaḥ//
Ca.6.21.78 yāvakāḥ saktavaścaiva sarpiṣā saha yojitāḥ/
Ca.6.21.80 yavacūrṇaṃ samadhukaṃ saghṛtaṃ ca pralepanam/
Ca.6.21.81 pṛthak pṛthak pradehāḥ syuḥ sarve vā sarpiṣā saha/
Ca.6.21.82 śaṅkhaḥ pravālaḥ śuktirvā gairikaṃ vā ghṛtāplutam/
&(pṛhtagete pradehāśca hitā jñeyā visarpiṇām/) prapauṇḍarīkaṃ madhukaṃ balā śālūkamutpalam//
bisāni ca mṛṇālaṃ ca saghṛtāśca kaśerukāḥ//
Ca.6.21.91 triphalāṃ madhukaṃ vīrāṃ śirīṣakusurmāni ca/
Ca.6.21.93 vātapittolbaṇe ye tu pradehāste ghṛtādhikāḥ/
secanāste pradehā ye ta eva ghṛtasādhanāḥ//
Ca.6.21.99 kṣaṇe kṣaṇe prayoktavyāḥ pūrvamuddhṛtya lepanam/
Ca.6.21.100 deyāḥ pradehāḥ kaphaje paryādhānoddṛte ghanāḥ/
Ca.6.21.101 nātisnigdho na rūkṣaśca na piṇḍo na dravaḥ samaḥ/
Ca.6.21.102 na ca tenaiva lepena punarjātu pralepayet/
Ca.6.21.103 lepo hyupari paṭṭasya kṛtaḥ svedayati vraṇam/
tvaci na śliṣyate samyaṅna doṣaṃ śamayatyapi//
Ca.6.21.106 tanvāliptaṃ na kurvīta saṃśuṣko hyāpuṭāyate/
na cauṣadhiraso vyādhiṃ prāpnotyapi ca śuṣyati//
Ca.6.21.113 raktāḥ śvetā mahāhvāśca śālayaḥ ṣaṣṭikaiḥ saha/
yeṣāṃ nātyucitaḥ śālirnarā ye ca kaphādhikāḥ//
Ca.6.21.120 ūrdhvaṃ cādhaśca śuddhāya rakte cāpyavasecite/
Ca.6.21.125 balāṃ nāgabalāṃ pathyāṃ bhūrjagranthiṃ bibhītakam/
Ca.6.21.127 bahirmārgasthitaṃ granthiṃ kiṃ punaḥ kaphasaṃbhavam/
Ca.6.21.133 athāsya dāhaḥ kṣāreṇa &śarairhemnā+atha vā hitaḥ/
Ca.6.21.135 dhūmo virekaḥ śirasaḥ svedanaṃ parimardanam/
Ca.6.21.137 kampillakaṃ viḍaṅgāni dārvīṃ kārañjakaṃ phalam/
Ca.6.21.139 ya eva vidhiruddiṣṭo granthīnāṃ vinivṛttaye/
Ca.6.21.142 visarpo na hyasaṃsṛṣṭo raktapittena jāyate/
Ca.6.21.143 viśeṣo doṣavaiṣamyānna ca noktaḥ samāsataḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.21.144 tatra ślokāḥ---

lg.l: Ca.6.21.145 liṅgānyupadravā ye ca yallakṣaṇa upadravaḥ/
sādhyatvaṃ, na ca, sādhyānāṃ sādhanaṃ ca yathākramam//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne visarpacikitsitaṃ nāmaikaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//21//

div.head: dvāviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.22.1 athātastṛṣṇācikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.22.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.22.7 pītaṃ pītaṃ hi jalaṃ śoṣayatastāvato na yāti śamam/
tṛṣṇodbhūtā kurute, pañcavidhāṃ liṅgataḥ śṛṇu tām//
Ca.6.22.11 abdhātuṃ dehasthaṃ kupitaḥ pavano yadā viśoṣayati/
Ca.6.22.12 nidrānāśaḥ śiraso bhramastathā śuṣkavirasamukhatā ca sroto+avarodha iti ca syālliṅgaṃ vātatṛṣṇāyāḥ//
Ca.6.22.13 pittaṃ matamāgneyaṃ kupitaṃ cettāpayatyapāṃ dhātum/
saṃtaptaḥ sa hi janayettṛṣṇāṃ dāholbaṇāṃ nṝṇām//
Ca.6.22.14 tiktāsyatvaṃ śiraso dāhaḥ śītābhinandatā mūrcchā/
Ca.6.22.16 deho rasajo+ambubhavo rasaśca tasya kṣayācca tṛṣyeddhi/
Ca.6.22.17 bhavati khalu yopasargāttṛṣṇā sā śoṣiṇī kaṣṭā/
Ca.6.22.19 nāgniṃ vinā hi tarṣaḥ pavanādvā tau hi śoṣaṇe hetū/
Ca.6.22.22 taptāsviva sikatāsu hi toyamāśu śuṣyati kṣiptam/
Ca.6.22.23 śiśirasnātasyoṣmā ruddhaḥ koṣṭhaṃ prapadya tarṣayati/
Ca.6.22.25 apāṃ kṣayāddhi tṛṣṇā saṃśoṣya naraṃ praṇāśayedāśu/
Ca.6.22.26 kiñcittuvarānurasaṃ tanu laghu śītalaṃ sugandhi surasaṃ ca/
Ca.6.22.28 vāṭyaṃ vā++āmayavānāṃ śītaṃ madhuśarkarāyutaṃ dadyāt/
Ca.6.22.29 payasā śṛtena bhojanamathavā madhuśarkarāyutaṃ yojyam/
śastā rasāḥ payo vā taiḥ siddhaṃ śarkarāmadhumat//
Ca.6.22.32 madhuraiḥ sajīvanīyaiḥ śītaiśca satiktakaiḥ śṛtaṃ kṣīram/
Ca.6.22.33 tajjaṃ vā ghṛtamiṣṭaṃ pānābhyaṅgeṣu nasyamapi ca syāt/
Ca.6.22.40 vātaghnamannapānaṃ mṛdu laghu śītaṃ ca vātatṛṣṇāyām/
madhu pakvaloṣṭameva ca jale sthitaṃ śītalaṃ peyam//
Ca.6.22.43 lohitaśāliprasthaḥ salodhramadhukāñjanotpalaḥ kṣuṇṇaḥ &pakvāmaloṣṭajalamadhusamāyuto mṛnmaye peyaḥ//
yaccoktaṃ kaphajāyāṃ vamyāṃ taccaiva kāryaṃ syāt//
Ca.6.22.50 kṣayakāsena tu tulyā kṣayatṛṣṇā sā garīyasī nṝṇām/
śiśirasnātaḥ pānaṃ madyāmbu guḍāmbu vā tṛṣitaḥ//
Ca.6.22.53 madhyāmbu vā+ambu koṣṇaṃ balavāṃstṛṣitaḥ samullikhet pītvā/
chāgo vā ghṛtabhṛṣṭaḥ śīto madhuro raso hṛdyaḥ//
Ca.6.22.56 snigdhe+anne bhukte yā tṛṣṇā syāttāṃ guḍāmbunā śamayet/
plīhni ca toyaṃ na hitaṃ kāmamasahye pibedalpam//
Ca.6.22.60 pūrvamayāturaḥ san dīnastṛṣṇārdito jalaṃ kāṅkṣan/
Ca.6.22.62 tasyāṃ vinivṛttāyāṃ tajjanya upadravaḥ sukhaṃ jetum/

div.p: Ca.6.22.63 tatra ślokaḥ---

lg.l: hetū yathā+agnipavanau kurutaḥ sopadravāṃ ca pañcānām/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne tṛṣṇārogacikitsitaṃ nāma dvāviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//22//

div.head: trayoviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.23.1 athāto viṣacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.23.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.23.4 amṛtārthaṃ samudre tu mathyamāne surāsuraiḥ/
Ca.6.23.9 sarpāḥ kīṭondurā lūtā vṛścikā gṛhagodhikāḥ/
&daṃṣṭriṇo ye viṣaṃ teṣāṃ daṃṣṭrotthaṃ jaṅgamaṃ matam//
Ca.6.23.11 mustakaṃ pauṣkaraṃ krauñcaṃ vatsanābhaṃ balāhakam/
Ca.6.23.13 saṅkocaṃ markaṭaṃ śṛṅgīviṣaṃ hālāhalaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.23.15 nidrāṃ tandrāṃ klamaṃ dāhaṃ &sapākaṃ lomaharṣaṇam/
Ca.6.23.16 sthāvaraṃ tu jvaraṃ hikkāṃ dantaharṣaṃ galagraham/
Ca.6.23.21 ṣaṣṭhe hikkā, bhaṅgaḥ skandhasya tu saptame+aṣṭame maraṇam/
Ca.6.23.22 sīdatyādye bhramati ca, catuṣpado vepate, tataḥ &śūnyaḥ/
mandāhāro mriyate śvāsena hi caturthavege tu//
Ca.6.23.23 &dhyāyati vihagaḥ prathame vege, prabhrāmyati dvitīye tu/
Ca.6.23.24 laghu rūkṣamāśu viśadaṃ vyavāyi tīkṣṇaṃ vikāsi sūkṣmaṃ ca/
Ca.6.23.26 śīghraṃ vyavāyibhāvādāśu vyāpnoti kevalaṃ deham/
Ca.6.23.32 kṣarati viṣatejasā+asṛk tat khāni nirudhya mārayati jantum/
pītaṃ mṛtasya hṛdi tiṣṭhati daṣṭaviddhayordaṃśadeśe syāt//
Ca.6.23.34 kṣatajaṃ kṣatācca nāyātyetāni bhavanti maraṇaliṅgāni/
syurupakramā yathā ye yatra yojyāḥ śṛṇu tathā tān//
Ca.6.23.38 daṃśāttu viṣaṃ daṣṭasyāvisṛtaṃ veṇikāṃ bhiṣagbaddhvā/
Ca.6.23.39 taṃ daṃśaṃ vā cūṣenmukhena yavacūrṇapāṃśupūrṇena/
Ca.6.23.40 rakte viṣapraduṣṭe duṣyet prakṛtistatastyajet prāṇān/
śītaiḥ skandati tasmin skanne vyapayāti viṣavegaḥ//
Ca.6.23.45 tvaṅmāṃsagataṃ dāho dahati viṣaṃ srāvaṇaṃ harati raktāt/
Ca.6.23.46 ādau hṛdayaṃ rakṣyaṃ tasyāvaraṇaṃ pibedyathālābham/
Ca.6.23.47 ikṣuṃ &supakvamathavā kākaṃ niṣpīḍya tadrasaṃ varaṇam/
Ca.6.23.51 śikhipittārdhayutaṃ syāt palāśabījamagado mṛteṣu varaḥ/
puṣye saṃhṛtya samaṃ piṣṭvā guṭikā vigheyāḥ syuḥ//
doṣasya viṣaṃ yasya sthāne syāttaṃ jayetpūrvam//
Ca.6.23.62 vātasthāne svedo dadhnā natakuṣṭhakalkapānaṃ ca/
Ca.6.23.64 bheṣajamevaṃ kalpyaṃ bhiṣagvidā++ālakṣya sarvadā sarvam/
Ca.6.23.66 carmakaṣāyāḥ kalkaṃ bilvasamaṃ mūrdhni kākapadamasya/
Ca.6.23.67 &chāgaṃ gavyaṃ māhiṣaṃ vā māṃsaṃ kaukkuṭameva vā/
Ca.6.23.70 śvetā vacā+&aśvagandhā hiṅgvamṛtā kuṣṭhasaindhave laśunam/
Ca.6.23.72 vyatyāsabhāvito+ayaṃ nihanti śirasi sthitaṃ viṣaṃ kṣipram/
Ca.6.23.75 arśaḥsvānaddheṣu ca gudalepo yonilepanaṃ strīṇām/
Ca.6.23.77 patrāgurumustailā niryāsāḥ pañca candanaṃ spṛkkā/
Ca.6.23.82 pittena gavāṃ peṣyo guṭikāḥ kāryāstu puṣyayogena/
Ca.6.23.83 pillaṃ kaṇḍūṃ timiraṃ rātryāndhyaṃ kācamarbudaṃ paṭalam/
āśu viṣaṃ nāśayati samūlajamatha kandajaṃ sarvam//
Ca.6.23.85 etena liptagātraḥ sarpān gṛhṇāti bhakṣayecca viṣam/
Ca.6.23.86 ānaddhe gudalepo yonau lepaśca mūḍhagarbhāṇām/
Ca.6.23.88 yatra ca sannihito+ayaṃ na tatra bālagrahā na rakṣāṃsi/
Ca.6.23.89 sarvagrahā na tatra prabhavanti na cāgniśastranṛpacaurāḥ/
Ca.6.23.90 piṣyamāṇa imaṃ cātra siddhaṃ mantramudīrayet/
mama matā jayā nāma &jayo nāmeti me pitā//
Ca.6.23.91 so+ahaṃ jayajayāputro vijayo+atha jayāmi ca/
Ca.6.23.92 sanātanāya kṛṣṇāya bhavāya vibhavāya ca/
Ca.6.23.96 hiṅgu ca kṛṣṇāyuktaṃ kapittharasayuktamagryalavaṇaṃ ca/
Ca.6.23.99 ghṛtayukte natakuṣṭhe bhujagapatiśiraḥ śirīṣapuṣpaṃ ca/
Ca.6.23.101 taruṇapalāśakṣāraṃ srutaṃ paceccūrṇitaiḥ saha samāṃśaiḥ/
Ca.6.23.104 mandāgnitvaṃ kāsaṃ sonmādaṃ nāśayeyuratha puṃsām/
Ca.6.23.106 ripuyuktebhyo nṛbhyaḥ svebhyaḥ strībhyo+athavā bhayaṃ nṛpateḥ/
Ca.6.23.108 dṛṣṭvaivaṃ na tu sahasā bhojyaṃ &kuryāttadannamagnau tu/
sphuṭati ca saśabdamekāvarto vihatārcirapi ca syāt//
Ca.6.23.110 pātrasthaṃ ca vivarṇaṃ bhojyaṃ syānmakṣikāṃśca mārayati/
Ca.6.23.111 pāne nīlā rājī vaivarṇyaṃ svāṃ ca nekṣate chāyām/
Ca.6.23.113 &mukhagetvoṣṭhacimicimā jihvā śūnā jaḍā vivarṇā ca/
tandrā kārśyaṃ ca viṣe pāṇḍutvaṃ codarasthe syāt//
stambhayati khāni nāsāmupahanti darśanaṃ ca dhūmaḥ//
Ca.6.23.121 kūpataḍāgādijalaṃ durgandhaṃ sakaluṣaṃ vivarṇaṃ ca/
pītaṃ śvayathuṃ koṭhān piḍakāśca karoti maraṇaṃ ca//
kuryādbhiṣak cikitsāṃ doṣabalaṃ caiva hi samīkṣya//
Ca.6.23.123 iti mūlaviṣaviśeṣāḥ proktāḥ śṛṇu jaṅgamasyātaḥ/
Ca.6.23.125 darvīkaraḥ paṇī jñeyo maṇḍalī maṇḍalāphaṇaḥ/
Ca.6.23.128 pṛthvarpitaḥ saśothaśca daṃśo maṇḍalinā kṛtaḥ/
Ca.6.23.129 kṛto rājimatā daṃśaḥ picchilaḥ sthiraśophakṛt/
striyā daṣṭo viparyastairetaiḥ puṃsā naro mataḥ//
Ca.6.23.134 sarpo gaudhera(ya)ko nāma godhāyāṃ syāccatuṣpadaḥ/
sarpitaṃ ca bhṛśābādhaṃ, daṃśā ye+anye na te bhṛśāḥ//
Ca.6.23.140 sarpāṇāmeṛva viṇmūtrāt kīṭāḥ syuḥ kīṭasaṃmatāḥ/
Ca.6.23.141 gātraṃ raktaṃ sitaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ śyāvaṃ vā piḍakānvitam/
Ca.6.23.143 daṃśo+akṣigauravaṃ mūrcchā sa rugārtaḥ śvasityapi/
Ca.6.23.144 daṃśasya madhye yat kṛṣṇaṃ śyāvaṃ vā jālakāvṛtam/
Ca.6.23.146 śophaḥ śvetāsitā raktāḥ pītā vā piḍakā jvaraḥ/
Ca.6.23.149 śyāvatvamatha kārṣṇyaṃ vā nānāvarṇatvameva vā/
vṛścikasya viṣaṃ yāti daṃśe paścāttu tiṣṭhati//
Ca.6.23.152 visarpaḥ śvayathuḥ śūlaṃ jvaraśchardirathāpi ca/
Ca.6.23.154 ekadaṃṣṭrārditaḥ śūnaḥ saruk syāt pītakaḥ satṛṭ/
kaṇḍūṃ śothaṃ jvaraṃ mūrcchāṃ saviṣāstu jalaukasaḥ//
Ca.6.23.160 na siddhyanti narā daṣṭāḥ pāṣaṇḍāyataneṣu ca/
Ca.6.23.161 vinaśyantyāśu saṃprāptā daṣṭāḥ sarveṣu marmasu/
(yena kenāpi sarpeṇa saṃbhavaḥ sarva eva ca)//
vṛddhā bālāstvaco muktāḥ sarpā mandaviṣāḥ smṛtāḥ//
Ca.6.23.166 yasya yasya hi doṣasya liṅgādhikyāni lakṣayet/
Ca.6.23.171 suśītaiḥ stambhayet sekaiḥ pradehaiścāpi paittikam/
Ca.6.23.172 viṣeṣvapi ca sarveṣu sarvasthānagateṣu ca/
Ca.6.23.173 vṛścike svedamabhyaṅgaṃ ghṛtena lavaṇena ca/
sekāṃścoṣṇān prayuñjīta bhojyaṃ pānaṃ ca sarpiṣaḥ//
jvaraśca saviṣe liṅgaṃ viparītaṃ tu nirviṣe//
Ca.6.23.180 hṛdvidāhe praseke vā virekavamanaṃ bhṛśam/
Ca.6.23.181 śirogate viṣe nastaḥ kuryānmūlāni buddhimān/
mañjiṣṭhāṃ ca samaṃ piṣṭvā gopittena naraḥ pibet//
Ca.6.23.186 raktaṃ māṃsaṃ ca godhāyāḥ śuṣkaṃ cūrṇīkṛtaṃ hitam/
sarveṣu ca bale dve tu madhūkaṃ madhukaṃ natam//
candanaṃ tagaraṃ kuṣṭhaṃ haridre dve tvageva ca//
Ca.6.23.192 manaḥśilā tamālaśca rasaḥ kaiśara eva ca/
sindhuvārasya mūlaṃ ca śvetā ca girikarṇikā//
Ca.6.23.196 pānaṃ darvīkarairdaṣṭe nasyaṃ samadhu pākalam/
Ca.6.23.197 kāśmaryaṃ vaṭaśuṅgāni pānaṃ maṇḍalināṃ viṣe/
Ca.6.23.198 tagaraṃ kaṭukā kṣaudraṃ hanti rājīmatāṃ viṣam/
Ca.6.23.205 tvacaṃ ca nāgaraṃ caiva samāṃśaṃ ślakṣṇapeṣitam/
Ca.6.23.206 kuṭajasya phalaṃ piṣṭaṃ tagaraṃ jālamālinī/
Ca.6.23.207 vṛścikondurulūtānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ ca viṣaṃ haret/
Ca.6.23.208 sarve+agadā yathādoṣaṃ prayojyāḥ syuḥ kṛkaṇṭake/
Ca.6.23.209 śaṅkhinyārkaṃ payaḥ śuṇṭhī karañjo madhu vārścike/
Ca.6.23.210 mūlāni śvetabhaṇḍīnāṃ vyoṣaṃ sarpiśca matsyaje/
Ca.6.23.211 vātapittaharī cāpi kriyā prāyaḥ praśasyate/
Ca.6.23.212 vacāṃ vaṃśatvacaṃ pāṭhāṃ nataṃ surasamañjarīm/
dve bale nākulīṃ kuṣṭhaṃ śirīṣaṃ rajanīdvayam//
Ca.6.23.214 rohītakasya pittena piṣṭvā tu paramo+agadaḥ/
Ca.6.23.223 sitā vaigandhiko drākṣā payasyā madhukaṃ madhu/
cucūrmaṇḍūkaparṇī ca śākaṃ ca kulakaṃ hitam//
Ca.6.23.235 jaṭharaṃ grahaṇīdoṣo yakṣmā gulmaḥ kṣayo &jvaraḥ/
Ca.6.23.237 kālaśca gauramātmānaṃ svapne gauraśca kālakam/
Ca.6.23.238 tamavekṣya bhiṣak prājñaḥ pṛcchet kiṃ kaiḥ kadā saha/
śuddhe hṛdi tataḥ śāṇaṃ hemacūrṇasya dāpayet//
Ca.6.23.246 vidārīṃ madhukāt sāraṃ karañjasya phalatvacau/

div.p: Ca.6.23.250 bhavanti cātra---

lg.l: Ca.6.23.251 daṣṭamātro daśedāśu taṃ sarpaṃ loṣṭameva vā/
Ca.6.23.252 vajraṃ marakataḥ sāraḥ picuko viṣamūṣikā/

div.p: Ca.6.23.254 tatra ślokaḥ---

lg.l: adhītya vijñāya tathā prayojayan varjedviṣāṇāmaviṣahyatāṃ budhaḥ//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne viṣacikitsitaṃ nāma tryoviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//23//

div.head: caturviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.24.1 athāto madātyayacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.24.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.24.4 yajñauhī yā yayā śakraḥ somātipatito bhṛśam/
dṛśyā spṛśyā prakalpyā ca yajñīyā yajñasiddhaye//
Ca.6.24.7 yā devānamṛtaṃ bhūtvā svadhā bhūtvā pitṝṃśca yā/
somo bhūtvā dvijātīn yā yuṅkte śreyobhiruttamaiḥ//
Ca.6.24.8 āśvinaṃ yā mahattejo balaṃ sārasvataṃ ca yā/
vīryamaindraṃ ca yā siddhā somaḥ sautrāmaṇau ca yā//
yā prītiryā ratiryā vāgyā puṣṭiryā ca nirvṛtiḥ//
ratiḥ suretyabhihitā tāṃ surāṃ vidhinā pibet//
Ca.6.24.20 &pūjayitvā surān pūrmāśiṣaḥ prāk prayujya ca/
Ca.6.24.25 vātikebhyo hitaṃ madyaṃ prāyo gauḍikapaiṣṭikam/
prahṛṣṭo yaḥ pibenmadyaṃ tasya syādamṛtaṃ yathā//
rūkṣaṃ vikāśi viśadaṃ madyaṃ daśaguṇaṃ smṛtam//
Ca.6.24.31 guru śītaṃ mṛdu ślakṣṇaṃ bahalaṃ madhuraṃ sthiram/
Ca.6.24.33 raukṣyāt snehaṃ vyavāyitvāt sthiratvaṃ ślakṣṇatāmapi/
Ca.6.24.36 atipītena madyena vihatenaujasā ca tat/
hṛdayaṃ yāti vikṛtiṃ tatrasthā ye ca dhātavaḥ//
Ca.6.24.37 aujasyavihate pūrvo hṛdi ca pratibodhite/
madhyamo vihate+alpe ca vihate tūttamo madhaḥ//
Ca.6.24.39 hṛdi madyaguṇāviṣṭe harṣastarṣo ratiḥ sukham/
Ca.6.24.43 na ca buddhismṛtiharo viṣayeṣu na cākṣamaḥ/
Ca.6.24.47 ko madaṃ tādṛśaṃ vidvānunmādamiva dāruṇam/
Ca.6.24.48 tṛtīyaṃ tu madaṃ prāpya bhagndārviva niṣkriyaḥ/
Ca.6.24.49 ramaṇīyān sa viṣayānna vetti na suhṛjjanam/
yadarthaṃ pīyate madyaṃ ratiṃ tāṃ ca na vindati//
Ca.6.24.50 kāryākāryaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ loke yacca hitāhitam/
yadavastho na jānāti ko+avasthāṃ tāṃ vrajedbudhaḥ//
Ca.6.24.51 sa dūṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ nindyaścāgrāhya eva ca/
Ca.6.24.52 pretya ceha ca yacchreyaḥ śreyo mokṣe ca yat param/
Ca.6.24.53 madyena manasaścāsya saṃkṣobhaḥ kriyate mahān/
Ca.6.24.54 madyaprasaṅgaṃ taṃ cājñā mahādoṣaṃ mahāgadam/
Ca.6.24.56 madye moho bhayaṃ śokaḥ krodho mṛtyuśca saṃśritaḥ/
Ca.6.24.58 satyamete mahādoṣā madyasyoktā na saṃśayaḥ/
Ca.6.24.59 kiṃtu madyaṃ svabhāvena yathaivānnaṃ tathā smṛtam/
Ca.6.24.66 pañcasvartheṣu kānteṣu yā ratiḥ prathame made/
yūnāṃ vā sthavirāṇāṃ vā tasya nāstyupamā bhuvi//
Ca.6.24.70 madyasya ca guṇān sarvān yathoktān sa samaśnute/
Ca.6.24.71 sattvāni tu prabudhyante prāyaśaḥ prathame made/
Ca.6.24.76 vaiguṇyaṃ sahasā yānti madyadoṣairna sāttvikāḥ/
madyaṃ hi balavatsattvaṃ gṛhṇāti sahasā na &tu//
Ca.6.24.79 āpāne sāttvikān buddhvā tathā rājasatāmasān/
Ca.6.24.80 sukhaśīlāḥ susaṃbhāṣāḥ sumukhāḥ saṃmatāḥ satām/
te sahāyāḥ sukhāḥ pāne taiḥ pibansaha modate//
pibanti susahāyā ye te vai sukṛtibhiḥ samāḥ//
bahumadyocitā ye ca mādyanti sahasā na te//
svalpenāpi madaṃ śīghraṃ yānti madyena mānavāḥ//
Ca.6.24.90 rūkṣaṃ pariṇataṃ madyaṃ niśi nidrāṃ vihatya ca/
Ca.6.24.92 tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ madyamamlaṃ ca yo+atimātraṃ niṣevate/
&sa tu vātolbaṇasyāśu praśamaṃ yāti hanti vā//
Ca.6.24.95 taruṇaṃ madhuraprāyaṃ gauḍaṃ paiṣṭikameva vā/
Ca.6.24.98 viṣasya ye guṇā dṛṣṭāḥ sannipātaprakopaṇāḥ/
ta eva madye dṛśyante viṣe tu balavattarāḥ//
Ca.6.24.99 hantyāśu hi viṣaṃ kiṃcit kiṃcidrogāya kalpate/
yathā viṣaṃ tathaivāntyo jñeyo madyakṛto madaḥ//
Ca.6.24.100 tasmāt tridoṣajaṃ liṅgaṃ sarvatrāpi madātyaye/
Ca.6.24.103 urovibandhaḥ kāsaśca hikkā śvāsaḥ prajāgaraḥ/
Ca.6.24.107 sarvaṃ madātyayaṃ vidyāt tridoṣamadhikaṃ tu yam/
Ca.6.24.108 kaphasthānānupūrvyā ca kriyā kāryā madātyaye/
Ca.6.24.113 antardāhaṃ jvaraṃ tṛṣṇāṃ pramohaṃ vibhramaṃ madam/
Ca.6.24.114 kṣāro hi yāti mādhuryaṃ śīghramamlopasaṃhitaḥ/
śreṣṭhamamleṣu madyaṃ ca yairguṇaistān paraṃ śṛṇu//
madhuraśca kaṣāyaśca tiktaḥ kaṭuka eva ca//
Ca.6.24.127 nātisnigdhaṃ na cāmlena yuktaṃ samaricārdrakam/
Ca.6.24.129 &bhukte tu vāruṇīmaṇḍaṃ dadyāt pātuṃ pipāsave/
dāḍimasya rasaṃ vā+api jalaṃ vā pāñcamūlikam//
Ca.6.24.142 madyaṃ drākṣārasaṃ toyaṃ dattvā tarpaṇameva vā/
Ca.6.24.143 kāle punastarpaṇādyaṃ kramaṃ kuryāt prakāṅkṣite/
Ca.6.24.148 anutarṣasya mātrā sā yayā no &dūṣyate manaḥ/
Ca.6.24.149 tṛṣṇā yenopaśāmyeta madaṃ yena ca nāpnuyāt/
Ca.6.24.150 parṇinīnāṃ catasṝṇāṃ pibedvā śiśiraṃ jalam/
Ca.6.24.153 kṣaumapadmotpalānāṃ ca maṇīnāṃ mauktikasya ca/
Ca.6.24.156 śītavīryaṃ yadanyacca tat sarvaṃ viniyojayet/
Ca.6.24.157 hitāḥ sparśā manojñānāṃ dāhe madyasamutthite/
Ca.6.24.158 toyadānāṃ ca śabdā hi śamayanti madātyayam/
Ca.6.24.159 kalpanīyāni bhiṣajā dāhe dhārāgṛhāṇi ca/
Ca.6.24.161 phenilāyāśca yaḥ phenastairdāhe lepanaṃ śubham/
Ca.6.24.162 seke pradehe śasyante dāhaghnāḥ sāmlakāñjikāḥ/
Ca.6.24.167 jalaṃ mustaiḥ śṛtaṃ vā+api dadyāddoṣavipācanam/
Ca.6.24.169 śārkaraṃ madhu vā jīrṇamariṣṭaṃ sīdhumeva vā/
Ca.6.24.173 chāgamāṃsarasaṃ rūkṣamamlaṃ vā jāṅgalaṃ rasam/
Ca.6.24.183 āmrāmalakapeśīnāṃ rāgān kuryāt pṛthak pṛthak/
tairannaṃ rocate digdhaṃ samyagmuktaṃ ca jīryati//
Ca.6.24.189 yadidaṃ karma nirdiṣṭaṃ pṛthagdoṣabalaṃ prati/
Ca.6.24.192 mālyāni gandhayogāśca vāsāṃsi vimalāni ca/
Ca.6.24.194 nākṣobhya hi mano madyaṃ śarīramavihatya ca/
Ca.6.24.195 ābhiḥ kriyābhiḥ siddhābhiḥ śamaṃ yāti madātyayaḥ/
Ca.6.24.198 payasā+abhihṛte roge bale jāte nivartayet/
Ca.6.24.203 tayoḥ karma tadeveṣṭaṃ vātike yanmadātyaye/
tau hi prakṣīṇadehasya jāyete durbalasya vai//
Ca.6.24.204 bastayaḥ sarpiṣaḥ pānaṃ prayogaḥ kṣīrasarpiṣoḥ/
Ca.6.24.206 nivṛttaḥ sarvamadyebhyo naro yaśca jitendriyaḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.24.207 tatra ślokāḥ---

lg.l: yatprabhāvā bhagavatī surā peyā yathā ca sā/
yaddravyā yasya yā ceṣṭā yogaṃ cāpekṣate yathā//
Ca.6.24.208 yathā madayate yaiśca guṇairyuktā mahāguṇā/
yo mado madabhedāśca ye trayaḥ svasvalakṣaṇāḥ//
Ca.6.24.209 ye ca madyakṛtā doṣā guṇā ye ca madātmakāḥ/
Ca.6.24.210 ye sahāyāḥ sukhāḥ &pāne cirakṣipramadā narāḥ/
madātyayasya yo heturlakṣaṇaṃ yad yathā ca yat//
Ca.6.24.211 madyaṃ madyotthitān rogān hanti yaśca kriyākramaḥ/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte cikitsāsthāne madātyayacikitsitaṃ nāma caturviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//24//

div.head: pañcaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.25.1 athāto dvivraṇīyacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.25.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.25.4 bhagavan! pūrvamuddiṣṭau dvau vraṇau rogasaṃgrahe/
Ca.6.25.6 śrūyatāṃ vidhivat saumya! tayorliṅgaṃ &ca bheṣajam/
Ca.6.25.15 bahupiccho guruḥ snigdhaḥ stimito mandavedanaḥ/
Ca.6.25.17 tau dvau nānātvabhedena niruktā viṃśatirvraṇāḥ/
teṣāṃ parīkṣā trividhā, praduṣṭā dvādaśa smṛtāḥ//
Ca.6.25.19 tathā copakramāḥ siddhāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśat samudāhṛtāḥ/
Ca.6.25.21 utsaṅgyutsanna eṣāṃ ca vraṇān vidyādviparyayāt/
Ca.6.25.25 ropyaḥ kumbhīmukhaśceti praduṣṭā dvādaśa vraṇāḥ/
vraṇā na praśamaṃ yānti niṣkriyatvācca dehinām//
Ca.6.25.39 sadyaḥ śuddhaśarīrāṇāṃ praśamaṃ yānti hi vraṇāḥ/
Ca.6.25.41 śodhanau ropaṇīyau ca kaṣāyau sapralepanau/
dve taile &tadguṇe patraṃ chādane dve ca bandhane//
Ca.6.25.47 vijayā madhukaṃ vīrā bisagranthiḥ śatāvarī/
Ca.6.25.48 saktavo madhukaṃ sarpiḥ pradehaḥ syāt sarśakaraḥ/
Ca.6.25.49 sa cedevamupakrāntaḥ śopho na praśamaṃ vrajet/
Ca.6.25.50 tailena sarpiṣā vā+api tābhyāṃ vā saktupiṇḍikā/
Ca.6.25.53 umā+atho gugguluḥ saudhaṃ payo dakṣakapotayoḥ/
Ca.6.25.55 pāṭanaṃ vyadhanaṃ caiva chedanaṃ lepanaṃ tathā/
pracchanaṃ sīvanaṃ caiva ṣaḍvidhaṃ śastrakarma tat//
Ca.6.25.57 dakodarāṇi saṃpakvā gulmā ye ye ca raktajāḥ/
Ca.6.25.68 dhātakīlodhracūrṇairvā tathā rohanti te vraṇāḥ/
asthibhagnaṃ cyutaṃ sandhiṃ saṃdadhīta samaṃ punaḥ//
Ca.6.25.71 glānirhi na hitā tasya sandhiviśleṣakārikā/
śuṣkā mahārujaḥ stabdhā ye vraṇā mārutottarāḥ/
Ca.6.25.74 sadāhā vedanāvanto ye vraṇā mārutottarāḥ/
Ca.6.25.75 tenaiva payasā piṣṭvā kuryādālepanaṃ bhiṣak/
Ca.6.25.76 jīvantī śarkarā kṣīraṃ tailaṃ matsyavasā ghṛtam/
Ca.6.25.78 yavacūrṇaṃ samadhukaṃ satilaṃ saha sarpiṣā/
Ca.6.25.80 sūkṣmānanā bahusrāvāḥ koṣavantaśca ye vraṇāḥ/
Ca.6.25.82 gambhīre māṃsale deśe pāṭyaṃ lauhaśalākayā/
Ca.6.25.85 tilakalkaḥ salavaṇo dve haridre trivṛdghṛtam/
na cotsanno na cotsaṅgī śuddho ropyaḥ paraṃ vraṇaḥ//
mede mūrvā samaṅgā ca yaṣṭyāhvaṃ vraṇaropaṇam//
Ca.6.25.89 prapauṇḍarīkaṃ jīvantī gojihvā dhātakī balā/
ropaṇaṃ satilaṃ dadyāt pralepaṃ saghṛtaṃ vraṇe//
Ca.6.25.90 kampillakaṃ viḍaṅgāni vatsakaṃ triphalāṃ balām/
paṭolaṃ picumardaṃ ca lodhraṃ mustaṃ priyaṅgukam//
piṣṭvā sādhyaṃ bhavettailaṃ tat paraṃ vraṇaropaṇam//
Ca.6.25.92 prapauṇḍarīkaṃ madhukaṃ kākolyau dve ca candane/
Ca.6.25.93 dūrvāsvarasasiddhaṃ vā tailaṃ kampillakena vā/
Ca.6.25.94 yenaiva vidhinā tailaṃ ghṛtaṃ tenaiva sādhayet/
Ca.6.25.96 vārkṣo+athavā++ājinaḥ kṣaumaḥ paṭṭo vraṇahitaḥ smṛtaḥ/
Ca.6.25.99 stanyāni jīvanīyāni bṛṃhaṇīyāni yāni ca/
Ca.6.25.108 kaṭhinatvaṃ vraṇā yānti gandhaiḥ sāraiśca dhūpitāḥ/
Ca.6.25.109 rujaḥ srāvāśca gandhāśca kṛmayaśca vraṇāśritāḥ/
Ca.6.25.111 sarujaḥ kaṭhināḥ stabdhā nirāsrāvāśca ye vraṇāḥ/
Ca.6.25.119 ṣoḍaśopadravā ye ca vraṇānāṃ parikīrtitāḥ/
teṣāṃ cikitsā nirdiṣṭā yathāsvaṃ sve cikitsite//

div.p: Ca.6.25.120 tatra ślokau---

lg.l: dvau vraṇau vraṇabhedāśca parīkṣā duṣṭireva ca/
sthānāni gandhāḥ srāvāśca sopasargāḥ kriyāśca yāḥ//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne dvivraṇīyacikitsitaṃ nāma pajcaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//25//

div.head: ṣaḍviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.26.1 athātastrimarmīyacikitsitamadhyāyaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.26.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.26.3 saptottaraṃ marmaśataṃ yaduktaṃ śarīrasaṃkhyāmadhikṛtya tebhyaḥ/
marmāṇi bastiṃ hṛdayaṃ śiraśca pradhānabhūtāni vadanti tajjñāḥ//
Ca.6.26.4 prāṇāśrayāt, tāni hi pīḍayanto vātādayo+asūnapi pīḍayanti/
pakvāśaye kupyati cedapānaḥ srotāṃsyadhogāni balī sa ruddhvā//
Ca.6.26.8 kṛcchreṇa śuṣkasya cirāt pravṛttiḥ syādvā tanuḥ syāt khararūkṣaśītā/
Ca.6.26.10 anye ca rogā bahavo+anilotthā bhavantyudāvartakṛtāḥ sughorāḥ/
cikitsitaṃ cāsya yathāvadūrdhvaṃ pravakṣyate tacchṛṇu cāgniveśa!//
sanīlīkāṃ dvirlavaṇāṃ guḍena vartiṃ karāṅguṣṭhanibhāṃ vidadhyāt//
Ca.6.26.16 teṣāṃ vighāte tu bhiṣagvidadhyāt svabhyaktasusvinnatanornirūham/
Ca.6.26.17 vāte+adhike+amlaṃ lavaṇaṃ satailaṃ, kṣīreṇa pitte tu, kaphe samūtram/
Ca.6.26.20 dviruttaraṃ hiṅgu &vacāgnikuṣṭhaṃ suvarcikā caiva viḍaṅgacūrṇam/
siddhaḥ kaṣāye dvipalāṃśikānāṃ prastho ghṛtāt syāt pratiruddhavāte//
Ca.6.26.24 phalaṃ ca mūlaṃ ca virecanoktaṃ hiṅgvarkamūlaṃ daśamūlamagryam/
snuk citrakaścaiva punarnavā ca tulyāni sarvairlavaṇāni pañca//
Ca.6.26.25 snehaiḥ samūtraiḥ saha jarjarāṇi śarāvasandhau vipacet sulipte/
mṛdukoṣṭhālpabalānāṃ saha bhojyaṃ tatprayojyaṃ syāt//) ityudāvartacikitsā/
Ca.6.26.33 pṛthaṅmalāḥ svaiḥ kupitā nidānaiḥ sarve+athavā kopamupetya bastau/
mūtrasya mārgaṃ paripīḍayanti yadā tadā mūtrayatīha kṛcchrāt//
Ca.6.26.34 tīvrā rujo vaṅkṣaṇabastimeḍhre svalpaṃ muhurmūtrayatīha vātāt/
pītaṃ saraktaṃ sarujaṃ sadāhaṃ kṛcchrānmuhurmūtrayatīha pittāt//
Ca.6.26.35 basteḥ saliṅgasya gurutvaśothau mūtraṃ sapicchaṃ kaphamūtrakṛcche/
sarvāṇi rūpāṇi tu sannipātādbhavanti tat kṛcchratamaṃ hi kṛcchram//
Ca.6.26.36 viśoṣayedbastigataṃ saśukraṃ mūtraṃ sapittaṃ pavanaḥ kaphaṃ vā/
yadā tadā+aśmaryupajāyate tu krameṇa pitteṣviva rocanā goḥ//
mūtrasya cenmārgamupaiti ruddhvā mūtraṃ rujaṃ tasya karoti bastau//
Ca.6.26.38 sasevanīmehanabastiśūlaṃ viśīrṇadhāraṃ ca karoti mūtram/
mṛdgāti meḍhraṃ sa tu vedanārto muhuḥ śakṛnmuñcati mehate ca//
Ca.6.26.39 kṣobhāt kṣate mūtrayatīha sāsṛk tasyāḥ sukhaṃ mehati ca vyapāyāt/
Ca.6.26.40 (reto+abhighātābhihatasya puṃsaḥ pravartate yasya tu mūtrakṛcchram/
Ca.6.26.41 śukreṇa saṃruddhagatipravāho mūtraṃ sa kṛcchreṇa vimuñcatīha/
Ca.6.26.42 śukraṃ malāścaiva pṛthak pṛthagvā mūtrāśayasthāḥ prativārayanti/
tadvyāhataṃ mehanabastiśūlaṃ mūtraṃ saśukraṃ kurute vibaddham//
Ca.6.26.43 stabdhaśca śūno bhṛśavedanaśca tudyeta bastirvṛṣaṇau ca tasya/
kṣatābhighātāt kṣatajaṃ kṣayādvā prakopitaṃ bastigataṃ vibaddham//
Ca.6.26.44 tīvrārti mūtreṇa sahāśmarītvamāyāti tasminnatisaṃcite ca/
ādhmātatāṃ vindati gauravaṃ ca basterlaghutvaṃ ca viniḥsṛte+asmin//
Ca.6.26.47 tailaṃ varāharkṣavasā ghṛtaṃ ca taireva kalkairlavaṇaiśca sādhyam/
Ca.6.26.48 etāni cānyāni varauṣadhāni piṣṭāni śastānyapi copanāhe//
Ca.6.26.49 sekāvagāhāḥ śiśirāḥ pradehā graiṣmo vidhirbastipayovirekāḥ/
kvāthaṃ suśītaṃ madhuśarkarābhyāṃ yuktaṃ pibet paittikamūtrakṛcchrī//
Ca.6.26.51 pibet kaṣāyaṃ kamalotpalānāṃ śṛṅgāṭakānāmathavā vidāryāḥ/
Ca.6.26.52 ervārubījaṃ trapuṣāt kusumbhāt sakuṅgkumaḥ syādvṛṣakaśca peyaḥ/
dārvīṃ tathaivāmalakīrasena samākṣikāṃ pittakṛte tu kṛcchre//
Ca.6.26.54 kṣāroṣṇatīkṣṇauṣadhamannapānaṃ svedo yavānnaṃ vamanaṃ nirūhāḥ/
pibettruṭiṃ kṣaudrayutāṃ kadalyā rasena kaiḍaryarasena vā+api//
Ca.6.26.56 takreṇa yuktaṃ śitivārakasya bījaṃ pibet kṛcchravināśahetoḥ/
paktvā jale tena pibedyavāgūṃ siddhaṃ kaṣāyaṃ madhusaṃyutaṃ vā//
Ca.6.26.58 sarvaṃ tridoṣaprabhave tu vāyoḥ sthānānupūrvyā prasamīkṣya kāryam/
tribhyo+adhike prāgvamanaṃ kaphe syāt pitte virekaḥ pavane tu bastiḥ//
Ca.6.26.59 kriyā hitā sā+aśmariśarkarābhyāṃ kṛcchre yathaiveha kaphānilābhyām/
Ca.6.26.61 utkuñcikā hiṅgu savetasāmlaṃ syāddve bṛhatyau hapuṣā vacā ca/
Ca.6.26.62 mūlaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrakṣurakorubūkāt kṣīreṇa piṣṭaṃ bṛhatīdvayācca/
āloḍya dadhnā madhureṇa peyaṃ dināni saptāśmaribhedanāya//
Ca.6.26.64 triṭiṃ &surāhvaṃ lavaṇāni pañca yavāgrajaṃ kundurukāśmabhedau/
Ca.6.26.66 bilvapramāṇo ghṛtatailabhṛṣṭo yūṣaḥ kṛtaḥ śigrukamūlakalkāt/
śīto+aśmabhit syāddadhimaṇḍayuktaḥ peyaḥ prakāmaṃ lavaṇena yuktaḥ//
sitopalā vā samayāvaśūkā kṛcchreṣu sarveṣvapi bheṣajaṃ syāt//
Ca.6.26.68 pītvā+atha madyaṃ nigadaṃ rathena hayena vā śīghrajavena yāyāt/
taiḥ śarkarā pracyavate+aśmarī tu śāmyenna cecchalyaviduddharettām//
Ca.6.26.69 retobhighātaprabhave tu kṛcchre samīkṣya doṣaṃ pratikarma kuryāt/
kārpāsamūlaṃ vṛṣakāśmabhedau balā sthirādīni gavedhukā ca//
Ca.6.26.70 vṛścīra aindrī ca punarnavā ca śatāvarī madhvasanākhyaparṇyau/
tatkvāthasiddhaḥ pavane rasaḥ syāt pitte+adhike kṣīramathāpi sarpiḥ//
Ca.6.26.71 kaphe ca yūṣādikamannapānaṃ saṃsargaje sarvahitaḥ kramaḥ syāt/
evaṃ na cecchāmyati tasya yuñjyāt surāṃ purāṇāṃ madhukāsavaṃ vā//
Ca.6.26.72 vihaṅgamāṃsāni ca bṛṃhaṇāya bastīṃśca śukrāśayaśodhanārtham/
śuddhasya tṛptasya ca vṛṣyayogaiḥ priyānukūlāḥ pramadā vidheyāḥ//
pibet sitākṣaudrayutāni khādedikṣuṃ vidārīṃ tripuṣāṇi caiva//
Ca.6.26.74 ghṛtaṃ śvadaṃṣṭrāsvarasena siddhaṃ kṣīreṇa caivāṣṭaguṇena peyam/
Ca.6.26.75 kṣīreṇa bastirmadhurauṣadhaiḥ syāttailena vā svākuphalotthitena//
yanmūtrakṛcchre vihitaṃ tu paitte kāryaṃ tu tacchoṇitamūtrakṛcchre//
Ca.6.26.80 stabdhaṃ guru syāt stimitaṃ ca marma kaphāt prasekajvarakāsatandrāḥ/
vidyāttridoṣaṃ tvapi sarvaliṅgaṃ tīvrārtitodaṃ kṛmijaṃ sakaṇḍūm//
Ca.6.26.81 tailaṃ sasauvīrakamastutakraṃ vāte prapeyaṃ lavaṇaṃ sukhoṣṇam/
Ca.6.26.82 punarnavāṃ dāru sapañcamūlaṃ rāsnāṃ yavān bilvakulatthakolam/
Ca.6.26.84 sapuṣkarāhvaṃ phalapūramūlaṃ mahauṣadhaṃ śaṭyabhayā ca kalkāḥ/
Ca.6.26.87 syāttryūṣaṇaṃ dve triphale sapāṭhe nidigdhikāgokṣurakau bale dve/
ṛddhistruṭistāmalakī svaguptā mede madhūkaṃ madhukaṃ sthirā ca//
prasthaṃ ghṛtasyeha pacedvidhijñaḥ prasthena dadhnā tvatha māhiṣeṇa//
Ca.6.26.89 mātrāṃ palaṃ cārdhapalaṃ picuṃ vā prayojayenmākṣikasaṃprayuktām/
śvāse sakāse tvatha pāṇḍuroge halīmake hṛdgrahaṇīpradoṣe//
Ca.6.26.90 śītāḥ pradehāḥ pariṣecanāni tathā vireko hṛdi pittaduṣṭe/
kṣate ca sarpīṃṣi hitāni sarpirguḍāśca ye tān prasamīkṣya samyak//
taireva sarve praśamaṃ prayānti pittāmayāḥ śoṇitasaṃśraya ye//
granthiśca sarpiḥ payasā pacettaiḥ kṣaudrānvitaṃ pittahṛdāmayaghnam//
Ca.6.26.95 sthirādikalkaiḥ payasā ca siddhaṃ drākṣārasenekṣurasena vā+api/
sarpirhitaṃ svāduphalekṣujāśca rasāḥ suśītā hṛdi pittaduṣṭe//
Ca.6.26.96 svinnasya vāntasya vilaṅghitasya kriyā kaphaghnī kaphamarmaroge/
Ca.6.26.99 śilāhvayaṃ vā bhiṣagapramattaḥ prayojayet kalpavidhānadiṣṭam/
Ca.6.26.100 tridoṣaje laṅghanamāditaḥ syādannaṃ ca sarveṣu hitaṃ vidheyam/
hīnātimadhyatvamavekṣya caiva kāryaṃ trayāṇāmapi karma śastam//
Ca.6.26.101 bhuktea+dhikaṃ jīryati śūlamalpaṃ jīrṇe sthitaṃ cet suradārukuṣṭham/
satilvakaṃ dve lavaṇe viḍaṅgamuṣṇāmbunā sātiviṣaṃ pibet saḥ//
Ca.6.26.102 jīrṇe+adhike snehavirecanaṃ syāt phalairvirecyo yadi jīryati syāt/
triṣveva kāleṣvadhike tu śūle tīkṣṇaṃ hitaṃ mūlavirecanaṃ syāt//
Ca.6.26.103 prāyo+anilo ruddhagatiḥ prakupyatyāmāśaye śodhanameva tasmāt/
kāryaṃ tathā laṅghanapācanaṃ ca sarvaṃ kṛmighnaṃ kṛmihṛdgade ca//
Ca.6.26.105 saṃstyānadoṣe śirasi pravṛddho vāyuḥ pratiśyāyamudīrayettu/
Ca.6.26.107 sarvāṇi rūpāṇi tu sannipātāt syuḥ pīnase &tīvraruje+atiduḥkhe/
Ca.6.26.108 tatastu rogāḥ kṣavathuśca nāsāśoṣaḥ pratīnāhaparisravau ca/
Ca.6.26.110 rodhābhighātasravaśoṣapākairghrāṇaṃ yutaṃ yaśca na vetti gandham/
Ca.6.26.111 saṃspṛśya marmāṇyanilastu mūrdhni viṣvakpathasthaḥ kṣavathuṃ karoti/
kruddhaḥ sa saṃśoṣya kaphaṃ tu nāsāśṛṅgāṭakaghrāṇaviśoṣaṇaṃ ca//
Ca.6.26.112 ucchvāsamārgaṃ tu kaphaḥ savāto rundhyāt pratīnāhamudāharettam/
Ca.6.26.113 vaivarṇyadaurgandhyamupekṣyā tu syāt pūtinasyaṃ śvayathurbhramaśca/
ānahyate yasya viśuṣyate ca praklidyate dhūpyati cāpi nāsā//
Ca.6.26.114 na vetti yo gandharasāṃśca janturjuṣṭaṃ vyavasyettamapīnasena/
Ca.6.26.115 sadāharāgaḥ śvayathuḥ sapākaḥ syād ghrāṇapāko+api ca raktapittāt/
Ca.6.26.116 ghrāṇe tathocchvāsagatiṃ nirudhya māṃsāsradoṣādapi cārbudāni/
ghrāṇāt sravedvā śravaṇānmukhādvā pittāktamasraṃ tvapi pūyaraktam//
Ca.6.26.117 kuryāt sapittaḥ pavanastvagādīn saṃdūṣya cārūṃṣi sapākavanti/
nāsā pradīpteva narasya yasya dīptaṃ tu taṃ rogamudāharanti//
Ca.6.26.118 bhṛśārtiśūlaṃ sphuratīha vātāt pittāt sadāhārti kaphādguru syāt/
Ca.6.26.119 mukhāmaye mārutaje tu śoṣakārkaśyaraukṣyāṇi calā rujaśca/
pittāt samūrcchā vividhā rujaśca varṇāśca śuklāruṇavarṇavarjyāḥ//
utkleśamandānalatā ca tandrā rujaśca mandāḥ kaphavaktraroge//
Ca.6.26.122 sarvāṇi rūpāṇi tu vaktraroge bhavanti yasmin sa tu sarvajaḥ syāt/
yathāpradeśaṃ tu caturvidhasya kriyāṃ pravakṣyāmi mukhāmayasya//
Ca.6.26.125 kaṭvamlamuṣṇaṃ virasaṃ ca pūti pittena vidyāllavaṇaṃ ca vaktram/
Ca.6.26.127 nādo+atirukkarṇamalasya śoṣaḥ srāvastanuścāśravaṇaṃ ca vātāt/
śophaḥ sarāgo daraṇaṃ vidāhaḥ sapītapūtiśravaṇaṃ ca pittāt//
sarvāṇi rūpāṇi tu sannipātāt srāvaśca tatrādhikadoṣavarṇaḥ//
Ca.6.26.130 śuklopadehaṃ bahupicchilāśru netraṃ kaphāt syādgurutā sakaṇḍuḥ/
sarvāṇi rūpāṇi tu sannipātānnetrāmayāḥ ṣaṇṇavatistu bhedāt//
parādhikāre tu na vistaroktiḥ śasteti tenātra na naḥ prayāsaḥ//
Ca.6.26.132 tejo+anilādyaiḥ saha keśabhūmiṃ dagdhvā++āśu kuryāt khalatiṃ narasya/
kiṃcittu dagdhvā palitāni kuryāddhariprabhatvaṃ ca śiroruhāṇām//
ataḥ paraṃ bheṣajasaṃgrahaṃ tu nibodha saṃkṣepata ucyamānam//
Ca.6.26.134 vātāt sakāsavaisvarye sakṣāraṃ pīnase vṛtam/
Ca.6.26.136 athavā saghṛtān saktūn kṛtvā mallakasaṃpuṭe/
Ca.6.26.141 siddhaṃ sasaindhavaṃ tailaṃ daśakṛtvo+aṇu tat smṛtam/
Ca.6.26.144 paitte sarpiḥ pibet &siddhaṃ śṛṅgaveraśṛtaṃ payaḥ/
dantyā ca sādhitaṃ tailaṃ nasyaṃ syāt pakvapīnase//
Ca.6.26.146 pūyāsre raktapittaghnāḥ kaṣāyā nāvanāni ca/
Ca.6.26.148 ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ yavāḥ śālirgodhūmā jāṅgalā rasāḥ/
svedāḥ sekāśca pākārthaṃ lipte śirasi sarpiṣā//
Ca.6.26.152 namaḥśilā vacā vyoṣaṃ viḍaṅgaṃ hiṅgu gugguluḥ/
mūtre lākṣā vacā lambā viḍaṅgaṃ kuṣṭhapippalī//
Ca.6.26.154 kṛtvā kalkaṃ karañjaṃ ca tailaṃ taiḥ sārṣapaṃ pacet/
Ca.6.26.155 snigdhasya vyāhate vege cchardanaṃ kaphapīnase/
Ca.6.26.157 sarvajit pīnase duṣṭe kāryaṃ śophe ca śophajit/
Ca.6.26.158 vātike śiraso roge snehān svedān sanāvanān/
Ca.6.26.164 jale paktvā ghṛtaprasthaṃ tasmin kṣīrasamaṃ pacet/
Ca.6.26.172 nasye pāne tathā+abhyaṅge bastau caiva prayojayet/
śirorogeṣu sarveṣu kāse śvāse ca dāruṇe//
Ca.6.26.174 ṛtusnātā tathā nārī pītvā putraṃ prasūyate/
Ca.6.26.175 ākhubhiḥ kukkuṭairhaṃsaiḥ śaśaiścāpi hi buddhimān/
Ca.6.26.176 paitte ghṛtaṃ payaḥ sekāḥ śītā lepāḥ sanāvanāḥ/
siddhaṃ syānnāvanaṃ cūrṇaṃ caiṣāṃ pradhamanaṃ hitam//
Ca.6.26.188 bhojyaṃ ca mukharogeṣu yathāsvaṃ doṣanuddhitam/
Ca.6.26.189 pāṭhāṃ tejovatīṃ pathyāṃ samabhāgaṃ vicūrṇayet/
Ca.6.26.191 pāṭhāṃ jyotiṣmatīṃ lodhraṃ dārvīṃ kuṣṭhaṃ ca cūrṇayet/
Ca.6.26.193 guḍe purāṇe dviguṇe kvathite guṭikāḥ kṛtāḥ/
Ca.6.26.195 tejohvā triphalā lodhraṃ citrakaśceti cūrṇitam/
Ca.6.26.197 dārvītvak ceti taccūrṇaṃ mākṣikeṇa samāyutam/
Ca.6.26.198 mukharogeṣu ca śreṣṭhaṃ pītakaṃ nāma kīrtitam/
mṛdvīkā kaṭukā vyoṣaṃ dārvītvak triphalā ghanam//
pāṭhā rasāñjanaṃ mūrvā tejohveti ca cūrṇitam//
Ca.6.26.202 svarasaḥ kvathito dārvyā ghanībhūto rasakriyā/
nāvanaṃ madhurāḥ snigdhāḥ śītāścaiva rasā hitāḥ//
Ca.6.26.207 droṇaśeṣaṃ kaṣāyaṃ taṃ pūtvā bhūyaḥ pacecchanaiḥ/
Ca.6.26.208 candanaṃ padmakośīraṃ mañjiṣṭhā dhātakī ghanam/
Ca.6.26.212 tailaṃ cānena kalkena kaṣāyeṇa ca sādhayet/
Ca.6.26.217 lodhraṃ tejovatī pathyā tryūṣaṇaṃ sayavāgrajam/
Ca.6.26.220 bastiṃ samīraṇe, pitte virekaṃ, vamanaṃ kaphe/
Ca.6.26.221 karṇaśūle tu vātaghnī hitā pīnasavat kriyā/
Ca.6.26.222 bhojyāni ca yathādoṣaṃ kuryāt snehāṃśca pūraṇān/
śatapuṣpā vacā kuṣṭhaṃ dāru śigru rasāñjanam//
Ca.6.26.228 mātuluṅgarasaścaiva kadalyā rasa eva ca/
Ca.6.26.232 nāgaraṃ saindhavaṃ sarpirmaṇḍena ca rasakriyā/
Ca.6.26.233 tathā śāvarakaṃ lodhraṃ ghṛtabhṛṣṭaṃ biḍālakaḥ/
Ca.6.26.235 gairikaṃ saindhavaṃ mustaṃ rocanā &ca rasakriyā/
kaphe kāryā tathā kṣaudraṃ priyaṅguḥ samanaḥśilā//
Ca.6.26.236 sannipāte tu sarvaiḥ syādbahirakṣṇoḥ pralepanam/
Ca.6.26.242 saindhavaṃ triphalā vyoṣaṃ śaṅkhanābhiḥ samudrajaḥ/
Ca.6.26.243 amṛtāhvā bisaṃ bilvaṃ paṭolaṃ chāgalaṃ śakṛt/
toye paktvā rase pūte bhūyaḥ pakve rase ghane//
Ca.6.26.248 piṣṭaṃ susūkṣmaṃ citrāyāṃ cūrṇāñjanamidaṃ śubham/
Ca.6.26.251 saindhavaṃ śaukarī daṃṣṭrā katakaṃ cāñjanaṃ śubham/
Ca.6.26.252 katakasya phalaṃ śaṅkhaḥ saindhavaṃ tryūṣaṇaṃ sitā/
timiraṃ paṭalaṃ kācaṃ malaṃ cāśu sukhāvatī//
nīlotpalaṃ viḍaṅgāni phenaṃ ca saritāṃ pateḥ//
saptarātraṃ sthitaṃ bhūyaḥ piṣṭvā kṣīreṇa vartayet//
Ca.6.26.259 jīrṇaṃ ghṛtaṃ ca sarvākṣirogaghnī syādrasakriyā/
Ca.6.26.262 kṣaudrayuktā nihantyāndhyaṃ paṭalaṃ ca rasakriyā/
Ca.6.26.263 khālitye palite valyāṃ harilomni ca śodhitam/
Ca.6.26.267 utpāṭya palite deyau tāvubhau palitāpahau/
Ca.6.26.268 taiḥ pacet kuḍavaṃ tailāttannasyaṃ palitāpaham/
Ca.6.26.269 surasasya ca patrāṇi &patraṃ kṛṣṇaśaṇasya ca/
mārkavaḥ kākamācī ca madhukaṃ devadāru ca//
Ca.6.26.271 āmrāsthi kardamaḥ kṛṣṇo mṛṇālaṃ raktacandanam/
Ca.6.26.273 pṛthak pañcapalāṃśāni taiḥ piṣṭairāḍhakaṃ pacet/
Ca.6.26.275 pāne nasyakriyāyāṃ ca śirobhyaṅge tathaiva ca/
Ca.6.26.278 (&palitaghno viśeṣeṇa kṛṣṇātreyeṇa bhāṣitaḥ/) kṣīraṃ priyālayaṣṭyāhve jīvakādyo gaṇastilāḥ//
śeṣeṣvādau ca nirdiṣṭā siddhau cānyā pravakṣyate//
Ca.6.26.285 paittike tu virekaḥ syāt payaśca madhuraiḥ śṛtam/
sarpirguḍā ghṛtaṃ tiktaṃ jīvanīyaṃ vṛṣasya vā//
Ca.6.26.286 kaphaje svarabhede tu tīkṣṇaṃ mūrdhavirecanam/
lihyādvā pippalīpathye tīkṣṇaṃ madyaṃ pibecca saḥ//
Ca.6.26.288 raktaje svarabhede tu &saghṛtā jāṅgalā rasāḥ/
Ca.6.26.289 yaccoktaṃ kṣayakāsaghnaṃ tacca sarvaṃ cikitsitam/
Ca.6.26.290 sannipāte hitāḥ sarvāḥ kriyā na tu sirāvyadhaḥ/

div.p: Ca.6.26.291 bhavanti cātra---

lg.l: Ca.6.26.293 viruddhairapi na tvete guṇairghnanti parasparam/

div.p: Ca.6.26.294 tatra ślokaḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne trimarmīyacikitsitaṃ nāma ṣaḍviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//26//

div.head: saptaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.27.1 athāta ūrustambhacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.27.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.27.3 śriyā paramayā brāhmyā parayā ca tapaḥśriyā/
Ca.6.27.5 bhagavan pañca karmāṇi samastāni pṛthak tathā/
na syuḥ śaktāni śamane sādhyasya kriyayā sataḥ//
Ca.6.27.7 astyūrustambha ityukte guruṇā tasya kāraṇam/
Ca.6.27.10 snehāccāmaṃ citaṃ koṣṭhe vātādīnmedasā saha/
Ca.6.27.12 mahāsarasi gambhīre pūrṇe+ambu stimitaṃ yathā/
Ca.6.27.14 ūrū śleṣmā samedasko vātapitte+abhibhūya tu/
padaṃ ca vyathate nyastaṃ śītasparśaṃ na vetti ca//
Ca.6.27.18 saṃsthāne pīḍane gatyāṃ cālane cāpyanīśvaraḥ/
anyaneyau hi saṃbhagnāvūrū pādau ca manyate//
Ca.6.27.19 yadā dāhārtitodārto vepanaḥ puruṣo bhavet/
Ca.6.27.20 tasya na snehanaṃ kāryaṃ na bastirna virecanam/
Ca.6.27.21 vṛddhaye śleṣmaṇo nityaṃ snehanaṃ bastikarma ca/
Ca.6.27.22 kaphaṃ kaphasthānagataṃ pittaṃ ca vamanāt sukham/
na śakyāḥ sukhamuddhartuṃ jalaṃ nimnādiva sthalāt//
Ca.6.27.25 tasya saṃśamanaṃ nityaṃ kṣapaṇaṃ śoṣaṇaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.27.29 samaṅgāṃ śālmalīṃ bilvaṃ madhunā saha nā pibet/
Ca.6.27.30 candanaṃ dhātakīṃ kuṣṭhaṃ tālīsaṃ naladaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.27.31 devadāru haridre dve vacāṃ kaṭukarohiṇīm/
bhallātakaṃ samūlāṃ ca pippalīṃ pañca tān pibet//
Ca.6.27.34 mūrvāmāragvadhaṃ pāṭhāṃ karañjaṃ kulakaṃ tathā/
Ca.6.27.38 phalīṃ vyāghranakhaṃ hema pibedvā madhusaṃyutam/
pīluparṇī payasyā ca rāsnā gokṣurako vacā//
sakṣaudraṃ prasṛtaṃ tasmādañjaliṃ vā+api nā pibet//
ajagandhā+aśvagandhā ca tailaṃ taiḥ sārṣapaṃ pacet//
Ca.6.27.45 dve pale saindhavāt pañca śuṇṭhyā granthikacitrakāt/
Ca.6.27.49 valmīkamṛttikā mūlaṃ karañjasya phalaṃ tvacam/
piṣṭaṃ tu sarṣapaṃ mūtre+adhyuṣitaṃ syāt pralepanam//
Ca.6.27.56 śyonākaṃ khadiraṃ bilvaṃ bṛhatyau saralāsanau/
Ca.6.27.59 pratārayet pratisroto nadīṃ śītajalāṃ śivām/
saraśca vimalaṃ śītaṃ sthiratoyaṃ punaḥ punaḥ//
Ca.6.27.60 tathā viśuṣke+asya kaphe śāntimūrugraho vrajet/
Ca.6.27.61 tat sarvaṃ sarvadā kāryamūrustambhasya bheṣajam/
śarīraṃ balamagniṃ ca kāryaiṣā rakṣatā kriyā//

div.p: Ca.6.27.62 tatra ślokaḥ---
div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne ūrustambhacikitsitaṃ nāma saptaviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//27//

div.head: aṣṭāviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.28.1 athāto vātavyādhicikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.28.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.28.7 udānasya punaḥ sthānaṃ nābhyuraḥ kaṇṭha eva ca/
Ca.6.28.9 dehaṃ vyāpnoti sarvaṃ tu vyānaḥ śīghragatirnṛṇām/
Ca.6.28.10 vṛṣaṇau bastimeḍhraṃ ca nābhyūrū vaṃkṣaṇau gudam/
Ca.6.28.11 sṛjatyārtavagarbhau ca yuktāḥ sthānasthitāśca te/
Ca.6.28.12 vimārgasthā hyayuktā vā rogaiḥ svasthānakarmajaiḥ/
Ca.6.28.20 ātmarūpaṃ tu tadvyaktamapāyo laghutā punaḥ/
Ca.6.28.30 tvagrūkṣā sphuṭitā suptā kṛśā kṛṣṇā ca tudyate/
Ca.6.28.34 kṣipraṃ muñcati badhnāti śukraṃ garbhamathāpi vā/
Ca.6.28.36 śarīraṃ mandarukśophaṃ śuṣyati spandate tathā/
suptāstanvyo mahatyo vā sirā vāte sirāgate//
Ca.6.28.38 (&ityuktaṃ sthānabhedena vāyorlakṣaṇameva ca/) ativṛddhaḥ śarīrārdhamekaṃ vāyuḥ prapadyate/
yadā tadopaśoṣyāsṛgbāhuṃ pādaṃ ca jānu ca//
Ca.6.28.39 tasmin saṅkocayatyardhe mukhaṃ jihmaṃ karoti ca/
Ca.6.28.41 dinā jihmā samutkṣiptā &kalā sajjati cāsya vāk/
Ca.6.28.43 manye saṃśritya vāto+antaryadā nāḍīḥ prapadyate/
Ca.6.28.44 antarāyamyate grīvā manyā ca stabhyate bhṛśam/
Ca.6.28.46 pṛṣṭhamanyāśritā bāhyāḥ śoṣayitvā sirā balī/
Ca.6.28.48 dantānāṃ daśanaṃ jṛmbhā lālāsrāvaśca vāggrahaḥ/
Ca.6.28.49 hanumūle sthito bandhāt saṃsrayatyanilo hanū/
Ca.6.28.51 pāṇipādaṃ ca saṃśoṣya sirāḥ sasnāyukaṇḍarāḥ/
hatvaikaṃ mārutaḥ pakṣaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vāmameva vā//
Ca.6.28.55 pādaṃ saṃkocayatyekaṃ hastaṃ vā todaśūlakṛt/
kupitastau samuddhūya tatra tatra kṣipan gadān//
Ca.6.28.64 bhavet sarāgaḥ śvayathurjāyante maṇḍalāni ca/
Ca.6.28.65 harṣaḥ pipīlikānāṃ ca saṃcāra iva māṃsage/
Ca.6.28.66 āḍhyavāta iti jñeyaḥ sa kṛcchro medasā++āvṛtaḥ/
Ca.6.28.67 saṃbhajyate sīdati ca sūcībhiriva tudyate/
Ca.6.28.68 śūlaṃ tu pīḍyamāne ca pāṇibhyāṃ labhate sukham/
Ca.6.28.69 bhukte kukṣau ca rugjīrṇe śāmyatyannāvṛte+anile/
vrajatyāśu jarāṃ sneho bhukte cānahyate naraḥ//
Ca.6.28.71 cirāt pīḍitamannena duḥkhaṃ śuṣkaṃ śakṛt sṛjet/
Ca.6.28.72 asvasthaṃ hṛdayaṃ caiva varcasā tvāvṛte+anile/
Ca.6.28.74 ete sthānasya gāmbhīryādyatnāt sidhyanti vā ca vā/
Ca.6.28.75 kriyāmataḥ paraṃ siddhāṃ vātarogāpahāṃ śṛṇu/
Ca.6.28.83 tathā snehamṛdau koṣṭhe na tiṣṭhantyanilāmayāḥ/
Ca.6.28.93 vireko māṃsamedaḥsthe nirūhāḥ śamanāni ca/
garbhe śuṣke tu vātena bālānāṃ cāpi śuṣyatām//
Ca.6.28.99 bastikarma tvadho nābheḥ śasyate cāvapīḍakaḥ/
ardite nāvanaṃ mūrdhni tailaṃ tarpaṇameva ca//
srastaṃ svaṃ gamayetsthānaṃ stabdhaṃ svinnaṃ vināmayet//
Ca.6.28.105 snigdhāḥ svedā nivātaṃ ca sthānaṃ prāvaraṇāni ca/
Ca.6.28.106 bṛṃhaṇaṃ yacca tat sarvaṃ praśastaṃ vātarogiṇām/
taiśca siddhaṃ ghṛtaṃ tailamabhyaṅgaṃ pānāmeva ca//
Ca.6.28.113 mustaṃ kiṇvaṃ tilāḥ kuṣṭhaṃ surāhvaṃ lavaṇaṃ natam/
Ca.6.28.115 sasnehaiḥ sarujaṃ gātramālipya bahalaṃ bhiṣak/
citrakaṃ nāgaraṃ rāsnāṃ pauṣkaraṃ pippalīṃ śaṭīm//
Ca.6.28.124 tasya śuktiḥ prakuñco vā nasyaṃ mūrdhagate+anile/
Ca.6.28.125 taṃ snehaṃ daśamūlasya kaṣāyeṇa punaḥ pacet/
Ca.6.28.131 jaladroṇe pacet pādaśeṣe prasthonmitaṃ pṛthak/
Ca.6.28.133 kalkaṃ dattvā mahāsnehaṃ samyagenaṃ vipācayet/
Ca.6.28.135 tena siddhaṃ samaṃ tailaṃ nāḍīkuṣṭhānilārtiṣu/
Ca.6.28.136 kārpāsāsthikulatthānāṃ rase siddhaṃ ca vātanut/
Ca.6.28.139 paktvā tasya rasaṃ &pūtvā tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet/
Ca.6.28.140 saṃsṛṣṭe śleṣmaṇā caitadvāte śastaṃ viśeṣataḥ/
Ca.6.28.142 piṣṭaiḥ siddhaṃ mahāvātairārtaḥ śīte prayojayet/
Ca.6.28.148 jīrṇe taile ca dugdhena peyākalpaḥ praśasyate/
Ca.6.28.155 patrakalkaṃ tataḥ pūtaṃ vidhinā tat prayojayet/
śvāsaṃ kāsaṃ jvaraṃ &hikkāṃ chardiṃ gulmān kṣataṃ kṣayam//
Ca.6.28.157 (agniveśāya guruṇā kṛṣṇātreyeṇa bhāṣitam/) iti balātailam/
Ca.6.28.158 pādaśeṣe samakṣīraṃ tailasya dvyāḍhakaṃ pacet/
Ca.6.28.171 sakṣīraṃ vāyunā bhagne dadyājjarjarite tathā/
Ca.6.28.175 pṛthak prasthonmitaiḥ sārdhaṃ tailaprasthaṃ vipācayet/
Ca.6.28.180 vakṣyante yāni tailāni vātaśoṇitake+api ca/
Ca.6.28.181 nāsti tailāt paraṃ kiṃcidauṣadhaṃ mārutāpaham/
Ca.6.28.183 kriyā sādhāraṇī sarvā saṃsṛṣṭe cāpi śasyate/
Ca.6.28.184 pittāvṛte viśeṣeṇa śītāmuṣṇāṃ tathā kriyām/
Ca.6.28.188 jīrṇaṃ sarpistathā tailaṃ tilasarṣapajaṃ hitam/
Ca.6.28.190 pakvāśaye virekaṃ tu pitte sarvatrage tathā/
Ca.6.28.191 pittaṃ vā darśayelliṅgaṃ bastibhistau vinirharet/
Ca.6.28.193 śirogate tu sakaphe dhūmanasyādi kārayet/
Ca.6.28.194 &saśeṣaḥ syāt kriyā tatra kāryā kevalavātikī/
Ca.6.28.197 mūtralāni tu mūtreṇa svedāḥ sottarabastayaḥ/
Ca.6.28.198 svasthānastho balī doṣaḥ prāk taṃ svairauṣadhairjayet/
Ca.6.28.199 (&ityuktamāvṛte vāte pittādibhiryathāyatham/) mārutānāṃ hi pañcānāmanyonyāvaraṇe śṛṇu//
prāṇe vṛṇotyudānādīn prāṇaṃ vṛṇvanti te+api ca//
Ca.6.28.202 mārutānāṃ hi pañcānāṃ tāni samyak pratarkayet/
Ca.6.28.203 vyāne prāṇāvṛte liṅgaṃ karma tatrordhvajatrukam/
Ca.6.28.204 prāṇe vyānāvṛte tatra snehayuktaṃ virecanam/
Ca.6.28.206 śūlaṃ cāmāśaye tatra dīpanaṃ sarpiriṣyate/
Ca.6.28.210 syurvāte tatra bastyādi bhojyaṃ caivānulomanam/
Ca.6.28.211 vāte syādvamanaṃ tatra dīpanaṃ grāhi cāśanam/
Ca.6.28.215 udānenāvṛte vyāne tatra pathyaṃ mitaṃ laghu/
sthānānyavekṣya vātānāṃ vṛddhiṃ hāniṃ ca karmaṇām//
Ca.6.28.220 samānaṃ śamayeccaiva tridhā vyānaṃ tu yojayet/
Ca.6.28.221 svaṃ sthānaṃ gamayedevaṃ vṛtānetān vimārgagān/
mūrcchā dāho bhramaḥ śūlaṃ vidāhaḥ śītakāmitā//
Ca.6.28.222 chardanaṃ ca vidagdhasya prāṇe pittasamāvṛte/
mūrcchādyāni ca rūpāṇi dāho nābhyurasaḥ klamaḥ//
vyāne pittāvṛte tu syāddāhaḥ sarvāṅgagaḥ klamaḥ//
lakṣaṇānāṃ tu miśratvaṃ pittasya ca kaphasya ca//
Ca.6.28.233 doṣau bahuvidhān vyādhīn darśayetāṃ yathānijān/
hṛdrogo vidradhiḥ plīhā gulmo+atīsāra eva ca//
Ca.6.28.238 pañcātmakasya vātena pittena śleṣmaṇā+api vā/
Ca.6.28.240 sarvasthānāvṛte+apyāśu tat kāryaṃ mārute hitam/
Ca.6.28.241 prasamīkṣya balādhikyaṃ mṛdu vā sraṃsanaṃ hitam/
Ca.6.28.245 prāṇādīnāṃ bhiṣak kuryādvitarkya svayameva tat/
Ca.6.28.246 loke vāyvarkasomānāṃ durvijñeyā yathā gatiḥ/
tathā śarīre vātasya pittasya ca kaphasya ca//
Ca.6.28.247 kṣayaṃ vṛddhiṃ samatvaṃ ca tathaivāvaraṇaṃ bhiṣak/

div.p: Ca.6.28.248 tatra ślokau---

lg.l: pañcātmanaḥ sthānavaśāccharīre sthānāni karmāṇi ca dehadhātoḥ/
prakopahetuḥ kupitaśca rogān sthāneṣu cānyeṣu vṛto+avṛtaśca//
Ca.6.28.249 prāṇeśvaraḥ prāṇabhṛtāṃ karoti kriyā ca teṣāmakhilā niruktā/

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsāsthāne vātavyādhicikitsitaṃ nāmāṣṭāviṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//28//

div.head: ekonatriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.29.1 athāto vātaśoṇitacikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.29.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.29.12 tasya sthānaṃ karau pādāvaṅgulyaḥ sarvasandhayaḥ/
kṛtvā++ādau hastapāde tu mūlaṃ dehe vidhāvati//
Ca.6.29.15 karoti duḥkhaṃ teṣveva tasmāt prāyeṇa sandhiṣu/
Ca.6.29.16 svedo+atyarthaṃ na vā kārṣṇyaṃ sparśājñatvaṃ kṣate+atiruk/
nistodaḥ sphuraṇaṃ bhedo gurutvaṃ suptireva ca//
Ca.6.29.18 kaṇḍūḥ saṃdhiṣu rugbhūtvā bhūtvā naśyati cāsakṛt/
Ca.6.29.19 uttānamatha gambhīraṃ dvividhaṃ tat pracakṣate/
Ca.6.29.23 karoti khañjaṃ paṅguṃ vā śarīre sarvataścaran/
Ca.6.29.24 tatra vāte+adhike vā syādrakte pitte kaphe+api vā/
Ca.6.29.28 vidāho vedanā mūrcchā svedastṛṣṇā mado bhramaḥ/
Ca.6.29.29 staimityaṃ gauravaṃ snehaḥ suptirmandā ca ruk kaphe/
Ca.6.29.30 ekadoṣānugaṃ sādhyaṃ navaṃ, yāpyaṃ dvidoṣajam/
Ca.6.29.38 deśāddeśaṃ vrajat srāvyaṃ sirābhiḥ pracchanena vā/
aṅgaglānau na tu srāvyaṃ &rūkṣe vātottare ca yat//
Ca.6.29.39 gambhīraṃ śvayathuṃ stambhaṃ kampaṃ snāyusirāmayān/
vātarakte praśasyante viśeṣaṃ tu nibodha me//
Ca.6.29.46 vamanaṃ mṛdu nātyarthaṃ snehasekau vilaṅghanam/
Ca.6.29.49 divāsvapnaṃ sasaṃtāpaṃ vyāyāmaṃ maithunaṃ tathā/
vyañjanārthaṃ, tathā gavyaṃ māhiṣājaṃ payo hitam//
Ca.6.29.57 ghṛtaṃ caturguṇakṣīraṃ taiḥ siddhaṃ vātaraktanut/
Ca.6.29.60 etat prāyogikaṃ sarpiḥ pārūṣakamiti smṛtam/
vātarakte kṣate kṣīṇe vīsarpe paittike jvare//
Ca.6.29.67 samyak siddhaṃ ca vijñāya suguptaṃ saṃnidhāpayet/
Ca.6.29.68 pāṇḍurogaṃ jvaraṃ hikkāṃ svarabhedaṃ bhagandaram/
Ca.6.29.74 eṣāṃ kaṣāyakalkābhyāṃ sarpistailaṃ ca sādhayet/
Ca.6.29.75 caturguṇena payasā tat siddhaṃ vātaśoṇitam/
Ca.6.29.76 sthirā śvadaṃṣṭrā bṛhatī sārivā saśatāvarī/
kāśmaryāṇyātmaguptā ca vṛścīro dve bale tathā//
Ca.6.29.77 eṣāṃ kvāthe catuḥkṣīraṃ pṛthak tailaṃ pṛthagvṛtam/
Ca.6.29.79 tailaṃ payaḥ śarkarāṃ ca pāyayedvā sumūrcchitam/
Ca.6.29.80 aṃśumatyā śṛtaḥ prasthaḥ payaso dvisitopalaḥ/
Ca.6.29.82 dhāroṣṇaṃ mūtrayuktaṃ vā kṣīraṃ doṣānulomanam/
Ca.6.29.85 kāśmaryaṃ trivṛtāṃ drākṣāṃ triphalāṃ saparūṣakām/
Ca.6.29.86 triphalāyāḥ kaṣāyaṃ vā pibet kṣaudreṇa saṃyutam/
Ca.6.29.88 nirharedvā malaṃ tasya saghṛtaiḥ kṣīrabastibhiḥ/
Ca.6.29.96 madhukasya śataṃ drākṣā kharjūrāṇi parūṣakam/
Ca.6.29.103 guḍūcīṃ madhukaṃ hrasvaṃ pañcamūlaṃ punarnavām/
Ca.6.29.106 tailadroṇaṃ pacettena dattvā pañcaguṇaṃ payaḥ/
Ca.6.29.113 kuṅkumasya palārdhena mañjiṣṭhāyāḥ palena ca/
Ca.6.29.116 tasmiṃstaile caturdroṇe madhukasya palena tu/
Ca.6.29.117 madhuparṇyāḥ palaṃ piṣṭvā tailaprasthaṃ caturguṇe/
kṣīre sādhyaṃ śataṃ kṛtvā tadevaṃ madhukācchate//
sparśaśītāḥ sukhasparśā ghnanti dāhaṃ rujaṃ klamam//
Ca.6.29.131 sarāge saruje dāhe raktaṃ visrāvya lepayet/
Ca.6.29.133 &tilāḥ priyālo madhukaṃ bisaṃ mūlaṃ ca vetasāt/
Ca.6.29.139 ghṛtaṃ sahacarānmūlaṃ jīvantī cchāgalaṃ payaḥ/
Ca.6.29.143 bilvamātrān pṛthak puṣpaṃ kākubhaṃ cāpi sādhayet/
vātarakte cyute bhagne khañje kubje ca śasyate//
Ca.6.29.146 padmakaṃ tvak samadhukaṃ sārivā ceti tairghṛtam/
Ca.6.29.147 &kṣārastailaṃ gavāṃ mūtraṃ &jalaṃ ca kaṭukaiḥ śṛtam/
Ca.6.29.149 gṛhadhūmo vacā kuṣṭhaṃ śatāhvā rajanīdvayam/
Ca.6.29.150 tagaraṃ tvak śatāhvailā kuṣṭhaṃ mustaṃ hareṇukā/
Ca.6.29.153 ṛddhiṃ tāmalakīṃ cavyaṃ samabhāgāni peṣayet/
Ca.6.29.155 buddhvā sthānaviśeṣāṃśca doṣāṇāṃ ca balābalam/
Ca.6.29.156 kupite mārgasaṃrodhānmedaso vā kaphasya vā/
bhinnaṃ sravati vā raktaṃ vidagdhaṃ pūyameva vā//

div.p: Ca.6.29.163 tatra ślokāḥ---

lg.l: hetuḥ sthānāni mūlaṃ ca yasmāt prāyeṇa sandhiṣu/
kupyati prāk ca yadrūpaṃ dvividhasya ca lakṣaṇam//
sādhyaṃ yāpyamasādhyaṃ ca kriyā sādhyasya cākhilā//

div.trailer: ityagniveśakṛte tantre carakapratisaṃskṛte+aprāpte dṛḍhabalasaṃpūrite cikitsitasthāne vātaśoṇitacikitsitaṃ nāmaikonatriṃśo+adhyāyaḥ//29//

div.head: triṃśo+adhyāyaḥ/
div.p: Ca.6.30.1 athāto yonivyāpaccikitsitaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ//
Ca.6.30.2 iti ha smāha bhagavānātreyaḥ//

lg.l: Ca.6.30.5 bhagavan! yadapatyānāṃ mūlaṃ nāryaḥ paraṃ nṛṇām/
Ca.6.30.8 mithyācāreṇa tāḥ strīṇāṃ praduṣṭenārtavena ca/
jāyante bījadoṣācca daivācca śṛṇu tāḥ pṛthak//
Ca.6.30.18 yonyāmadhāvanāt kaṇḍūṃ jātāḥ kurvanti jantavaḥ/
karoti kupito yonau sā cāticaraṇā matā//
rujan dūṣayate yoniṃ vāyuḥ prākcaraṇā hi sā//
Ca.6.30.22 pāṇḍuṃ satodamāsrāvaṃ śvetaṃ sravati vā kapham/
Ca.6.30.26 ārtave sā vimukte tu tatkṣaṇaṃ labhate sukham/
Ca.6.30.29 duṣṭaśoṇitajaṃ nāryāḥ putraghnī nāma sā matā/
Ca.6.30.32 mātṛdoṣādaṇudvārāṃ kuryāt sūcīmukhī tu sā/
Ca.6.30.34 sarujaṃ nīrujaṃ vā+api yā sravet sā tu vāminī/
Ca.6.30.36 garbhāśayasya yonyāśca mukhaṃ viṣṭambhayet striyāḥ/
tasmādgarbhaṃ na gṛhṇāti strī gacchatyāmayān bahūn//
āsāṃ ṣoḍaśa yāstvantyā ādye dve pittadoṣaje//
Ca.6.30.40 pariplutā vāminī ca vātapittātmike mate/
Ca.6.30.41 dehaṃ vātādayastāsāṃ svairliṅgaiḥ pīḍayanti hi/
Ca.6.30.43 sannipāte vimiśraṃ tu saṃsṛṣṭāsu ca kārayet/
Ca.6.30.44 pāṇinā nāmayejjihmāṃ saṃvṛtāṃ vardhayet punaḥ/
Ca.6.30.45 yoniḥ sthānāpavṛttā hi śalyabhūtā matā striyāḥ/
Ca.6.30.47 vātavyādhiharaṃ karma vātārtānāṃ sadā hitam/
Ca.6.30.52 vātapittakṛtān rogān hatvā garbhaṃ dadhāti tat/
Ca.6.30.55 yavakṣārājamode ca śarkarāṃ citrakaṃ tathā/
saindhavaṃ tagaraṃ kuṣṭhaṃ bṛhatī devadāru ca//
Ca.6.30.59 samāṃśaiḥ sādhitaṃ kalkaistailaṃ dhāryaṃ rujāpaham/
tailaprasthaṃ gavāṃ mūtre kṣīre ca dviguṇe pacet//
Ca.6.30.61 vātārtāyāḥ picuṃ dadyādyonau ca praṇayettataḥ/
Ca.6.30.62 (&uṣṇāḥ sigdhāḥ prakartavyāstailāni snehanāni ca/) hiṃsrākalkaṃ tu vātārtā koṣṇamabhyajya dhārayet/
śītāḥ pittaharāḥ kāryāḥ snehanārthaṃ ghṛtāni ca//
Ca.6.30.64 (&pittaghnauṣadhasiddhāni kāryāṇi bhiṣajā tathā/) śatāvarīmūlatulāścatasraḥ saṃprapīḍayet//
siddhe śīte ca madhunaḥ pippalyāśca palāṣṭakam//
Ca.6.30.68 kṣataṃ kṣataṃ raktapittaṃ kāsaṃ śvāsaṃ halīmakam/
Ca.6.30.70 garbhadaṃ pittalānāṃ ca yonīnāṃ syādbhiṣagjitam/
Ca.6.30.71 vārāhe bahuśaḥ pitte bhāvitairlaktakaiḥ kṛtā/
Ca.6.30.72 vartiḥ kṛtā muhurdhāryā tataḥ secyā sukhāmbunā/
piṣṭaiḥ siddhasya tailasya picuṃ yonau nidhāpayet//
Ca.6.30.76 saśarkaraiḥ kaṣāyaiśca śītaiḥ kurvīta secanam/
Ca.6.30.78 tailaṃ kvāthena tasyaiva siddhaṃ dhāryaṃ ca pūrvavat/
Ca.6.30.80 akṣamātrairajāmūtre kṣīre ca dviguṇe pacet/
Ca.6.30.82 uttānā connatā śūnā sidhyet sasphoṭaśūlinī/
Ca.6.30.85 śleṣmalāyāṃ kaṭuprāyāḥ samūtrā bastayo hitāḥ/
tilacūrṇaṃ dadhi ghṛtaṃ phāṇitaṃ śaukarī vasā//
Ca.6.30.92 kaṭvaṅgaṃ maricaṃ śuṇṭhīṃ mṛdvīkāṃ raktacandanam/
doṣāgantukṛtā ye ca bālānāṃ tāṃśca nāśayet//
Ca.6.30.95 yonidoṣaṃ rajodoṣaṃ śvetaṃ nīlaṃ sapītakam/
Ca.6.30.97 rasāñjanaṃ ca lākṣāṃ ca chāgena payasā pibet/
madhukaṃ triphalāṃ lodhraṃ mustaṃ saurāṣṭrikāṃ madhu//
Ca.6.30.100 hitaṃ garbhaparisrāve yaccokataṃ tacc kārayet/
Ca.6.30.102 arajaskā pibet siddhaṃ jīvanīyaiḥ payo+api vā/
Ca.6.30.110 bastamūtrakṛtā dhāryā sarvaṃ ca śleṣmanuddhitam/
Ca.6.30.112 etadeva mahāyonyāṃ srastāyāṃ ca vidhīyate/
āsrāve kṣaumapaṭṭaṃ vā bhāvitaṃ tena dhārayet//
Ca.6.30.120 dhāryā madhuyutā vartiḥ kaṣāyāṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ/
Ca.6.30.124 dhārayedveśavāraṃ vā pāyasaṃ kṛśarāṃ tathā/
durgandhānāṃ kaṣāyaḥ syāttauvaraḥ kalka eva vā//
evaṃ yoniṣu śuddhāsu garbhaṃ vindanti yoṣitaḥ//
Ca.6.30.126 aduṣṭe prākṛte bīje jīvopakramaṇe sati/
bhavanti cātra--- saliṅgā vyāpado yoneḥ sanidānacikitsitāḥ//
Ca.6.30.130 teṣāṃ hetuṃ bhiṣakśreṣṭha! duṣṭāduṣṭasya cākṛtim/
cikitsitaṃ ca kārtsnyona klaibyaṃ yacca caturvidham//
Ca.6.30.131 upadraveṣu yonīnāṃ pradaro yaśca kīrtitaḥ/
teṣāṃ nidānaṃ liṅgaṃ ca cikitsāṃ caiva tattvataḥ//
na virohati saṃduṣṭaṃ tathā śukraṃ śarīriṇām//
akāle vā+apyayonau vā maithunaṃ na ca gacchataḥ//
doṣāḥ pṛthak samastā vā prāpya retovahāḥ sirāḥ//
phenilaṃ tanu rūkṣaṃ ca vivarṇaṃ pūti picchilam//
phenilaṃ tanu rūkṣaṃ ca kṛcchreṇālpaṃ ca mārutāt//
Ca.6.30.141 bhavatyupahataṃ śukraṃ na tadgarbhāya kalpate/
Ca.6.30.142 dahalliṅgaṃ viniryāti śukraṃ pittena dūṣitam/
Ca.6.30.145 iti doṣāḥ samākhyātāḥ śukrasyāṣṭau salakṣaṇāḥ/
snigdhaṃ ghanaṃ picchilaṃ ca madhuraṃ cāvidāhi ca//
duṣṭaṃ yadā bhavecchukraṃ tadā tat samupācaret//
Ca.6.30.148 ghṛtaṃ ca jīvanīyaṃ yaccyavanaprāśa eva ca/
Ca.6.30.149 vātānvite hitāḥ śukre nirūhāḥ sānuvāsanāḥ/
Ca.6.30.154 tato vakṣyāmi te samyagagniveśa! yathātatham/
Ca.6.30.155 klaibyaṃ saṃpadyate tasya śṛṇu sāmānyalakṣaṇam/
Ca.6.30.156 na yāti liṅgaśaitthilyāt kadācidyāti vā yadi/
Ca.6.30.166 īdṛśīṃ pramadāṃ mohādyo gacchet kāmaharṣitaḥ/
(&bhavanti yāni rūpāṇi tasya vakṣyāmyataḥ param/) śvayathurvedanā meḍhre rāgaścaivopalakṣyate//
Ca.6.30.169 sphoṭāśca tīvrā jāyante liṅgapāko bhavatyapi/
